tika-s0401t:16_0: Namāmi sirasā dhīraṃ, garuṃ me gaṇavācakaṃ.
tika-s0401t:48_3: vandanārahe ca katā vandanā yathādhippetamatthaṃ sādheti.
tika-s0401t:48_4: Ettha ca saṃvaṇṇanārambhe ratanattayappaṇāmakaraṇappayojanaṃ tattha tattha bahudhā papañcenti ācariyā,
tika-s0401t:48_6: tasmā saṃvaṇṇanārambhe ratanattayappaṇāmakaraṇaṃ yathāpaṭiññātasaṃvaṇṇanāya anantarāyena parisamāpanatthanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0401t:51_0: Ratanattayappaṇāmakaraṇena cettha yathāpaṭiññātasaṃvaṇṇanāya anantarāyena parisamāpanaṃ ratanattayapūjāya paññāpāṭavato,
tika-s0401t:52_2: nevassa tasmiṃ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti,
tika-s0401t:56_2: Tato evaṃ paṭubhūtāya paññāya paṭiññāmahattakataṃ khedamabhibhuyya anantarāyena saṃvaṇṇanaṃ samāpayissati.
tika-s0401t:57_0: Atha vā ratanattayapūjāya āyuvaṇṇasukhabalavaḍḍhanato anantarāyena parisamāpanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0401t:59_0: Cattāro dhammā vaḍḍhanti, āyu vaṇṇo sukhaṃ bala”nti. –
tika-s0401t:64_0: Atha vā pasādavatthūsu pūjāya puññātisayabhāvato. Vuttañhi tassā puññātisayattaṃ –
tika-s0401t:68_0: Na sakkā puññaṃ saṅkhātuṃ, imettamapi kenacī”ti. ;
tika-s0401t:72_1: Ratanattayapūjā hi niratisayapuññakkhettasambuddhiyā aparimeyyappabhāvo puññātisayoti bahuvidhantarāyepi
tika-s0401t:73_0: Evañca sappayojanaṃ ratanattayavandanaṃ kattukāmo paṭhamaṃ tāva bhagavato vandanaṃ kātuṃ tammūlakattā sesaratanānaṃ “karuṇāsītalahadayaṃ…pe…
tika-s0401t:73_5: atha kho karuṇāpaññāpadhānāti tadubhayappadhānameva tāva sammāsambuddhassa thomanaṃ kātuṃ “karuṇāsītalahadayaṃ,
tika-s0401t:73_10: paradukkhe sati kāruṇikaṃ hiṃsati vibādhatīti attho.
tika-s0401t:73_11: Paradukkhe sati sādhūnaṃ kampanaṃ hadayakhedaṃ karotīti vā karuṇā.
tika-s0401t:73_14: Esā hi paradukkhāpanayanakāmatālakkhaṇā attasukhanirapekkhatāya kāruṇikānaṃ sukhaṃ rundhati vibandhatīti attho.
tika-s0401t:74_1: byāpādāratīnaṃ ujuvipaccanīkatāya ca sattasantānagatasantāpavicchedanākārappavattiyā mettāmuditānampi cittasītalabhāvakāraṇatā upalabbhati,
tika-s0401t:74_2: tathāpi dukkhāpanayanākārappavattiyā parūpatāpāsahanarasā avihiṃsabhūtā karuṇā visesena bhagavato cittassa
tika-s0401t:74_5: Karuṇāmukhena vā mettāmuditānampi hadayasītalabhāvakāraṇatā vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0401t:74_6: Atha vā asādhāraṇañāṇavisesanibandhanabhūtā sātisayaṃ niravasesañca sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ viya savisayabyāpitāya
tika-s0401t:74_7: mahākaruṇābhāvaṃ upagatā karuṇāva bhagavato atisayena hadayasītalabhāvahetūti āha –
tika-s0401t:74_9: Atha vā satipi mettāmuditānaṃ sātisaye hadayasītibhāvanibandhanatte sakalabuddhaguṇavisesakāraṇatāya
tika-s0401t:74_14: ca sannihitesupi sattasaṅkhārasamupanītahadayūpatāpanimittesu na īsakampi cittasītibhāvassa aññathattamahosīti.
tika-s0401t:74_15: Etasmiñca atthavikappe tīsupi avatthāsu bhagavato karuṇā saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0401t:75_2: Paññāva ñeyyāvaraṇappahānato pakārehi dhammasabhāvāvajotanaṭṭhena pajjototi paññāpajjoto.
tika-s0401t:75_8: Sveva visayasabhāvappaṭicchādanato andhakārasarikkhatāya tamo viyāti mohatamo,
tika-s0401t:75_11: Sabbesampi hi khīṇāsavānaṃ satipi paññāpajjotena avijjandhakārassa vihatabhāve saddhādhimuttehi viya
tika-s0401t:75_12: diṭṭhippattānaṃ sāvakehi paccekasambuddhehi ca savāsanappahānena sammāsambuddhānaṃ kilesappahānassa viseso
tika-s0401t:75_13: vijjatīti sātisayena avijjāpahānena bhagavantaṃ thomento āha –
tika-s0401t:76_0: Atha vā antarena paropadesaṃ attano santāne accantaṃ avijjandhakāravigamassa nibbattitattā,
tika-s0401t:76_1: tattha ca sabbaññutāya balesu ca vasībhāvassa samadhigatattā,
tika-s0401t:76_2: parasantatiyañca dhammadesanātisayānubhāvena sammadeva tassa pavattitattā bhagavāva visesato mohatamavigamena thometabboti āha –
tika-s0401t:76_4: Imasmiñca atthavikappe “paññāpajjoto”ti padena bhagavato paṭivedhapaññā viya desanāpaññāpi sāmaññaniddesena,
tika-s0401t:77_0: Atha vā bhagavato ñāṇassa ñeyyapariyantikattā sakalañeyyadhammasabhāvāvabodhanasamatthena anāvaraṇañāṇasaṅkhātena
tika-s0401t:77_1: paññāpajjotena sabbañeyyadhammasabhāvacchādakassa mohandhakārassa vidhamitattā anaññasādhāraṇo bhagavato
tika-s0401t:77_4: Ettha ca mohatamavidhamanante adhigatattā anāvaraṇañāṇaṃ kāraṇopacārena sasantānamohatamavidhamanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0401t:77_6: parasantāne pana mohatamavidhamanassa kāraṇabhāvato anāvaraṇañāṇaṃ “mohatamavidhamana”nti vuccatīti.
tika-s0401t:78_0: Kiṃ pana kāraṇaṃ avijjāsamugghātoyeveko pahānasampattivasena bhagavato thomanānimittaṃ gayhati,
tika-s0401t:78_3: Na hi so tādiso kileso atthi,
tika-s0401t:79_1: niravasesākusaladhammanibbattiyā saṃsārappavattiyā ca avijjā padhānakāraṇanti tabbighātavacanena sakalasaṃkilesagaṇasamugghāto
tika-s0401t:80_2: sanarāmaro ca so loko cāti sanarāmaraloko,
tika-s0401t:80_5: Etena devamanussānaṃ viya tadavasiṭṭhasattānampi yathārahaṃ guṇavisesāvahatāya bhagavato upakārataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0401t:80_9: Īdisesu hi samāsapadesu padhānampi appadhānaṃ viya niddisīyati yathā “sarājikāya parisāyā”ti.
tika-s0401t:80_11: garubhāvassa pana adhippetattā garukaraṇasamatthasseva yujjanato sattalokassa vasena attho gahetabbo.
tika-s0401t:80_12: So hi lokīyanti ettha puññapāpāni tabbipāko cāti “loko”ti vuccati.
tika-s0401t:81_0: Atha vā samūhattho lokasaddo samudāyavasena lokīyati paññāpīyatīti.
tika-s0401t:81_2: sanarā ca te amarā cāti sanarāmarā,
tika-s0401t:81_6: Narāmarānaṃyeva ca gahaṇaṃ ukkaṭṭhaniddesavasena yathā “satthā devamanussāna”nti.
tika-s0401t:81_7: Tathā hi sabbānatthapariharaṇapubbaṅgamāya niravasesahitasukhavidhānatapparāya niratisayāya payogasampattiyā
tika-s0401t:81_9: bhagavā aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ uttamagāravaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0401t:82_1: Bhagavato hi veneyyajanūpasaṅkamanaṃ ekantena tesaṃ hitasukhanipphādanato sobhanaṃ,
tika-s0401t:82_5: Atha vā sayambhuñāṇena sakalampi lokaṃ pariññābhisamayavasena parijānanto ñāṇena sammā gato avagatoti sugato,
tika-s0401t:82_6: tathā lokasamudayaṃ pahānābhisamayavasena pajahanto anuppattidhammataṃ āpādento sammā gato atītoti sugato,
tika-s0401t:82_7: lokanirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena sammā gato adhigatoti sugato,
tika-s0401t:82_8: lokanirodhagāminipaṭipadaṃ bhāvanābhisamayavasena sammā gato paṭipannoti sugato.
tika-s0401t:82_10: te kilese na puneti na pacceti na paccāgacchatīti sugato”tiādinā nayena ayamattho vibhāvetabbo.
tika-s0401t:82_13: yasmā vā bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ atthasaṃhitaṃ veneyyānaṃ yathārahaṃ kālayuttameva ca dhammaṃ bhāsati,
tika-s0401t:83_3: Tāhi sakalassapi bhavagāmikammassa ariyamaggādhigamena avipākārahabhāvakaraṇena nivattitattā bhagavā pañcahipi gatīhi suṭṭhu mutto visaṃyuttoti āha –
tika-s0401t:83_5: Etena bhagavato katthacipi gatiyā apariyāpannataṃ dasseti,
tika-s0401t:86_0: Te mayhaṃ āsavā khīṇā, viddhastā vinaḷīkatā”ti. ;
tika-s0401t:87_0: Taṃtaṃgatisaṃvattanikānañhi kammakilesānaṃ aggamaggena bodhimūleyeva suppahīnattā natthi bhagavato gatipariyāpannatāti
tika-s0401t:88_0: Atha vā gativimuttanti anupādisesanibbānadhātuppattiyā bhagavantaṃ thometi.
tika-s0401t:88_1: Ettha hi dvīhi ākārehi bhagavato thomanā veditabbā attahitasampattito parahitappaṭipattito ca.
tika-s0401t:88_2: Tesu attahitasampatti anāvaraṇañāṇādhigamato savāsanānaṃ sabbesaṃ kilesānaṃ accantappahānato anupādisesanibbānappattito ca veditabbā,
tika-s0401t:88_3: parahitappaṭipatti lābhasakkārādinirapekkhacittassa sabbadukkhaniyyānikadhammadesanato viruddhesupi niccaṃ hitajjhāsayato ñāṇaparipākakālāgamanato ca.
tika-s0401t:88_4: Sā panettha āsayato payogato ca duvidhā,
tika-s0401t:88_9: “paññāpajjotavihatamohatamaṃ gativimutta”nti etehi catusaccasampaṭivedhanatthena ca sugatasaddena tividhāpi attahitasampatti,
tika-s0401t:88_10: avasiṭṭhena “paññāpajjotavihatamohatama”nti etena cāpi attahitasampatti parahitappaṭipatti pakāsitā hotīti.
tika-s0401t:89_0: Atha vā tīhi ākārehi bhagavato thomanā veditabbā hetuto, phalato,
tika-s0401t:89_8: Tāsu ñāṇappahānasampadā dutiyapadena saccappaṭivedhanatthena ca sugatasaddena pakāsitā honti,
tika-s0401t:89_10: rūpakāyasampadā yathāvuttakāyagamanasobhanatthena sugatasaddena lakkhaṇānubyañjanapāripūriyā vinā tadabhāvato.
tika-s0401t:89_11: Upakāro anantaraṃ abāhiraṃ karitvā tividhayānamukhena vimuttidhammadesanā.
tika-s0401t:89_12: So sammāgadanatthena sugatasaddena pakāsito hotīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0401t:90_1: Mahākaruṇāsañcoditamānaso hi bhagavā saṃsārapaṅkato sattānaṃ samuddharaṇatthaṃ katābhinīhāro anupubbena
tika-s0401t:90_2: pāramiyo pūretvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ adhigatoti karuṇā sammāsambodhiyā mūlaṃ.
tika-s0401t:90_13: Tadubhayena attahitāya paṭipannādīsu catūsu puggalesu bhagavato catutthapuggalabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0401t:90_14: Tena ca anuttaradakkhiṇeyyabhāvaṃ uttamavandaneyyabhāvaṃ attano ca vandanakiriyāya khettaṅgatabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0401t:91_0: Ettha ca karuṇāgahaṇena lokiyesu mahaggatabhāvappattāsādhāraṇaguṇadīpanato bhagavato sabbalokiyaguṇasampatti dassitā hoti,
tika-s0401t:91_5: Tathā karuṇāgahaṇena lokasamaññānurūpaṃ bhagavato pavattiṃ dasseti lokavohāravisayattā karuṇāya,
tika-s0401t:91_7: Sabhāvānavabodhena hi dhammānaṃ samaññaṃ atidhāvitvā sattādiparāmasanaṃ hotīti.
tika-s0401t:91_20: sattasattati ñāṇavatthūnīti evamādīnaṃ anekesaṃ paññāpabhedānaṃ vasena ñāṇacāraṃ dasseti.
tika-s0401t:92_2: Iti ādipariyosānadassanena sabbe buddhaguṇā dassitā honti.
tika-s0401t:92_3: Tathā karuṇāgahaṇena sīlakkhandhapubbaṅgamo samādhikkhandho dassito hoti.
tika-s0401t:92_9: paññā pariyosānanti evampi ādimajjhapariyosānakalyāṇā sabbe buddhaguṇā dassitā honti nayato dassitattā.
tika-s0401t:92_10: Eso eva hi niravasesato buddhaguṇānaṃ dassanupāyo,
tika-s0401t:92_12: aññathā ko nāma samattho bhagavato guṇe anupadaṃ niravasesato dassetuṃ?
tika-s0401t:97_0: Teneva ca āyasmatā sāriputtattherenapi buddhaguṇaparicchedanaṃ pati anuyuttena “no hetaṃ,
tika-s0401t:98_1: Evaṃ saṅkhepena sakalasabbaññuguṇehi bhagavantaṃ abhitthavitvā idāni saddhammaṃ thometuṃ “buddhopī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0401t:99_1: bodhetā pajāyāti buddho”tiādinā niddesanayena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0401t:99_3: buddhiyā vā vikasitabhāvato buddhavāti buddho jāgaraṇavikasanatthavasena.
tika-s0401t:99_4: Atha vā kassacipi ñeyyadhammassa anavabuddhassa abhāvena ñeyyavisesassa kammabhāvena aggahaṇato kammavacanicchāya
tika-s0401t:99_5: abhāvena avagamanatthavaseneva kattuniddeso labbhatīti buddhavāti buddho yathā “dikkhito na dadātī”ti.
tika-s0401t:99_6: Atthato pana pāramitāparibhāvito sayambhuñāṇena saha vāsanāya vihataviddhaṃsitaniravasesakileso mahākaruṇāsabbaññutaññāṇādiaparimeyyaguṇagaṇādhāro
tika-s0401t:100_0: “Buddhoti yo so bhagavā sayambhū anācariyako pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṃ saccāni abhisambujjhi,
tika-s0401t:100_1: tattha ca sabbaññutaṃ patto balesu ca vasībhāva”nti.
tika-s0401t:101_2: Tena “evaṃ guṇavisesayutto sopi nāma bhagavā”ti vakkhamānaguṇadhamme sambhāvanaṃ dīpeti.
tika-s0401t:101_15: Dhammanti yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāne apāyato ca saṃsārato ca apatamāne katvā dhāretīti dhammo.
tika-s0401t:101_17: evaṃ vividhaguṇagaṇasamannāgato buddhopi bhagavā yaṃ ariyamaggasaṅkhātaṃ dhammaṃ bhāvetvā,
tika-s0401t:101_18: phalanibbānaṃ pana sacchikatvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ adhigato,
tika-s0401t:101_19: tamevaṃ buddhānampi buddhabhāvahetubhūtaṃ sabbadosamalarahitaṃ attano uttaritarābhāvena anuttaraṃ paṭivedhasaddhammaṃ namāmīti.
tika-s0401t:102_1: tīṇi piṭakāni sammasī”ti ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā pariyattidhammassapi sacchikiriyāsammasanapariyāyo labbhatīti sopi idha vutto evāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0401t:102_2: Tathā “yaṃ dhammaṃ bhāvetvā sacchikatvā”ti ca vuttattā buddhakaradhammabhūtāhi pāramitāhi saha pubbabhāge
tika-s0401t:102_6: Tathā hi sattānaṃ sakalavaṭṭadukkhanissaraṇāya katamahābhinīhāro mahākaruṇādhivāsanapesalajjhāsayo paññāvisesapariyodātanimmalānaṃ
tika-s0401t:102_7: dānadamasaññamādīnaṃ uttamadhammānaṃ satasahassādhikāni kappānaṃ cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni sakkaccaṃ nirantaraṃ
tika-s0401t:102_8: niravasesānaṃ bhāvanāpaccakkhakaraṇehi kammādīsu adhigatavasībhāvo acchariyācinteyyamahānubhāvo adhisīlaadhicittānaṃ
tika-s0401t:102_9: paramukkaṃsapāramippatto bhagavā paccayākāre catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassamukhena mahāvajirañāṇaṃ pesetvā
tika-s0401t:103_0: Ettha ca “bhāvetvā”ti etena vijjāsampadāya dhammaṃ thometi,
tika-s0401t:103_20: Atha vā “yaṃ dhammaṃ bhāvetvā buddhabhāvaṃ upagato”ti etena svākkhātatāya dhammaṃ thometi,
tika-s0401t:103_31: Bhāvanāguṇena hi so dosānaṃ samugghātako hotīti.
tika-s0401t:103_34: Tathā “bhāvetvā”ti etena saha pubbabhāgasīlādīhi sekkhā sīlasamādhipaññākkhandhā dassitā honti.
tika-s0401t:103_35: “Sacchikatvā”ti etena saha asaṅkhatāya dhātuyā asekkhā sīlasamādhipaññākkhandhā dassitā hontīti.
tika-s0401t:104_1: Evaṃ saṅkhepeneva sabbadhammaguṇehi saddhammaṃ abhitthavitvā idāni ariyasaṅghaṃ thometuṃ “sugatassā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0401t:104_5: Mārasenamathanānanti orasaputtabhāve kāraṇaniddeso tena kilesappahānameva bhagavato orasaputtabhāve kāraṇaṃ anujānātīti dasseti.
tika-s0401t:104_7: Tena ca satipi tesaṃ sattavisesabhāvena anekasatasahassabhāve imaṃ gaṇanaparicchedaṃ nātivattantīti dasseti maggaṭṭhaphalaṭṭhabhāvānativattanato.
tika-s0401t:104_10: Tena asatipi ariyapuggalānaṃ kāyasāmaggiyaṃ ariyasaṅghabhāvaṃ dasseti diṭṭhisīlasāmaññena saṃhatabhāvato.
tika-s0401t:105_0: Tattha urasi bhavā jātā saṃbaddhā ca orasā.
tika-s0401t:105_1: Yathā hi sattānaṃ orasaputtā attajatāya pitu santakassa dāyajjassa visesena bhāgino honti,
tika-s0401t:105_2: evametepi ariyapuggalā sammāsambuddhassa savanante ariyāya jātiyā jātatāya bhagavato santakassa vimuttisukhassa
tika-s0401t:105_3: ariyadhammaratanassa ekantena bhāginoti orasā viya orasā.
tika-s0401t:105_4: Atha vā bhagavato dhammadesanānubhāvena ariyabhūmiṃ okkamamānā okkantā ca ariyasāvakā bhagavato ure vāyāmajanitābhijātitāya
tika-s0401t:105_6: Sāvakehi pavattiyamānāpi hi dhammadesanā “bhagavato dhammadesanā”icceva vuccati taṃmūlakattā lakkhaṇādivisesābhāvato ca.
tika-s0401t:106_0: Yadipi ariyasāvakānaṃ ariyamaggādhigamasamaye bhagavato viya tadantarāyakaraṇatthaṃ devaputtamāro,
tika-s0401t:106_2: tehi pana apasādetabbatāya kāraṇe vimathite tepi vimathitā eva nāma hontīti āha –
tika-s0401t:106_4: Imasmiṃ panatthe “māramārasenamathanāna”nti vattabbe “mārasenamathanāna”nti ekadesasarūpekaseso katoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0401t:106_5: Atha vā khandhābhisaṅkhāramārānaṃ viya devaputtamārassapi guṇamāraṇe sahāyabhāvūpagamanato kilesabalakāyo “senā”ti vuccati. Yathāha –
tika-s0401t:106_8: anantabhedā vā kilesavāhinī satidhammavicayavīriyasamathādiguṇappaharaṇehi odhiso vimathitā vihatā viddhastā cāti mārasenamathanā,
tika-s0401t:107_3: Atha vā sadevakena lokena saraṇanti araṇīyato upagantabbato,
tika-s0401t:107_6: ariyo ca so saṅgho cāti vā ariyasaṅgho,
tika-s0401t:107_8: Bhagavato aparabhāge buddhadhammaratanānampi samadhigamo saṅgharatanādhīnoti assa ariyasaṅghassa bahūpakārataṃ
tika-s0401t:108_0: Ettha ca “sugatassa orasānaṃ puttāna”nti etena ariyasaṅghassa pabhavasampadaṃ dasseti,
tika-s0401t:108_4: Atha vā “sugatassa orasānaṃ puttāna”nti ariyasaṅghassa visuddhanissayabhāvadīpanaṃ,
tika-s0401t:108_8: Tathā “sugatassa orasānaṃ puttāna”nti etena ariyasaṅghassa lokuttarasaraṇagamanasabbhāvaṃ dīpeti.
tika-s0401t:108_9: Lokuttarasaraṇagamanena hi te bhagavato orasaputtā jātā.
tika-s0401t:108_11: Katābhinīhārā hi sammāpaṭipannā māraṃ māraparisaṃ vā abhivijinanti.
tika-s0401t:108_12: “Aṭṭhannampi samūha”nti etena viddhastavipakkhe sekkhāsekkhadhamme dasseti puggalādhiṭṭhānena maggaphaladhammānaṃ pakāsitattā.
tika-s0401t:108_16: asekkhā sīlakkhandhādayo pariyosānanti ādimajjhapariyosānakalyāṇā saṅkhepato sabbe ariyasaṅghaguṇā pakāsitā honti.
tika-s0401t:109_1: Evaṃ gāthāttayena saṅkhepato sakalaguṇasaṃkittanamukhena ratanattayassa paṇāmaṃ katvā idāni taṃnipaccakāraṃ
tika-s0401t:109_5: Tesañhi “itipi so bhagavā”tiādinā yathābhūtaguṇe āvajjentassa amatādhigamahetubhūtaṃ anappakaṃ pītipāmojjaṃ uppajjati. Yathāha –
tika-s0401t:110_2: nevassa tasmiṃ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti,
tika-s0401t:110_5: ujugatamevassa tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ hoti tathāgataṃ ārabbha.
tika-s0401t:114_0: Cittīkatabhāvādayo ca anaññasādhāraṇā buddhādīsu eva labbhantīti.
tika-s0401t:115_2: Vandanā cettha kāyavācācittehi tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ guṇaninnatā,
tika-s0401t:115_8: ratanattayassa ca khettabhāvasampattiyā taṃ puññaṃ atthappakāsanassa upaghātakaupaddavānaṃ vihanane samatthanti dasseti.
tika-s0401t:116_1: Evaṃ ratanattayassa nipaccakārakaraṇe payojanaṃ dassetvā idāni yassā dhammadesanāya atthaṃ saṃvaṇṇetukāmo,
tika-s0401t:116_3: ekakādīni aṅgāni uparūpari vaḍḍhetvā desitehi suttantehi paṭimaṇḍitassa visiṭṭhassāti attho.
tika-s0401t:116_4: Etena “aṅguttaro”ti ayaṃ imassa āgamassa atthānugatā samaññāti dasseti.
tika-s0401t:116_5: Nanu ca ekakādivasena desitāni suttāniyeva āgamo.
tika-s0401t:116_11: Ekakādīhi aṅgehi uparūpari uttaro adhikoti aṅguttaro,
tika-s0401t:116_14: ādikalyāṇādiguṇasampattiyā uttamaṭṭhena taṃtaṃabhipatthitasamiddhihetutāya paṇḍitehi varitabbato varo,
tika-s0401t:116_15: āgamo ca so varo ca seṭṭhaṭṭhenāti āgamavaro,
tika-s0401t:116_17: Aṅguttaro ca so āgamavaro cāti aṅguttarāgamavaro, tassa.
tika-s0401t:117_1: asantasanaparissayasahanassa paripālanādiguṇehi taṃsadisatāya dhammakathikā eva puṅgavāti dhammakathikapuṅgavā, tesaṃ.
tika-s0401t:117_4: Buddhānañhi saccappaṭivedhaṃ anugamma paṭividdhasaccā aggasāvakādayo ariyā buddhānubuddhā.
tika-s0401t:117_5: Ayampi āgamo tehi atthasaṃvaṇṇanāvasena guṇasaṃvaṇṇanāvasena ca saṃvaṇṇito eva.
tika-s0401t:117_6: Atha vā buddhā ca anubuddhā ca buddhānubuddhāti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0401t:117_7: Sammāsambuddheneva hi tiṇṇaṃ piṭakānaṃ atthavaṇṇanākkamo bhāsito,
tika-s0401t:117_12: yā taṃtaṃsaṃvaṇṇanāsu ādito tassa tassa saṃvaṇṇetabbassa dhammassa visesaguṇakittanena thomanā.
tika-s0401t:117_16: tassa gambhīrañāṇehi ogāḷhassa abhiṇhaso nānānayavicittassā”tiādinā thomanā katā.
tika-s0401t:118_6: Chaḷabhiññatāya paramena cittavasībhāvena samannāgatattā jhānādīsu pañcavidhavasitāsabbhāvato ca vasino,
tika-s0401t:118_10: Saṅgītāti atthaṃ pakāsetuṃ yuttaṭṭhāne “ayaṃ etassa attho,
tika-s0401t:119_4: tesaṃ nivāsatāya tambapaṇṇidīpassa ca sīhaḷabhāvo veditabbo.
tika-s0401t:119_7: Aparabhāge hi asaṅkaratthaṃ sīhaḷabhāsāya aṭṭhakathā ṭhapitāti.
tika-s0401t:119_8: Tena sā mūlaṭṭhakathā sabbasādhāraṇā na hotīti idaṃ atthappakāsanaṃ ekantena karaṇīyanti dasseti.
tika-s0401t:119_12: dīpavāsīnanti vā sīhaḷadīpavāsīnaṃ atthāya sīhaḷabhāsāya ṭhapitāti yojanā.
tika-s0401t:120_5: Sā hi sabhāvaniruttibhūtā paṇḍitānaṃ manaṃ ramayatīti.
tika-s0401t:121_3: Aviruddhattā eva hi theravādāpi idha pakāsīyissanti.
tika-s0401t:121_7: Tappariyāpannā hutvā āgamādhigamasampannattā paññāpajjotena tassa samujjalanato theravaṃsadīpā,
tika-s0401t:121_11: Suṭṭhu nipuṇo saṇho vinicchayo etesanti sunipuṇavinicchayā.
tika-s0401t:121_14: Suṭṭhu nipuṇo cheko vinicchayo etesanti sunipuṇavinicchayā.
tika-s0401t:121_16: tatoyeva ca aviparīto saṇhasukhumo mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ vinicchayoti tassa pamāṇabhūtataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0401t:122_5: Tena ca “tambapaṇṇidīpavāsīnampi atthāyā”ti ayamattho siddho hoti uggahaṇādisukaratāya tesampi bahūpakārattā.
tika-s0401t:122_8: Idañhi atthappakāsanaṃ aviparītabyañjanasunikkhepassa atthasunītassa ca upāyabhāvato saddhammassa ciraṭṭhitiyā saṃvattati.
tika-s0401t:123_2: dhammā saddhammassa ṭhitiyā asammosāya anantaradhānāya saṃvattanti.
tika-s0401t:124_7: “Saṅgītīnaṃ dvinnaṃ yā me atthaṃ vadantenā”tipi pāṭho.
tika-s0401t:124_8: Tatthapi saṅgītīnaṃ dvinnanti dīghamajjhimanikāyānanti attho gahetabbo.
tika-s0401t:124_12: Heṭṭhā dīghassa majjhimassa ca atthaṃ vadantena sāvatthipabhutīnaṃ nagarānaṃ yā vaṇṇanā katā,
tika-s0401t:124_13: tassā vitthārakathaṃ na idha bhiyyo karissāmīti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0401t:124_14: Yāni ca tattha vatthūni vitthāravasena vuttāni,
tika-s0401t:124_15: tesampi vitthārakathaṃ na idha bhiyyo karissāmīti sambandho.
tika-s0401t:125_1: Idāni “na idha vitthārakathaṃ karissāmī”ti sāmaññato vuttassa atthassa pavaraṃ dassetuṃ –
tika-s0401t:125_3: Suttānaṃ ye atthā vatthūhi vinā na pakāsantīti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0401t:126_2: tadekadesabhāvena visuddhimaggo ca gahetabboti kathikānaṃ upadesaṃ karonto tattha vicāritadhamme uddesavasena dasseti –
tika-s0401t:126_7: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ dveti niravasesāni yogakammassa bhāvanāya pavattiṭṭhānāni.
tika-s0401t:126_11: Aṭṭhapi vā paṭiladdhamattāni jhānāni samāpajjanavasībhāvappattiyā samāpattiyo.
tika-s0401t:127_2: Ñāṇavibhaṅgādīsu āgatanayena ekavidhādinā paññāya saṃkaletvā sampiṇḍetvā nicchayo paññāsaṅkalananicchayo.
tika-s0401t:129_5: Idhāti imissā aṭṭhakathāya na vicārayissāmi punaruttibhāvatoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0401t:130_1: Idāni tasseva avicāraṇassa ekantakāraṇaṃ niddhārento “majjhe visuddhimaggo”tiādimāha.
tika-s0401t:130_2: Tattha “majjhe ṭhatvā”ti etena majjhabhāvadīpanena visesato catunnaṃ āgamānaṃ sādhāraṇaṭṭhakathā visuddhimaggo,
tika-s0401t:130_4: “Visesato”ti ca idaṃ vinayābhidhammānampi visuddhimaggo yathārahaṃ atthavaṇṇanā hoti evāti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:131_4: Ettha ca “sīhaḷadīpaṃ ābhatā”tiādinā atthappakāsanassa nimittaṃ dasseti,
tika-s0401t:131_5: “dīpavāsīnamatthāya sujanassa ca tuṭṭhatthaṃ ciraṭṭhitatthañca dhammassā”ti etena payojanaṃ,
tika-s0401t:131_9: Heṭṭhimanikāyesu visuddhimagge ca vicāritānaṃ atthānaṃ avicāraṇampi hi idha karaṇappakāro evāti.
tika-s0401t:135_0: Vibhāgavantānaṃ sabhāvavibhāvanaṃ vibhāgadassanavaseneva hotīti paṭhamaṃ tāva nipātasuttavasena vibhāgaṃ
tika-s0401t:135_2: Tattha tatthāti “aṅguttarāgamassa atthaṃ pakāsayissāmī”ti yadidaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0401t:135_5: so aṅguttarāgamo nāma nipātasuttavasena evaṃ vibhāgoti attho.
tika-s0401t:135_6: Atha vā tatthāti “aṅguttaranissitaṃ attha”nti etasmiṃ vacane yo aṅguttarāgamo vutto,
tika-s0401t:136_0: Idāni taṃ ādito paṭṭhāya saṃvaṇṇitukāmo attano saṃvaṇṇanāya paṭhamamahāsaṅgītiyaṃ nikkhittānukkamena pavattabhāvadassanatthaṃ “tassa nipātesu…pe…
tika-s0401t:136_2: Tattha yathāpaccayaṃ tattha tattha desitattā paññattattā ca vippakiṇṇānaṃ dhammavinayānaṃ saṅgahetvā gāyanaṃ kathanaṃ saṅgīti.
tika-s0401t:136_3: Etena taṃtaṃsikkhāpadānaṃ suttānañca ādipariyosānesu antarantarā ca sambandhavasena ṭhapitaṃ saṅgītikāravacanaṃ saṅgahitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0401t:136_4: Saṅgīyamānassa atthassa mahantatāya pūjanīyatāya ca mahatī saṅgīti mahāsaṅgīti,
tika-s0401t:136_8: Nidadāti desanaṃ desakālādivasena aviditaṃ viditaṃ katvā nidassetīti nidānaṃ.
tika-s0401t:136_15: “evaṃ me sutantiādikaṃ āyasmatā ānandena paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikāle vuttaṃ nidānamādī”ti.
tika-s0401t:137_1: “Sā panesā”tiādinā bāhiranidāne vattabbaṃ atidisitvā idāni abbhantaranidānaṃ ādito paṭṭhāya saṃvaṇṇituṃ “yaṃ paneta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:137_2: Tattha yasmā saṃvaṇṇanaṃ karontena saṃvaṇṇetabbe dhamme padāni padavibhāgaṃ tadatthañca dassetvā tato
tika-s0401t:137_7: Atha vā padāni ca padavibhāgo ca padavibhāgo,
tika-s0401t:137_8: padaviggaho ca padavibhāgo ca padavibhāgoti vā ekasesavasena padapadaviggahā padavibhāgasaddena vuttāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0401t:137_9: Tattha padaviggaho “jetassa vanaṃ jetavana”ntiādinā samāsapadesu daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0401t:138_1: Taṃ pana padatthaṃ atthuddhārakkamena paṭhamaṃ evaṃ-
tika-s0401t:138_11: Tathā hi vidhayuttagatasadde lokiyā pakāratthe vadanti.
tika-s0401t:138_12: “Evaṃ su te sunhātā suvilittā kappitakesamassū āmukkamaṇikuṇḍalābharaṇā odātavatthavasanā pañcahi kāmaguṇehi
tika-s0401t:138_13: samappitā samaṅgībhūtā paricārenti seyyathāpi tvaṃ etarahi sācariyakoti. No hidaṃ,
tika-s0401t:139_0: Nanu ca “evaṃ su te sunhātā suvilittā evamāyupariyanto”ti ettha evaṃ-
tika-s0401t:139_1: saddena pucchanākāraparimāṇākārānaṃ vuttattā ākārattho eva evaṃ- saddoti? Na,
tika-s0401t:139_6: Evañca katvā “evaṃ jātena maccenā”tiādīni upamādiudāharaṇāni upapannāni honti.
tika-s0401t:139_9: ādidānādipuññakiriyāhetusamudāyato sobhāsugandhatādiguṇayogato mālāguṇasadisiyo pahūtā puññakiriyā maritabbasabhāvatāya
tika-s0401t:139_10: maccena sattena kattabbāti jotitattā puppharāsimālāguṇāva upamā.
tika-s0401t:139_14: so pana upamākāro niyamiyamāno atthato upamāva hotīti āha –
tika-s0401t:139_16: Tathā “evaṃ iminā ākārena abhikkamitabba”ntiādinā upadisiyamānāya samaṇasāruppāya ākappasampattiyā yo tattha upadisanākāro,
tika-s0401t:139_21: evametaṃ sugatāti ettha bhagavatā yathāvuttamatthaṃ aviparītato jānantehi kataṃ tattha saṃvijjamānaguṇānaṃ
tika-s0401t:140_4: evaṃ upamākārādayopi upamādivasena vuttānaṃ puppharāsiādisaddānaṃ sannidhānatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Evaṃ,
tika-s0401t:140_5: bhanteti khotiādīsu pana dhammassa sādhukaṃ savanamanasikārena niyojitehi bhikkhūhi attano tattha ṭhitabhāvassa paṭijānanavasena vuttattā ettha evaṃ-
tika-s0401t:140_11: evaṃ samaṇaṃ ānandaṃ vadehī”ti vadanākāro idāni vattabbo evaṃ-
tika-s0401t:140_13: Evaṃ noti etthāpi tesaṃ yathāvuttadhammānaṃ ahitadukkhāvahabhāve sanniṭṭhānajananatthaṃ anumatiggahaṇavasena “no vā,
tika-s0401t:140_14: kathaṃ vo ettha hotī”ti pucchāya katāya “evaṃ no ettha hotī”ti vuttattā tadākārasanniṭṭhānaṃ evaṃ-
tika-s0401t:140_16: So pana tesaṃ dhammānaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattanākāro niyamiyamāno avadhāraṇattho hotīti āha –
tika-s0401t:141_4: saṅgahādivasena samayavimuttādivasena padhānādivasena kusalamūlādivasena tikapaṭṭhānādivasena ca nānappakārāti nānānayā,
tika-s0401t:141_7: te ca sassatādibhedena tattha ca apparajakkhatādibhedena ca aneke,
tika-s0401t:141_8: attajjhāsayādayo eva vā samuṭṭhānaṃ uppattihetu etassāti anekajjhāsayasamuṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0401t:141_11: chahi byañjanapadehi ca samannāgatanti vā attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0401t:142_0: Vividhapāṭihāriyanti ettha pāṭihāriyapadassa vacanatthaṃ “paṭipakkhaharaṇato rāgādikilesāpanayanato ca pāṭihāriya”nti vadanti.
tika-s0401t:142_1: Bhagavato pana paṭipakkhā rāgādayo na santi,
tika-s0401t:142_3: Puthujjanānampi vigatūpakkilese aṭṭhaguṇasamannāgate citte hatapaṭipakkhe iddhividhaṃ pavattati,
tika-s0401t:142_4: tasmā tattha pavattavohārena ca na sakkā idha “pāṭihāriya”nti vatthuṃ.
tika-s0401t:142_5: Sace pana mahākāruṇikassa bhagavato veneyyagatā ca kilesā paṭipakkhā,
tika-s0401t:142_8: Atha vā bhagavato ca sāsanassa ca paṭipakkhā titthiyā,
tika-s0401t:142_10: Te hi diṭṭhiharaṇavasena ca diṭṭhippakāsane asamatthabhāvena ca iddhiādesanānusāsanīhi haritā apanītā hontīti.
tika-s0401t:142_11: “Paṭī”ti vā ayaṃ saddo “pacchā”ti etassa atthaṃ bodheti “tasmiṃ paṭipaviṭṭhamhi,
tika-s0401t:142_13: tasmā samāhite citte vigatūpakkilese katakiccena pacchā haritabbaṃ pavattetabbanti paṭihāriyaṃ,
tika-s0401t:142_14: attano vā upakkilesesu catutthajjhānamaggehi haritesu pacchā haraṇaṃ paṭihāriyaṃ,
tika-s0401t:142_15: iddhiādesanānusāsaniyo ca vigatūpakkilesena katakiccena ca sattahitatthaṃ puna pavattetabbā,
tika-s0401t:142_16: haritesu ca attano upakkilesesu parasattānaṃ upakkilesaharaṇāni hontīti paṭihāriyāni bhavanti.
tika-s0401t:142_18: paṭihāriye vā iddhiādesanānusāsanisamudāye bhavaṃ ekamekaṃ pāṭihāriyanti vuccati.
tika-s0401t:142_19: Paṭihāriyaṃ vā catutthajjhānaṃ maggo ca paṭipakkhaharaṇato,
tika-s0401t:142_23: Tassa pana iddhiādibhedena visayabhedena ca bahuvidhassa bhagavato desanāyaṃ labbhamānattā āha –
tika-s0401t:143_0: Na aññathāti bhagavato sammukhā sutākārato na aññathāti attho,
tika-s0401t:143_3: Evañca katvā “sabbappakārena ko samattho viññātu”nti idaṃ vacanaṃ samatthitaṃ bhavati,
tika-s0401t:143_5: Na hettha atthantaratāparihāro dvinnaṃ atthānaṃ ekavisayattā,
tika-s0401t:143_6: itarathā thero bhagavato desanāya sabbathā paṭiggahaṇe samattho asamattho cāti āpajjeyyāti.
tika-s0401t:144_1: so attā”ti evaṃ vuttāya niyakajjhattasaṅkhātāya sasantatiyaṃ vattanato tividhopi me-
tika-s0401t:145_2: saddo eva taṃ tamatthaṃ vadatīti anupasaggassa suta-
tika-s0401t:145_3: saddassa atthuddhāre saupasaggassa gahaṇaṃ na virujjhatīti dassento “saupasaggo ca anupasaggo cā”ti āha.
tika-s0401t:145_10: Mamāti atthe satīti yadā sambandhavasena sāminiddeso, tadā.
tika-s0401t:146_3: saddena sampaṭicchanādīnaṃ sotadvārikaviññāṇānaṃ tadabhinīhaṭānañca manodvārikaviññāṇānaṃ gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0401t:146_4: Sabbesampi vākyānaṃ evakāratthasahitattā “suta”nti etassa sutamevāti ayamattho labbhatīti āha –
tika-s0401t:146_10: Atha vā saddantaratthāpohanavasena saddo atthaṃ vadatīti sutanti assutaṃ na hotīti ayametassa atthoti vuttaṃ –
tika-s0401t:147_0: Evaṃ savanahetusavanavisesavasena padattayassa ekena pakārena atthayojanaṃ dassetvā idāni pakārantarehi taṃ dassetuṃ –
tika-s0401t:147_2: Tattha tassāti yā sā bhagavato sammukhā dhammassavanākārena pavattā manodvāraviññāṇavīthi, tassā.
tika-s0401t:147_3: Sā hi nānappakārena ārammaṇe pavattituṃ samatthā.
tika-s0401t:147_10: Sutanti dhammappakāsananti yasmiṃ ārammaṇe vuttappakārā viññāṇavīthi nānappakārena pavattā,
tika-s0401t:148_4: Sutasaddassa kiriyāsaddattā savanakiriyāya ca sādhāraṇaviññāṇappabandhappaṭibaddhattā tattha ca puggalavohāroti vuttaṃ –
tika-s0401t:148_6: Na hi puggalavohārarahite dhammappabandhe savanakiriyā labbhatīti.
tika-s0401t:149_1: saddaṃ gahetvā purimayojanāya aññathā atthayojanaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:149_2: Tattha ākārapaññattīti upādāpaññatti eva dhammānaṃ pavattiākārupādānavasena tathā vuttā.
tika-s0401t:149_3: Sutanti visayaniddesoti sotabbabhūto dhammo savanakiriyākattupuggalassa savanakiriyāvasena pavattiṭṭhānanti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:149_4: Cittasantānavinimuttassa paramatthato kassaci kattuabhāvepi saddavohārena buddhiparikappitabhedavacanicchāya
tika-s0401t:149_5: cittasantānato aññaṃ viya taṃsamaṅgiṃ katvā vuttaṃ –
tika-s0401t:149_7: Savanakiriyāvisayopi sotabbadhammo savanakiriyāvasena pavattacittasantānassa idha paramatthato kattubhāvato,
tika-s0401t:149_8: savanavasena cittapavattiyā eva vā savanakiriyābhāvato taṃkiriyākattu ca visayo hotīti katvā vuttaṃ –
tika-s0401t:150_0: Pubbe sutānaṃ nānāvihitānaṃ suttasaṅkhātānaṃ atthabyañjanānaṃ upadhāritarūpassa ākārassa nidassanassa,
tika-s0401t:150_4: Savanakiriyā pana puggalavādinopi viññāṇanirapekkhā natthīti visesato viññāṇabyāpāroti āha –
tika-s0401t:150_6: Meti saddappavattiyā ekanteneva sattavisayattā viññāṇakiccassa ca tattheva samodahitabbato “meti ubhayakiccayuttapuggalaniddeso”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:150_7: Avijjamānapaññattivijjamānapaññattisabhāvā yathākkamaṃ evaṃsaddasutasaddānaṃ atthāti te tathārūpapaññattiupādānabyāpārabhāvena dassento āha –
tika-s0401t:151_0: Sabbassapi saddādhigamanīyassa atthassa paññattimukheneva paṭipajjitabbattā sabbapaññattīnañca vijjamānādivasena
tika-s0401t:151_1: chasu paññattibhedesu antogadhattā tesu “eva”ntiādīnaṃ paññattīnaṃ sarūpaṃ niddhārento āha –
tika-s0401t:151_3: Tattha evanti ca meti ca vuccamānassatthassa ākārādino dhammānaṃ asallakkhaṇabhāvato avijjamānapaññattibhāvoti āha –
tika-s0401t:151_8: anussavādīhi gahetabbo viya anuttamattho ca na hoti,
tika-s0401t:151_10: ruppanānubhavanādisabhāvo vā attho saccikaṭṭho paramattho cāti vuccati,
tika-s0401t:151_15: Teneva hi “yañhi taṃ ettha sotena upaladdha”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:151_16: “Sotadvārānusārena upaladdha”nti pana vutte atthabyañjanādi sabbaṃ labbhati.
tika-s0401t:151_17: Taṃ taṃ upādāya vattabbatoti sotapathamāgate dhamme upādāya tesaṃ upadhāritākārādino paccāmasanavasena evanti,
tika-s0401t:151_18: sasantatipariyāpanne khandhe upādāya meti vattabbattāti attho.
tika-s0401t:151_19: Diṭṭhādisabhāvarahite saddāyatane pavattamānopi sutavohāro “dutiyaṃ tatiya”ntiādiko viya paṭhamādīni diṭṭhamutaviññāte apekkhitvā pavattoti āha –
tika-s0401t:151_21: Assutaṃ na hotīti hi sutanti pakāsito ayamatthoti.
tika-s0401t:152_0: Attanā paṭividdhā suttassa pakāravisesā evanti therena paccāmaṭṭhāti āha –
tika-s0401t:152_2: Nānappakārappaṭivedhasamattho hotīti etena vakkhamānassa suttassa nānappakārataṃ duppaṭivijjhatañca dasseti.
tika-s0401t:152_3: Sutassa asammosaṃ dīpetīti sutākārassa yāthāvato dassiyamānattā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:152_8: yathāsutadhāraṇameva tattha karaṇīyanti satiyā byāpāro adhiko,
tika-s0401t:152_12: pubbaṅgamatāya vā cakkhuviññāṇādīsu āvajjanādīnaṃ viya appadhānatte paññā pubbaṅgamā etissāti ayampi attho yujjati,
tika-s0401t:152_13: evaṃ satipubbaṅgamāyāti etthāpi vuttanayānusārena yathāsambhavamattho veditabbo.
tika-s0401t:152_16: chahi byañjanapadehi ca samannāgatassāti vā attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0401t:153_2: Avikkhepaṃ dīpetīti “cittapariyādānaṃ kattha bhāsita”ntiādipucchāvase pakaraṇappattassa vakkhamānassa
tika-s0401t:153_3: suttassa savanaṃ samādhānamantarena na sambhavatīti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:153_7: saddhammassavanena viya ca avikkhepassa yathā yonisomanasikārena phalabhūtena attasammāpaṇidhipubbekatapuññatānaṃ siddhi vuttā tadavinābhāvato.
tika-s0401t:153_8: Evaṃ avikkhepena phalabhūtena kāraṇabhūtānaṃ saddhammassavanasappurisūpanissayānaṃ siddhi dassetabbā
tika-s0401t:153_10: Na hi vikkhittacittotiādinā samatthanavacanena pana avikkhepena kāraṇabhūtena sappurisūpanissayena ca
tika-s0401t:153_13: saddhammassavanasappurisūpanissayā na ekantena avikkhepassa kāraṇaṃ bāhiraṅgattā,
tika-s0401t:153_14: avikkhepo pana sappurisūpanissayo viya saddhammassavanassa ekantakāraṇanti.
tika-s0401t:153_16: No na samatthitā vikkhittacittānaṃ sappurisapayirupāsanābhāvassa atthasiddhattā.
tika-s0401t:153_17: Ettha ca purimaṃ phalena kāraṇassa siddhidassanaṃ nadīpūrena viya upari vuṭṭhisabbhāvassa,
tika-s0401t:153_18: dutiyaṃ kāraṇena phalassa siddhidassanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ ekantavassinā viya meghavuṭṭhānena vuṭṭhippavattiyā.
tika-s0401t:154_0: Bhagavato vacanassa atthabyañjanappabhedaparicchedavasena sakalasāsanasampattiogāhanākāro niravasesaparahitapāripūritākāraṇanti vuttaṃ –
tika-s0401t:154_12: Sammāpaṇihitatto pubbe ca katapuñño suddhāsayo hoti tadasiddhihetūnaṃ kilesānaṃ dūrībhāvatoti āha –
tika-s0401t:154_26: Parisuddhakāyavacīpayogo hi vippaṭisārābhāvato avikkhittacitto pariyattiyaṃ visārado hotīti.
tika-s0401t:155_6: vakkhamānāpekkhāya vā sāmaññeneva sotabbadhammavisesaṃ āmasatīti dasseti.
tika-s0401t:155_7: Manodiṭṭhikaraṇānaṃ pariyattidhammānaṃ anupekkhanasuppaṭivedhā visesato manasikārappaṭibaddhāti te vuttanayena yonisomanasikāradīpakena evaṃ-
tika-s0401t:155_9: savanadhāraṇavacīparicayā pariyattidhammā visesena sotāvadhānappaṭibaddhāti te avikkhepadīpakena suta-
tika-s0401t:155_10: saddena yojetvā dassento sāsanasampattiyā dhammassavane ussāhaṃ janeti.
tika-s0401t:155_15: ettakā ettha anusandhayo”tiādinā nayena manasā anu anu pekkhitā.
tika-s0401t:155_17: ñātapariññāsaṅkhātāya vā diṭṭhiyā tattha tattha vuttarūpārūpadhamme “iti rūpaṃ,
tika-s0401t:156_0: Sakalena vacanenāti pubbe tīhi padehi visuṃ visuṃ yojitattā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:156_2: “idhekacco pāpabhikkhu tathāgatappaveditaṃ dhammavinayaṃ pariyāpuṇitvā attano dahatī”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ anariyavohārāvatthaṃ.
tika-s0401t:156_7: “evaṃ me suta”nti vadantena ayampi attho vibhāvitoti dassanato.
tika-s0401t:156_8: Keci pana “devatānaṃ parivitakkāpekkhaṃ tathāvacananti edisī codanā anavakāsā”ti vadanti.
tika-s0401t:156_9: Tasmiṃ kira khaṇe ekaccānaṃ devatānaṃ evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi “bhagavā parinibbuto,
tika-s0401t:156_10: ayañca āyasmā desanākusalo idāni dhammaṃ deseti,
tika-s0401t:156_12: kiṃ nu kho sayaṃ sacchikataṃ dhammaṃ deseti,
tika-s0401t:157_2: Assaddhiyaṃ vināseti bhagavatā bhāsitattā sammukhā cassa paṭiggahitattā khalitaduruttādiggahaṇadosābhāvato ca.
tika-s0401t:157_3: Ettha ca pañcamādayo tisso atthayojanā ākārādiatthesu aggahitavisesameva evaṃ-
tika-s0401t:157_7: pacchimā pana tisso yathākkamaṃ ākāratthaṃ nidassanatthaṃ avadhāraṇatthañca evaṃ-
tika-s0401t:158_2: Tathā hesa “sassato attā ca loko ca,
tika-s0401t:158_3: idameva saccaṃ moghamaññanti ittheke abhivadantī”tiādīsu aññatthe dissati,
tika-s0401t:158_7: khaṇo ca samayo ca brahmacariyavāsāyā”tiādīsu saṅkhāyaṃ.
tika-s0401t:158_14: Yo khaṇoti ca samayoti ca vuccati,
tika-s0401t:158_19: Tattha hi nisinnā titthiyā attano attano samayaṃ pavadantīti.
tika-s0401t:158_22: abhisamayo attho abhisamayaṭṭhoti pīḷanādīni abhisametabbabhāvena ekībhāvaṃ upanetvā vuttāni.
tika-s0401t:158_23: Abhisamayassa vā paṭivedhassa visayabhūto attho abhisamayaṭṭhoti tāneva tathā ekattena vuttāni.
tika-s0401t:158_24: Tattha pīḷanaṃ dukkhasaccassa taṃsamaṅgino hiṃsanaṃ avipphārikatākaraṇaṃ.
tika-s0401t:159_0: Tattha sahakārikāraṇe sanijjhaṃ sameti samavetīti samayo, samavāyo.
tika-s0401t:159_1: Sameti samāgacchati ettha maggabrahmacariyaṃ tadādhārapuggalehīti samayo, khaṇo.
tika-s0401t:159_6: Dhammappavattimattatāya atthato abhūtopi hi kālo dhammappavattiyā adhikaraṇaṃ karaṇaṃ viya ca kappanāmattasiddhena rūpena voharīyatīti. Samaṃ,
tika-s0401t:159_7: saha vā avayavānaṃ ayanaṃ pavatti avaṭṭhānanti samayo,
tika-s0401t:159_10: Avasesapaccayānaṃ samāgame eti phalaṃ etasmā uppajjati pavattati cāti samayo,
tika-s0401t:159_12: Sameti saṃyojanabhāvato sambaddho eti attano visaye pavattati,
tika-s0401t:159_13: daḷhaggahaṇabhāvato vā saṃyuttā ayanti pavattanti sattā yathābhinivesaṃ etenāti samayo, diṭṭhi.
tika-s0401t:159_18: sammā vā yānaṃ apagamoti samayo, pahānaṃ.
tika-s0401t:159_19: Abhimukhaṃ ñāṇena sammā etabbo abhisametabboti abhisamayo,
tika-s0401t:159_21: Abhimukhabhāvena sammā eti gacchati bujjhatīti abhisamayo,
tika-s0401t:159_23: Evaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ atthe samayasaddassa pavatti veditabbā.
tika-s0401t:159_24: Samayasaddassa atthuddhāre abhisamayasaddassa udāharaṇaṃ vuttanayena veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0401t:159_26: Kālo attho samavāyādīnaṃ atthānaṃ idha asambhavato,
tika-s0401t:159_27: desadesakaparisānaṃ viya suttassa nidānabhāvena kālassa apadisitabbato ca.
tika-s0401t:160_3: Utusaṃvaccharādivasena niyamaṃ akatvā samayasaddassa vacane ayampi guṇo laddho hotīti dassento “ye vā ime”tiādimāha.
tika-s0401t:160_8: Yathāvuttabhedesu eva samayesu ekadesaṃ pakārantarehi saṅgahetvā dassetuṃ “yo cāya”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0401t:160_9: Tathā hi ñāṇakiccasamayo attahitappaṭipattisamayo ca abhisambodhisamayo,
tika-s0401t:161_6: Tattha yathā kālo sabhāvadhammaparicchinno sayaṃ paramatthato avijjamānopi ādhārabhāvena paññāto taṅkhaṇappavattānaṃ
tika-s0401t:161_7: tato pubbe parato ca abhāvato “pubbaṇhe jāto,
tika-s0401t:161_9: samūho ca avayavavinimutto avijjamānopi kappanāmattasiddho avayavānaṃ ādhārabhāvena paññāpīyati “rukkhe sākhā,
tika-s0401t:161_15: dhammapuñje vā kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti,
tika-s0401t:161_17: dhammapuñje ca phassādayopi hontīti ayañhi tattha attho.
tika-s0401t:161_21: tasmiṃ samaye”ti ca vutte “satī”ti ayamattho viññāyamāno eva hoti padatthassa sattāvirahābhāvatoti samayassa sattākiriyāya cittassa uppādakiriyā,
tika-s0401t:161_25: paccayasamavāye vā sati kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti,
tika-s0401t:161_26: tasmiṃyeva khaṇe hetumhi paccayasamavāye ca phassādayopi hontīti ubhayattha samayasadde bhummaniddeso kato lakkhaṇabhūtabhāvayuttoti dassento āha –
tika-s0401t:162_4: Vītikkamañhi sutvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sannipātāpetvā otiṇṇe vatthusmiṃ taṃ puggalaṃ paṭipucchitvā vigarahitvā
tika-s0401t:162_5: ca taṃ taṃ vatthuṃ otiṇṇakālaṃ anatikkamitvā teneva kālena sikkhāpadāni paññāpento bhagavā viharati sikkhāpadapaññattihetuñca
tika-s0401t:163_0: Accantameva ārambhato paṭṭhāya yāva desanāniṭṭhānaṃ parahitappaṭipattisaṅkhātena karuṇāvihārena.
tika-s0401t:164_14: tasmā garūti vatvā gāravayuttoti vuttanti keci.
tika-s0401t:164_16: na idha vattabbo visuddhimaggassa imissā aṭṭhakathāya ekadesabhāvatoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0401t:165_1: mayā dhammo ca vinayo ca desito paññatto,
tika-s0401t:165_2: so vo mamaccayena satthā”ti vacanato dhammassa satthubhāvapariyāyo vijjatīti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:165_4: Na hi bhagavato rūpakāye kenaci sakkā antarāyo kātunti.
tika-s0401t:165_5: Desanāsampattiṃ niddisati vakkhamānassa sakalasuttassa evanti niddisanato.
tika-s0401t:165_6: Sāvakasampattiṃ niddisati paṭisambhidāpattena pañcasu ṭhānesu bhagavatā etadagge ṭhapitena mayā mahāsāvakena sutaṃ,
tika-s0401t:165_10: Kālasampattiṃ niddisati “bhagavā”ti padassa sannidhāne payuttassa samayasaddassa kālassa buddhuppādappaṭimaṇḍitabhāvadīpanato.
tika-s0401t:169_0: Evaṃnāmake nagareti kathaṃ panetaṃ nagaraṃ evaṃnāmakaṃ jātanti? Vuccate,
tika-s0401t:169_1: yathā kākandassa isino nivāsaṭṭhāne māpitā nagarī kākandī,
tika-s0401t:169_4: evaṃ savatthassa isino nivāsaṭṭhāne māpitā nagarī sāvatthīti vuccati.
tika-s0401t:169_9: Satthasamāyoge ca ‘kiṃ bhaṇḍamatthī’ti pucchite ‘sabbamatthī’ti vacanamupādāya sāvatthi.
tika-s0401t:176_3: vihāresūti iriyāpathavihāro dibbavihāro brahmavihāro ariyavihāroti etesu catūsu vihāresu.
tika-s0401t:176_6: Tathā hi taṃ “idhekacco gihisaṃsaṭṭho viharati sahanandī sahasokī”tiādīsu iriyāpathavihāre āgataṃ,
tika-s0401t:176_11: “so mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharatī”tiādīsu brahmavihāre,
tika-s0401t:176_14: tassāyeva kathāya pariyosāne tasmiṃyeva purimasmiṃ samādhinimitte ajjhattameva cittaṃ saṇṭhapemi sannisādemi ekodiṃ karomi,
tika-s0401t:177_3: Ṭhānasamaṅgī vā hi kāyena kiñci kareyya gamanādīsu aññatarasamaṅgī vā.
tika-s0401t:177_4: Atha vā iriyati pavattati etena attabhāvo,
tika-s0401t:177_8: So ca atthato gatinivattiādiākārena pavatto catusantatirūpappabandho eva.
tika-s0401t:177_16: dibbo ca so vihāro cāti dibbavihāro,
tika-s0401t:177_24: So hi ekaṃ iriyāpathabādhanantiādi yadipi bhagavā ekenapi iriyāpathena cirataraṃ kālaṃ attabhāvaṃ pavattetuṃ sakkoti,
tika-s0401t:177_25: tathāpi upādinnakasarīrassa ayaṃ sabhāvoti dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:177_26: Yasmā vā bhagavā yattha katthaci vasanto veneyyānaṃ dhammaṃ desento nānāsamāpattīhi ca kālaṃ vītināmento
tika-s0401t:177_27: vasatīti sattānaṃ attano ca vividhahitasukhaṃ harati upaneti uppādeti,
tika-s0401t:177_28: tasmā vividhaṃ haratīti viharatīti evamettha attho veditabbo.
tika-s0401t:178_0: Jetassa rājakumārassāti ettha attano paccatthikajanaṃ jinātīti jeto.
tika-s0401t:178_2: Atha vā raññā pasenadikosalena attano paccatthikajane jite jātoti jeto.
tika-s0401t:178_3: Rañño hi jayaṃ āropetvā kumāro jitavāti jetoti vutto.
tika-s0401t:178_4: Maṅgalakāmatāya vā tassa evaṃnāmameva katanti jeto.
tika-s0401t:178_5: Maṅgalakāmatāya hi jeyyoti etasmiṃ atthe jetoti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:178_6: Vitthāro panātiādinā “anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme”ti ettha sudatto nāma so, gahapati,
tika-s0401t:178_8: sabbakāmasamiddhatāya pana vigatamaccheratāya karuṇādiguṇasamaṅgitāya ca niccakālaṃ anāthānaṃ piṇḍamadāsi.
tika-s0401t:178_12: tassa pupphaphalādisobhāya nātidūranaccāsannatādipañcavidhasenāsanaṅgasampattiyā ca tato tato āgamma ramanti abhiramanti,
tika-s0401t:178_14: Vuttappakārāya vā sampattiyā tattha tattha gatepi attano abbhantaraṃyeva ānetvā rametīti ārāmo.
tika-s0401t:178_15: So hi anāthapiṇḍikena gahapatinā jetassa rājakumārassa hatthato aṭṭhārasahiraññakoṭīhi santhārena kiṇitvā
tika-s0401t:178_16: aṭṭhārasahiraññakoṭīhi senāsanāni kārāpetvā aṭṭhārasahiraññakoṭīhi vihāramahaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā evaṃ catupaññāsahiraññakoṭipariccāgena
tika-s0401t:179_0: Tatthāti “ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme”ti yaṃ vuttaṃ vākyaṃ, tattha.
tika-s0401t:179_3: Atha tattha viharatīti yadi jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme viharati.
tika-s0401t:179_6: Idāni codako tameva attano adhippāyaṃ “na hi sakkā”tiādinā vivarati.
tika-s0401t:179_7: Itaro sabbametaṃ aviparītaṃ atthaṃ ajānantena tayā vuttanti dassento “na kho panetaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabba”ntiādimāha.
tika-s0401t:179_8: Tattha etanti “sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme”ti etaṃ vacanaṃ.
tika-s0401t:179_9: Evanti “yadi tāva bhagavā”tiādinā yaṃ taṃ bhavatā coditaṃ,
tika-s0401t:179_10: taṃ atthato evaṃ na kho pana daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-s0401t:179_11: na ubhayattha apubbaṃ acarimaṃ vihāradassanatthanti attho.
tika-s0401t:180_1: Tathā hi taṃ yathā jetavanādikittanaṃ pabbajitānuggahakaraṇādianekappayojanaṃ,
tika-s0401t:180_3: Tattha paccayaggahaṇena upasaṅkamapayirupāsanānaṃ okāsadānena dhammadesanāya saraṇesu sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāpanena
tika-s0401t:180_5: uggahaparipucchānaṃ kammaṭṭhānānuyogassa ca anurūpavasanaṭṭhānapariggahenettha pabbajitānuggahakaraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0401t:180_24: Bhagavā hi sabbasatte paramāya anukampāya anukampati,
tika-s0401t:180_26: Upekkhako ca na parahitasukhakaraṇe appossukko mahākāruṇikabhāvato.
tika-s0401t:181_0: Tathā hesa bodhisattabhūto mahākaruṇāya sañcoditamānaso sakalalokahitāya ussukkamāpanno mahābhinīhārato
tika-s0401t:181_1: paṭṭhāya tadatthanipphādanatthaṃ puññañāṇasambhāre sampādento aparimitaṃ kālaṃ anappakaṃ dukkhamanubhosi,
tika-s0401t:181_2: upekkhakatāya sammā patitehi dukkhehi na vikampitatā.
tika-s0401t:181_11: Tenassa attahitāya paṭipannādīsu catutthapuggalabhāvo siddho hoti.
tika-s0401t:181_12: Tathā mahākāruṇikatāya saccādhiṭṭhānassa ca cāgādhiṭṭhānassa ca pāripūrī,
tika-s0401t:181_13: upekkhakatāya upasamādhiṭṭhānassa ca paññādhiṭṭhānassa ca pāripūrī.
tika-s0401t:181_14: Evaṃ purisuddhāsayappayogassa mahākāruṇikatāya lokahitatthameva rajjasampadādibhavasampattiyā upagamanaṃ,
tika-s0401t:181_16: Iti suvisuddhaupagamāpagamassa mahākāruṇikatāya lokahitatthameva dānavasena sampattīnaṃ pariccajanā,
tika-s0401t:181_18: Evaṃ samudāgamanato paṭṭhāya acchariyabbhutaguṇasamannāgatassa mahākāruṇikatāya paresaṃ hitasukhatthaṃ atidukkarakāritā,
tika-s0401t:182_1: upekkhakatāya uḷāresu devabhogasadisesu bhogesu nirapekkho mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhami.
tika-s0401t:182_2: Tathā mahākāruṇikatāya “kicchaṃ vatāyaṃ loko āpanno”tiādinā karuṇāmukheneva vipassanārambho,
tika-s0401t:182_3: upekkhakatāya buddhabhūtassa satta sattāhāni vivekasukheneva vītināmanaṃ.
tika-s0401t:182_4: Mahākāruṇikatāya dhammagambhīrataṃ paccavekkhitvā dhammadesanāya appossukkanaṃ āpajjitvāpi mahābrahmuno ajjhesanāpadesena okāsakaraṇaṃ,
tika-s0401t:182_12: Mahākāruṇikatāya dhammaṃ desetuṃ parehi saṃsaggamupagacchatopi upekkhakatāya na tattha abhirati.
tika-s0401t:182_13: Mahākāruṇikatāya gāmādīnaṃ āsannaṭṭhāne vasatopi upekkhakatāya araññaṭṭhāne eva viharaṇaṃ.
tika-s0401t:183_5: tasmā idha kālassa desassa vā paṭiniddeso bhavitumarahati,
tika-s0401t:183_13: Tena tatrāti yatra bhagavā dhammadesanatthaṃ bhikkhū ālapati bhāsati,
tika-s0401t:183_17: Nanu ca yattha ṭhito bhagavā “akālo kho tāvā”tiādinā bāhiyassa dhammadesanaṃ paṭikkhipi,
tika-s0401t:183_18: tattheva antaravīthiyaṃ ṭhito tassa dhammaṃ desesīti?
tika-s0401t:184_2: tampi tassa akālabhāvasseva pariyāyena dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:184_3: Tassa hi tadā addhānaparissamena rūpakāye akammaññatā ahosi,
tika-s0401t:184_5: Tadubhayassa vūpasamaṃ āgamento papañcaparihāratthaṃ bhagavā “akālo kho”ti pariyāyena paṭikkhipi.
tika-s0401t:184_6: Adesetabbadese adesanāya pana udāharaṇaṃ “atha kho bhagavā maggā okkamma aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle nisīdi,
tika-s0401t:184_7: vihārapacchāyāyaṃ paññatte āsane nisīdī”ti ca evamādikaṃ idha ādisaddena saṅgahitaṃ.
tika-s0401t:184_10: bālo idha pubbe nesādo idha pāpāni kammāni karitvā”tiādīsu padapūraṇamatte kho- saddo,
tika-s0401t:184_13: satthu pavivittassa viharato sāvakā vivekaṃ nānusikkhantī”tiādīsu ādikālatthe,
tika-s0401t:184_18: tasmā āmantesi evāti āmantane niyamo dassito hoti.
tika-s0401t:185_3: taṃ panassa yathāvutte ṭhāne viharaṇakiriyāya kattu visesadassanatthaṃ kataṃ,
tika-s0401t:185_6: tasmā tadatthaṃ puna “bhagavā”ti pāḷiyaṃ vuttanti tassatthaṃ dassetuṃ “bhagavāti lokagarudīpana”nti āha.
tika-s0401t:185_7: Tena lokagarubhāvato tadanurūpaṃ paṭipattiṃ patthento attano santikaṃ upagatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ dhammaṃ desetuṃ te āmantesīti dasseti.
tika-s0401t:185_9: Catūsupi parisāsu bhikkhū eva edisānaṃ desanānaṃ visesena bhājanabhūtāti sātisayaṃ sāsanasampaṭiggāhakabhāvadassanatthaṃ
tika-s0401t:185_10: idha bhikkhuggahaṇanti dassetvā idāni saddatthaṃ dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0401t:185_11: Tattha bhikkhakoti bhikkhūti bhikkhanadhammatāya bhikkhūti attho.
tika-s0401t:185_15: Yo hi appaṃ vā mahantaṃ vā bhogakkhandhaṃ pahāya agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito,
tika-s0401t:185_16: so kasigorakkhādijīvikākappanaṃ hitvā liṅgasampaṭicchaneneva bhikkhācariyaṃ ajjhupagatattā bhikkhu,
tika-s0401t:185_17: parappaṭibaddhajīvikattā vā vihāramajjhe kājabhattaṃ bhuñjamānopi bhikkhācariyaṃ ajjhupagatoti bhikkhu,
tika-s0401t:185_18: piṇḍiyālopabhojanaṃ nissāya pabbajjāya ussāhajātattā vā bhikkhācariyaṃ ajjhupagatoti bhikkhūti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0401t:185_21: bhinnattā pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ bhikkhū”tiādinā vibhaṅge āgatanayena.
tika-s0401t:186_2: Bhikkhanadhammatāti “uddissa ariyā tiṭṭhantī”ti evaṃ vuttā bhikkhanasabhāvatā,
tika-s0401t:186_4: Bhikkhane sādhukāritāti “uttiṭṭhe nappamajjeyyā”ti vacanaṃ anussaritvā tattha appamajjanā.
tika-s0401t:186_9: Hīnādhikajanasevitanti ye bhikkhubhāve ṭhitāpi jātimadādivasena uddhatā unnaḷā,
tika-s0401t:186_10: ye ca gihibhāve paresaṃ adhikabhāvampi anupagatattā bhikkhācariyaṃ paramakāruññataṃ maññanti,
tika-s0401t:186_11: tesaṃ ubhayesampi yathākkamaṃ “bhikkhavo”ti vacanena hīnajanehi daliddehi paramakāruññataṃ pattehi parakulesu
tika-s0401t:186_12: bhikkhācariyāya jīvikaṃ kappentehi sevitaṃ vuttiṃ pakāsento uddhatabhāvaniggahaṃ karoti.
tika-s0401t:186_13: Adhikajanehi uḷārabhogakhattiyakulādito pabbajitehi buddhādīhi ājīvavisodhanatthaṃ sevitaṃ vuttiṃ pakāsento dīnabhāvaniggahaṃ karotīti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0401t:186_15: pakaraṇato sāmatthiyato ca sussusājananaṃ sakkaccasavanamanasikāraniyojanañca hoti,
tika-s0401t:186_17: Tattha sādhukaṃ savanamanasikāreti sādhukasavane sādhukamanasikāre ca.
tika-s0401t:186_18: Kathaṃ pana pavattitā savanādayo sādhukaṃ pavattitā hontīti?
tika-s0401t:186_19: “Addhā imāya sammāpaṭipattiyā sakalasāsanasampatti hatthagatā bhavissatī”ti ādaragāravayogena kathādīsu aparibhavādinā ca.
tika-s0401t:186_22: dhammehi samannāgato suṇanto saddhammaṃ bhabbo niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ kusalesu dhammesu sammattaṃ.
tika-s0401t:186_31: pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato suṇanto saddhammaṃ bhabbo niyāmaṃ okkamituṃ kusalesu dhammesu sammatta”nti.
tika-s0401t:187_0: Pubbe sabbaparisāsādhāraṇattepi bhagavato dhammadesanāya “jeṭṭhaseṭṭhā”tiādinā bhikkhūnaṃ eva āmantane
tika-s0401t:187_1: kāraṇaṃ dassetvā idāni bhikkhū āmantetvāva dhammadesanāya payojanaṃ dassetuṃ “kimatthaṃ pana bhagavā”ti
tika-s0401t:187_5: Dhammaṃ paccavekkhantāti hiyyo tato paraṃ divasesu vā sutadhammaṃ pati pati manasā avekkhantā.
tika-s0401t:187_6: Bhikkhū āmantetvā dhamme desiyamāne ādito paṭṭhāya desanaṃ sallakkhetuṃ sakkontīti imamatthaṃ byatirekamukhena dassetuṃ “te anāmantetvā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:188_14: “Iti vā iti evarūpā naccagītavāditavisūkadassanā paṭivirato”tiādīsu ādiatthe.
tika-s0401t:188_15: “Māgaṇḍiyoti tassa brāhmaṇassa saṅkhā samaññā paññatti vohāro nāmaṃ nāmakammaṃ nāmadheyyaṃ nirutti byañjanamabhilāpo”tiādīsu padatthavipariyāye. “Iti kho,
tika-s0401t:188_37: Pubbe “bhagavā āmantesī”ti vuttattā “bhagavato paccassosu”nti idha “bhagavato”ti sāmivacanaṃ āmantanameva
tika-s0401t:188_38: sambandhiantaraṃ apekkhatīti iminā adhippāyena “bhagavato āmantanaṃ paṭiassosu”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:188_39: “Bhagavato”ti pana idaṃ paṭissavasambandhena sampadānavacanaṃ yathā “devadattāya paṭissuṇotī”ti.
tika-s0401t:188_41: Imassa suttassa sukhāvagāhaṇatthanti kamalakuvalayujjalavimalasādurasasalilāya pokkharaṇiyā sukhāvataraṇatthaṃ
tika-s0401t:188_43: titthaṃ viya suvibhattabhittivicitravedikāparikkhittassa nakkhattapathaṃ phusitukāmatāya viya paṭivijambhitasamussayassa
tika-s0401t:188_47: mahādvāraṃ viya ca atthabyañjanasampannassa buddhānaṃ desanāñāṇagambhīrabhāvasaṃsūcakassa imassa suttassa
tika-s0401t:189_2: nanu bhagavatā bhāsitavacanasseva saṅgaho kātabbo”ti? Vuccate,
tika-s0401t:189_4: Kāladesadesakanimittaparisāpadesehi upanibandhitvā ṭhapitā hi desanā ciraṭṭhitikā hoti asammosadhammā saddheyyā ca.
tika-s0401t:189_8: kattha bhāsita”ntiādinā desādipucchāsu katāsu tāsaṃ vissajjanaṃ karontena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena “evaṃ
tika-s0401t:189_9: me suta”ntiādinā imassa suttassa nidānaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
tika-s0401t:189_12: Na hi sammāsambussa pubbacaraṇādīhi attho atthi sabbattha appaṭihatañāṇacāratāya ekappamāṇattā ca ñeyyadhammesu.
tika-s0401t:189_14: Na hi sabbaso khīṇāsavassa te sambhavantīti suvisuddhassa parānuggahappavatti.
tika-s0401t:189_15: Evaṃ desakasaṃkilesabhūtānaṃ diṭṭhisīlasampadādūsakānaṃ avijjātaṇhānaṃ accantābhāvasaṃsūcakehi ñāṇappahānasampadābhibyañjanakehi
tika-s0401t:189_17: tato ca antarāyikaniyyānikadhammesu sammohābhāvasiddhito pacchimavesārajjadvayasiddhīti bhagavato catuvesārajjasamannāgamo
tika-s0401t:189_19: Tattha tattha sampattaparisāya ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ ṭhānuppattikappaṭibhānena dhammadesanādīpanato,
tika-s0401t:189_20: idha pana rūpagarukānaṃ puggalānaṃ ajjhāsayānurūpaṃ ṭhānuppattikappaṭibhānena dhammadesanādīpanatoti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0401t:190_1: Ñāṇakaruṇāpariggahitasabbakiriyassa hi bhagavato natthi niratthakā paṭipatti,
tika-s0401t:190_3: Tasmā paresaṃ eva atthāya pavattasabbakiriyassa sammāsambuddhassa sakalampi kāyavacīmanokammaṃ yathāpavattaṃ
tika-s0401t:190_4: vuccamānaṃ diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthehi yathārahaṃ sattānaṃ anusāsanaṭṭhena sāsanaṃ,
tika-s0401t:190_6: Tayidaṃ satthucaritaṃ kāladesadesakaparisāpadesehi saddhiṃ tattha tattha nidānavacanehi yathārahaṃ pakāsīyati.
tika-s0401t:190_10: Apica satthuno pamāṇabhāvappakāsanena vacanena sāsanassa pamāṇabhāvadassanatthaṃ nidānavacanaṃ,
tika-s0401t:190_11: tañca desakappamāṇabhāvadassanaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayānusārena “bhagavā”ti ca iminā padena vibhāvitanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0401t:190_13: tato eva sabbasattuttamabhāvadīpanena ayamattho sabbathā pakāsito hotīti.
tika-s0401t:191_1: Desanā hi desetabbassa sīlādiatthassa veneyyasantānesu nikkhipanato “nikkhepo”ti vuccati.
tika-s0401t:191_2: Suttanikkhepaṃ vicāretvāva vuccamānā pākaṭā hotīti sāmaññato bhagavato desanāya samuṭṭhānassa vibhāgaṃ
tika-s0401t:191_3: dassetvā “etthāyaṃ desanā evaṃsamuṭṭhānā”ti desanāya samuṭṭhāne dassite suttassa sammadeva nidānaparijānanena
tika-s0401t:191_5: Tattha yathā anekasataanekasahassabhedānipi suttantāni saṃkilesabhāgiyādipaṭṭhānanayavasena soḷasavidhataṃ nātivattanti,
tika-s0401t:191_8: Ettha ca yathā attajjhāsayassa aṭṭhuppattiyā ca parajjhāsayapucchāhi saddhiṃ saṃsaggabhedo sambhavati “attajjhāsayo ca parajjhāsayo ca,
tika-s0401t:191_12: evaṃ yadipi aṭṭhuppattiyā attajjhāsayenapi saṃsaggabhedo sambhavati,
tika-s0401t:191_13: attajjhāsayādīhi pana purato ṭhitehi aṭṭhuppattiyā saṃsaggo natthīti na idha niravaseso vitthāranayo sambhavatīti “cattāro suttanikkhepā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:191_14: Tadantogadhattā vā sesanikkhepānaṃ mūlanikkhepavasena cattārova dassitā.
tika-s0401t:192_17: Atha vā nikkhipīyati suttaṃ etenāti suttanikkhepo,
tika-s0401t:192_26: Tathā aṭṭhuppatti eva aṭṭhuppattikoti evamettha attho veditabbo.
tika-s0401t:193_0: Apicettha paresaṃ indriyaparipākādikāraṇanirapekkhattā attajjhāsayassa visuṃ suttanikkhepabhāvo yutto
tika-s0401t:193_2: Parajjhāsayapucchāvasikānaṃ pana paresaṃ ajjhāsayapucchānaṃ desanāpavattihetubhūtānaṃ uppattiyaṃ pavattitānaṃ kathamaṭṭhuppattiyā anavarodho,
tika-s0401t:193_3: pucchāvasikaaṭṭhuppattikānaṃ vā parajjhāsayānurodhena pavattitānaṃ kathaṃ parajjhāsaye anavarodhoti?
tika-s0401t:193_5: Paresañhi abhinīhāraparipucchādivinimuttasseva suttadesanākāraṇuppādassa aṭṭhuppattibhāvena gahitattā parajjhāsayapucchāvasikānaṃ visuṃ gahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0401t:193_7: Paresaṃ pucchaṃ vinā ajjhāsayaṃ eva nimittaṃ katvā desito parajjhāsayo,
tika-s0401t:193_18: Cittena rūpaninnā rūpapoṇā rūpapabbhārā rūpadassanappasutā rūpena ākaḍḍhitahadayā,
tika-s0401t:194_8: na bāhirakaparikappitaṃ ahaṃkāravisayaṃ ahaṃkārassa bodhimūleyeva samucchinnattā.
tika-s0401t:194_9: Lokasamaññānatikkamantā eva hi buddhānaṃ lokiye visaye desanāpavatti.
tika-s0401t:194_11: Aññanti apekkhāsiddhattā aññatthassa “idāni vattabbaitthirūpato añña”nti āha.
tika-s0401t:194_13: Samaṃ visamaṃ sammā yāthāvato anu anu passatīti samanupassanā, ñāṇaṃ.
tika-s0401t:194_14: Saṃkilissanavasena anu anu passatīti samanupassanā, diṭṭhi.
tika-s0401t:194_21: saddo “ekarūpampī”ti rūpassa adhigatattā rūpavisayo icchitoti “yaṃ rūpa”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:194_26: Tañhi rūpaṃ tādisassa parittakusalassapi uppattiṃ nivāreti,
tika-s0401t:194_27: kimaṅgaṃ pana mahaggatānuttaracittassāti lokuttarakusalacittassapi uppattiyā nivāraṇaṃ hotuṃ samatthaṃ,
tika-s0401t:194_28: lokiyakusaluppattiyā nivārakatte vattabbameva natthīti “catubhūmakakusalacittaṃ pariyādiyitvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:194_29: Na hi kāmaguṇassādappasutassa purisassa dānādivasena savipphārikā kusaluppatti sambhavati.
tika-s0401t:194_30: Gaṇhitvā khepetvāti attānaṃ assādetvā pavattamānassa akusalacittassa paccayo hontaṃ pavattinivāraṇena
tika-s0401t:194_31: muṭṭhigataṃ viya gahetvā anuppādanirodhena khepetvā viya tiṭṭhati.
tika-s0401t:194_32: Tāva mahati lokasannivāse tassa pariyādiyaṭṭhānaṃ avicchedato labbhatīti āha –
tika-s0401t:195_0: Yathayidanti sandhivasena ākārassa rassattaṃ yakārāgamo cāti āha –
tika-s0401t:195_13: Evañca katvā vedanādīsu anavasesarūpasamaññā sāmaññalakkhaṇanti sabbarūpadhammasādhāraṇaṃ rūppanaṃ.
tika-s0401t:195_19: Rūppati attano phalassa sabhāvaṃ karotīti rūpaṃ,
tika-s0401t:196_0: Rūpayati vaṇṇavikāraṃ āpajjamānaṃ hadayaṅgatabhāvaṃ pakāsetīti rūpaṃ,
tika-s0401t:196_2: Ārohapariṇāhādibhedarūpagataṃ saṇṭhānasampattiṃ nissāya pasādaṃ āpajjamāno rūpappamāṇoti vuttoti āha –
tika-s0401t:196_6: “Rūpī rūpāni passatī”ti ettha ajjhattaṃ kesādīsu parikammasaññāvasena paṭiladdharūpajjhānaṃ rūpaṃ,
tika-s0401t:196_8: Itthiyā catusamuṭṭhāne vaṇṇeti itthisarīrapariyāpannameva rūpaṃ gahitaṃ,
tika-s0401t:196_9: tappaṭibaddhavatthālaṅkārādirūpampi pana purisacittassa pariyādāyakaṃ hotīti dassetuṃ –
tika-s0401t:196_12: Kāmaṃ “asukāya itthiyā pasādhana”nti sallakkhitassa akāyappaṭibaddhassapi vaṇṇo paṭibaddhacittassa purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭheyya,
tika-s0401t:196_13: taṃ pana na ekantikanti ekantikaṃ dassento “kāyappaṭibaddho”tiāha.
tika-s0401t:196_15: Purimassevāti pubbe vuttaatthasseva daḷhīkaraṇatthaṃ vuttaṃ yathā “dvikkhattuṃ bandhaṃ subandha”nti.
tika-s0401t:196_17: Opammavasena vuttanti “yaṃ evaṃ purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī”ti sakalamevidaṃ purimavacanaṃ upamāvasena vuttaṃ,
tika-s0401t:197_0: Idaṃ pana “itthirūpa”ntiādivacanaṃ pariyādānānubhāve sādhetabbe dīpetabbe vatthu kāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0401t:197_4: Nimittaṃ gahetvāti rāguppattihetubhūtaṃ rūpaṃ subhanimittaṃ gahetvā.
tika-s0401t:197_7: Vatthulobhena kuto tādisāya maraṇanti asaddahanto “mukhaṃ tumhākaṃ dhūmavaṇṇa”nti te daharasāmaṇere uppaṇḍento vadati.
tika-s0401t:198_0: Ratanattaye suppasannattā kākavaṇṇatissādīhi visesanatthañca so tissamahārājā saddhāsaddena visesetvā vuccati.
tika-s0401t:198_1: Daharassa cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatīti adhikāravasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:198_2: Niṭṭhituddesakiccoti gāme asappāyarūpadassanaṃ imassa anatthāya siyāti ācariyena nivāritagāmappaveso pacchā niṭṭhituddesakicco hutvā ṭhito.
tika-s0401t:198_5: Nivatthavatthaṃ sañjānitvāti attanā diṭṭhadivase nivatthavatthaṃ tassā matadivase sivathikadassanatthaṃ gatena laddhaṃ sañjānitvā.
tika-s0401t:200_1: Sā pana atthasaṃvaṇṇanā yasmā desanāya samuṭṭhānappayojanabhājanesu piṇḍatthesu ca niddhāritesu sukarā hoti suviññeyyā ca,
tika-s0401t:200_6: Tattha sādhāraṇaṃ ajjhattikasamuṭṭhānaṃ nāma lokanāthassa mahākaruṇā.
tika-s0401t:200_7: Tāya hi samussāhitassa bhagavato veneyyānaṃ dhammadesanāya cittaṃ udapādi,
tika-s0401t:200_9: “sattesu ca kāruññataṃ paṭicca buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokesī”tiādi.
tika-s0401t:200_10: Ettha ca hetāvatthāyapi mahākaruṇāya saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo yāvadeva saṃsāramahoghato saddhammadesanāhatthadānehi sattasantāraṇatthaṃ taduppattito.
tika-s0401t:200_12: evaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ dasabalañāṇādayo ca desanāya abbhantarasamuṭṭhānabhāvena vattabbā.
tika-s0401t:200_13: Sabbañhi ñeyyadhammaṃ tesaṃ desetabbākāraṃ sattānañca āsayānusayādiṃ yāthāvato jānanto bhagavā ṭhānāṭṭhānādīsu
tika-s0401t:200_15: Bāhiraṃ pana sādhāraṇaṃ samuṭṭhānaṃ dasasahassamahābrahmaparivārassa sahampatibrahmuno ajjhesanaṃ.
tika-s0401t:200_16: Tadajjhesanuttarakālañhi dhammagambhīratāpaccavekkhaṇājanitaṃ appossukkataṃ paṭippassambhetvā dhammassāmī dhammadesanāya ussāhajāto ahosi.
tika-s0401t:200_18: Tattha abbhantaraṃ yāya mahākaruṇāya yena ca desanāñāṇena idaṃ suttaṃ pavattitaṃ,
tika-s0401t:201_1: Tattha sādhāraṇaṃ yāva anupādāparinibbānaṃ vimuttirasattā bhagavato desanāya.
tika-s0401t:201_5: Asādhāraṇaṃ pana tesaṃ rūpagarukānaṃ puggalānaṃ rūpe chandarāgassa jahāpanaṃ,
tika-s0401t:201_7: Sace pana veneyyasantānagatampi desanābalasiddhisaṅkhātaṃ payojanaṃ adhippāyasamijjhanabhāvato yathādhippetatthasiddhiyā
tika-s0401t:202_0: Apica tesaṃ rūpagarukānaṃ puggalānaṃ rūpasmiṃ vijjamānassa ādīnavassa yāthāvato anavabodho imissā desanāya samuṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0401t:202_2: So hi imāya desanāya bhagavantaṃ payojeti tannipphādanaparāyaṃ desanāti katvā.
tika-s0401t:202_4: taṃ ākaṅkhitabbattā desakaṃ desanāya payojetīti payojananti vuccati.
tika-s0401t:202_5: Tathā tesaṃ puggalānaṃ tadaññesañca veneyyānaṃ rūpamukhena pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu ādīnavadassanañcettha payojanaṃ.
tika-s0401t:203_1: evaṃ tadaññe ca sakkāyagarukā sakkāyasmiṃ allīnā saṅkhatadhammānaṃ sammāsambuddhassa ca paṭipattiṃ ajānantā
tika-s0401t:205_0: Ito paraṃ pana soḷasa hārā dassetabbā.
tika-s0401t:205_1: Tattha “rūpa”nti sahajātā tassa nissayabhūtā tappaṭibaddhā ca sabbe rūpārūpadhammā taṇhāvajjā dukkhasaccaṃ.
tika-s0401t:205_8: rūpārammaṇassa akusalacittassa kusalacittassa ca pariyādānaṃ phalaṃ.
tika-s0401t:205_14: Purisassa kusalacittapariyādānenassa rūpassa aññarūpāsādhāraṇatādassanāpadesena atthakāmehi tato cittaṃ sādhukaṃ rakkhitabbaṃ.
tika-s0401t:208_2: Nanu ca aññepi hārā desanāsaṅkhātassa suttassa atthasaṃvaṇṇanāto desanāya sahacārino vāti?
tika-s0401t:208_4: ayaṃ pana hāro yebhuyyena yathārutavaseneva viññāyamāno desanāya saha caratīti vattabbataṃ arahati,
tika-s0401t:208_7: Kiṃ pana tesaṃ assādādīnaṃ anavasesānaṃ vacanaṃ desanāhāro,
tika-s0401t:208_14: tattha anāgataṃ atthavasena niddhāretvā hāro yojetabbo.
tika-s0401t:209_0: Sayaṃ samantacakkhubhāvato taṃdassanena sabhāvato ca “aha”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:209_5: Tādisassa rūpassa abhāvato adassanato ca “na samanupassāmī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:209_9: Nimittaggāhassa vatthubhāvato tathā parikappitattā ca “cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:209_12: Itthisantānapariyāpannato tappaṭibaddhabhāvato ca “itthirūpa”nti vuttanti evaṃ anupadavicayato vicayo hāro.
tika-s0401t:209_16: Padapucchāvissajjanapubbāparānuggahanaṃ assādādīnañca visesaniddhāraṇavasena pavicayalakkhaṇo hi vicayo hāro.
tika-s0401t:210_0: “Yaṃ pucchitañca vissajjitañca, suttassa yā ca anugīti;
tika-s0401t:211_0: Suttassa yo pavicayo, hāro vicayoti niddiṭṭho”ti. ;
tika-s0401t:212_0: Anādimati saṃsāre itthipurisānaṃ aññamaññarūpābhirāmatāya “itthirūpaṃ purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī”ti yujjatīti ayaṃ yuttihāro.
tika-s0401t:213_0: “Sabbesaṃ hārānaṃ, yā bhūmī yo ca gocaro tesaṃ;
tika-s0401t:215_1: idha pana yuttivicāraṇā yutti uttarapadalopena “rūpabhavo rūpa”nti yathā.
tika-s0401t:216_0: Itthirūpaṃ ayoniso olokiyamānaṃ indriyesu aguttadvāratāya padaṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0401t:216_3: Byatirekato pana itthirūpaṃ yoniso olokiyamānaṃ satipaṭṭhānabhāvanāya padaṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0401t:216_9: Byatirekato pana kusalassa cittassa apariyādānaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ uppādāya pāripūriyā padaṭṭhānanti ayaṃ tāva avisesato nayo.
tika-s0401t:216_10: Visesato pana sīlassa apariyādānaṃ avippaṭisārassa padaṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-s0401t:216_13: Sutte āgatadhammānaṃ padaṭṭhānabhūte dhamme tesañca padaṭṭhānabhūteti sambhavato padaṭṭhānabhūtadhammaniddhāraṇalakkhaṇo hi padaṭṭhāno hāro.
tika-s0401t:217_0: “Dhammaṃ deseti jino, tassa ca dhammassa yaṃ padaṭṭhānaṃ;
tika-s0401t:218_0: Iti yāva sabbadhammā, eso hāro padaṭṭhāno”ti. ;
tika-s0401t:219_1: Idha pana padaṭṭhānavicāraṇā padaṭṭhānotiādi yuttihāre vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0401t:220_0: Ekarūpanti ca rūpāyatanaggahaṇena channampi bāhirānaṃ āyatanānaṃ gahaṇaṃ bāhirāyatanabhāvena ekalakkhaṇattā.
tika-s0401t:220_1: Cittanti manāyatanaggahaṇena channampi ajjhattikānaṃ āyatanānaṃ gahaṇaṃ ajjhattikāyatanabhāvena ekalakkhaṇattā.
tika-s0401t:220_5: ettha vā ekalakkhaṇadhammā avuttāpi ekaccavacanenāti lakkhaṇo.
tika-s0401t:220_6: Sutte anāgatepi dhamme vuttappakāre āgate viya niddhāretvā yā saṃvaṇṇanā,
tika-s0401t:222_0: Vuttā bhavanti sabbe, so hāro lakkhaṇo nāmā”ti. ;
tika-s0401t:223_0: Nidāne imissā desanāya rūpagarukānaṃ puggalānaṃ rūpasmiṃ anādīnavadassitā vuttā,
tika-s0401t:223_1: “kathaṃ nu kho ime imaṃ desanaṃ sutvā rūpe ādīnavadassanamukhena sabbasmimpi khandhapañcake sabbaso chandarāgaṃ pahāya sakalavaṭṭadukkhato mucceyyuṃ,
tika-s0401t:223_2: pare ca tattha patiṭṭhāpeyyu”nti ayamettha bhagavato adhippāyo.
tika-s0401t:223_4: taṃ “eva”ntiādinidānapadānaṃ “nāha”ntiādipāḷipadānañca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ tassā līnatthavaṇṇanāya ca vuttanayānusārena sukarattā na vitthārayimha.
tika-s0401t:224_9: Ajjhāsayo cettha attajjhāsayo parajjhāsayoti dvidhā veditabbo.
tika-s0401t:224_12: “Kasmā panettha idameva cittapariyādānasuttaṃ paṭhamaṃ nikkhitta”nti nāyamanuyogo katthaci na pavattati.
tika-s0401t:224_13: Apica ime sattā anādimati saṃsāre paribbhamantā itthipurisā aññamaññesaṃ pañcakāmaguṇasaṅkhātarūpābhirāmā,
tika-s0401t:224_14: tattha itthī purisassa rūpe sattā giddhā gadhitā laggā laggitā āsattā,
tika-s0401t:224_17: tattha ca dassanasaṃsaggo garutaro itaresañca mūlabhūto.
tika-s0401t:224_18: Teneva hi bhagavā “kathaṃ nu kho mātugāme paṭipajjitabba”nti puṭṭho “adassanamevā”ti avoca.
tika-s0401t:224_19: Tasmā bhagavā pañcasu kāmaguṇesu rūpe chandarāgahāpanatthaṃ idameva suttaṃ paṭhamaṃ desesi.
tika-s0401t:224_21: Yaṃ pana ekissā desanāya desanantarena saṃsandanaṃ,
tika-s0401t:224_27: cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā,
tika-s0401t:224_28: tañce bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati,
tika-s0401t:224_29: tassa taṃ abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosāya tiṭṭhato uppajjanti aneke pāpakā akusalā dhammā”ti imāya desanāya saṃsandati.
tika-s0401t:224_35: anabhijānaṃ aparijānaṃ avirājayaṃ appajahaṃ abhabbo dukkhakkhayāyā”ti evamādīhi desanāhi saṃsandatīti ayaṃ catubyūho hāro.
tika-s0401t:224_40: Nibbacanādhippāyādīnaṃ catunnaṃ vibhāgalakkhaṇo hi catubyūho hāro.
tika-s0401t:227_6: tāsu taṇhāgahaṇena nava taṇhāmūlakā dhammā āvaṭṭanti,
tika-s0401t:227_14: Desanāya gahitadhammānaṃ sabhāgāsabhāgadhammavasena āvaṭṭanalakkhaṇo hi āvaṭṭo hāro.
tika-s0401t:229_0: Āvaṭṭati paṭipakkhe, āvaṭṭo nāma so hāro”ti. ;
tika-s0401t:230_13: ettha vā sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇānaṃ saṃkilesavodānadhammānaṃ bhūmiyoti vibhatti.
tika-s0401t:230_15: Saṃkilesadhamme vodānadhamme ca sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇato padaṭṭhānato bhūmito vibhajanalakkhaṇo hi vibhattihāro.
tika-s0401t:233_0: Itthirūpaṃ purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati ayoniso manasikaroto,
tika-s0401t:233_1: yoniso manasikaroto na pariyādiyati susaṃvutindriyattā sīlesu samāhitassāti ayaṃ parivatto hāro.
tika-s0401t:233_5: Niddiṭṭhānaṃ dhammānaṃ paṭipakkhato parivattanalakkhaṇo hi parivatto hāro.
tika-s0401t:236_11: Itthī nārī mātugāmoti pariyāyavacananti ayaṃ vevacano hāro.
tika-s0401t:236_14: Vividhaṃ vuccati etena atthoti vā vivacanaṃ,
tika-s0401t:236_16: Ekasmiṃ atthe anekapariyāyasaddappayojanalakkhaṇo hi vevacano hāro.
tika-s0401t:238_0: Yo jānāti suttavidū, vevacano nāma so hāro”ti. ;
tika-s0401t:239_3: “Pariyādāyā”ti ettha pariyādānaṃ pariyādāyakānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ vasena vītikkamapariyuṭṭhānādinā ca anekadhā paññattaṃ.
tika-s0401t:239_7: Ekekassa dhammassa anekāhi paññattīhi paññāpetabbākāravibhāvanalakkhaṇo hi paññattihāro.
tika-s0401t:241_0: So ākāro ñeyyo, paññattī nāma so hāro”ti. ;
tika-s0401t:242_0: Virodhipaccayasamavāye visadisuppattiruppanavaṇṇavikārāpattiyā taṃsamaṅgino hadayaṅgatabhāvappakāsanaṃ rūpaṭṭhoti aniccatāmukhena otaraṇaṃ,
tika-s0401t:242_4: tassā pariyādāyikā taṇhā tadekaṭṭhā ca pāpadhammā dhammadhātūti dhātumukhena otaraṇaṃ.
tika-s0401t:242_5: Evaṃ khandhāyatanādimukhehipi otaraṇaṃ vattabbanti ayaṃ otaraṇo hāro.
tika-s0401t:242_7: ettha vā suttāgatā dhammā paṭiccasamuppādādīsūti otaraṇo.
tika-s0401t:242_8: Paṭiccasamuppādādimukhena suttatthassa otaraṇalakkhaṇo hi otaraṇo hāro.
tika-s0401t:244_0: Etehi otarati yo, otaraṇo nāma so hāro”ti. ;
tika-s0401t:245_3: Evaṃ purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatīti padasuddhi,
tika-s0401t:245_5: Yathayidantiādi padasuddhi ceva ārambhasuddhi cāti ayaṃ sodhano hāro.
tika-s0401t:245_8: Sutte padapadatthapañhārambhānaṃ sodhanalakkhaṇo hi sodhano hāro.
tika-s0401t:248_0: Aññanti sāmaññato adhiṭṭhānaṃ kassaci visesassa anāmaṭṭhattā.
tika-s0401t:248_3: Itthirūpanti taṃ avikappetvā visesavacananti ayaṃ adhiṭṭhāno hāro.
tika-s0401t:248_5: ettha vā sāmaññavisesabhūtā dhammā vinā vikappenāti adhiṭṭhāno.
tika-s0401t:248_6: Suttāgatānaṃ dhammānaṃ avikappanavaseneva sāmaññavisesaniddhāraṇalakkhaṇo hi adhiṭṭhāno hāro.
tika-s0401t:251_3: Pariyādāyāti ettha pariyādānassa ayonisomanasikārādayoti ayaṃ parikkhāro hāro.
tika-s0401t:251_9: Sutte āgatadhammānaṃ parikkhārasaṅkhātahetupaccaye niddhāretvā saṃvaṇṇanālakkhaṇo hi parikkhāro hāro.
tika-s0401t:254_0: Purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatīti ettha pariyādāyikā visesato taṇhāvijjā veditabbā tāsaṃ vasena pariyādānasambhavato.
tika-s0401t:254_7: Tathā hi tā rāgavirāgā avijjāvirāgāti visesetvā vuccantīti ayaṃ samāropano hāro.
tika-s0401t:255_0: “Ye dhammā yaṃ mūlā, ye cekatthā pakāsitā muninā;
tika-s0401t:260_0: Vevacano ca paññatti, otaraṇo ca sodhano;
tika-s0401t:262_0: Evaṃ vuttā soḷasa hārā dassitāti veditabbā.
tika-s0401t:262_5: Atha vā harīyanti voharīyanti dhammasaṃvaṇṇakadhammappaṭiggāhakehi dhammassa dānaggahaṇavasenāti hārā.
tika-s0401t:262_7: Yathā hi anekaratanāvalisamūho hārasaṅkhāto attano avayavabhūtaratanasamphassehi samupajaniyamānahilādasukho
tika-s0401t:262_9: evameva tepi nānāvidhaparamattharatanappabandhā saṃvaṇṇanāvisesā attano avayavabhūtaparamattharatanādhigamena
tika-s0401t:262_11: Atha vā hārayanti aññāṇādinīhāraṃ apagamaṃ karonti ācikkhantīti vā hārā.
tika-s0401t:262_12: Atha vā sotujanacittassa haraṇato ramaṇato ca hārā niruttinayena yathā “bhavesu vantagamano bhagavā”ti.
tika-s0401t:263_11: vipassanāpakkhiyānaṃ aniccasaññādīnañca vasena vodānapakkho netabboti ayaṃ nandiyāvaṭṭassa nayassa bhūmi.
tika-s0401t:263_12: Yo hi taṇhāavijjāhi saṃkilesapakkhassa suttatthassa samathavipassanāhi vodānapakkhassa ca catusaccayojanamukhena nayanalakkhaṇo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso,
tika-s0401t:264_0: “Taṇhañca avijjampi ca, samathena vipassanāya yo neti;
tika-s0401t:266_1: Yathā hi nandiyāvaṭṭo anto ṭhitena padhānāvayavena bahiddhā āvaṭṭati,
tika-s0401t:266_3: Atha vā nandiyā taṇhāya pamodassa vā āvaṭṭo etthāti nandiyāvaṭṭo.
tika-s0401t:267_0: Heṭṭhā vuttanayena gahitesu taṇhāvijjātappakkhiyadhammesu taṇhā lobho,
tika-s0401t:267_2: avijjāya sampayutto lohite sati pubbo viya taṇhāya sati sijjhamāno āghāto doso iti tīhi akusalamūlehi gahitehi,
tika-s0401t:267_3: tappaṭipakkhato kusalacittaggahaṇena ca tīṇi kusalamūlāni gahitāni eva honti.
tika-s0401t:267_4: Idhāpi lobho sabbāni vā sāsavakusalamūlāni samudayasaccaṃ,
tika-s0401t:267_5: tannibbattā tesaṃ adhiṭṭhānagocarabhūtā upādānakkhandhā dukkhasaccantiādinā saccayojanā veditabbā.
tika-s0401t:267_10: Yo hi akusalamūlehi saṃkilesapakkhassa kusalamūlehi vodānapakkhassa suttatthassa ca catusaccayojanāmukhena nayanalakkhaṇo saṃvaṇṇanāviseso,
tika-s0401t:267_13: alobhādīhi ca vodānapakkhe pukkhalo sobhanoti tipukkhalo.
tika-s0401t:272_0: Vuttanayena gahitesu taṇhāvijjātappakkhiyadhammesu visesato taṇhādiṭṭhīnaṃ vasena asubhe “subha”nti,
tika-s0401t:272_4: Tesaṃ paṭipakkhato kusalacittaggahaṇena siddhehi sativīriyasamādhipaññindriyehi cattāri satipaṭṭhānāni siddhāniyeva honti.
tika-s0401t:273_0: Tattha catūhi indriyehi cattāro puggalā niddisitabbā. Kathaṃ?
tika-s0401t:273_3: Tesu paṭhamo asubhe “subha”nti vipariyesaggāhī satibalena yathābhūtaṃ kāyasabhāvaṃ sallakkhento bhāvanābalena
tika-s0401t:273_5: Dutiyo asukhe “sukha”nti vipariyesaggāhī “uppannaṃ kāmavitakkaṃ nādhivāsetī”tiādinā vuttena vīriyasaṃvarabhūtena
tika-s0401t:273_6: vīriyabalena paṭipakkhaṃ vinodento bhāvanābalena taṃ vipallāsaṃ vidhametvā sammattaniyāmaṃ okkamati.
tika-s0401t:273_7: Tatiyo anicce “nicca”nti vipallāsaggāhī samathabalena samāhitacitto saṅkhārānaṃ khaṇikabhāvaṃ sallakkhento
tika-s0401t:273_8: bhāvanābalena taṃ vipallāsaṃ samugghātetvā sammattaniyāmaṃ okkamati.
tika-s0401t:273_10: catukoṭikasuññatāmanasikārena taṃ micchābhinivesaṃ viddhaṃsento sāmaññaphalaṃ sacchikaroti.
tika-s0401t:273_16: vodānapakkho netabboti ayaṃ sīhavikkīḷitassa nayassa bhūmi.
tika-s0401t:273_17: Yo hi subhasaññādīhi vipallāsehi sakalassa saṃkilesapakkhassa saddhindriyādīhi ca vodānapakkhassa catusaccayojanāvasena
tika-s0401t:278_1: tassa vikkīḷitaṃ desanā vacīkammabhūto vihāroti katvā vipallāsatappaṭipakkhaparidīpanato sīhassa vikkīḷitaṃ etthāti sīhavikkīḷito, nayo.
tika-s0401t:279_0: Imesaṃ pana tiṇṇaṃ atthanayānaṃ siddhiyā vohāranayadvayaṃ siddhameva hoti.
tika-s0401t:279_1: Tathā hi atthanayattayadisābhāvena kusalādidhammānaṃ ālocanaṃ disālocanaṃ.
tika-s0401t:284_0: Tathā ālocitānaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ atthanayattayayojane samānayanato aṅkuso viya aṅkuso. Vuttañhetaṃ –
tika-s0401t:286_0: Sabbe kusalākusale, ayaṃ nayo aṅkuso nāmā”ti. ;
tika-s0401t:287_0: Tasmā manasāva atthanayānaṃ disābhūtadhammānaṃ locanaṃ disālocanaṃ,
tika-s0401t:287_1: tesaṃ samānayanaṃ aṅkusoti pañcapi nayāni yuttāni honti.
tika-s0401t:292_0: Pañcamo aṅkuso nāma, sabbe pañca nayā gatā”ti. –
tika-s0401t:293_1: Nayati saṃkilesaṃ vodānañca vibhāgato ñāpetīti nayo,
tika-s0401t:293_3: nayo ca so lañjako cāti nayalañjako.
tika-s0401t:293_4: Idañca suttaṃ soḷasavidhe suttantapaṭṭhāne saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ byatirekamukhena nibbedhāsekkhabhāgiyanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0401t:293_5: Aṭṭhavīsatividhe pana suttantapaṭṭhāne lokiyalokuttaraṃ sattadhammādhiṭṭhānaṃ ñāṇaññeyyaṃ dassanabhāvanaṃ
tika-s0401t:293_6: sakavacanaṃ vissajjanīyaṃ kusalākusalaṃ anuññātaṃ paṭikkhittañcāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0401t:294_15: neva saṃkilesabhāgiyaṃ na vāsanābhāgiyaṃ na nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ na asekkhabhāgiyaṃ sutta”nti evaṃ vuttasoḷasasāsanapaṭṭhānāni.
tika-s0401t:295_21: Tattha hi saṃkilesadhammā lokiyasucaritadhammā sekkhā dhammā asekkhā dhammā ca vibhattā.
tika-s0401t:295_22: Sabbabhāgiyaṃ pana “passaṃ na passatī”tiādikaṃ udakādianuvādavacanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0401t:296_21: Idha pana lokiyo attho yasmiṃ sutte vutto,
tika-s0401t:296_31: Buddhādīnaṃ pana guṇābhitthavanavasena pavattaṃ suttaṃ thavo nāma –
tika-s0401t:298_0: Virāgo seṭṭho dhammānaṃ, dvipadānañca cakkhumā”ti. ādikaṃ viya –
tika-s0401t:300_7: Itthiyā hasanasaddopettha saṅgahetabbo tassapi purisena assādetabbato. Tenāha –
tika-s0401t:300_8: “apica kho mātugāmassa saddaṃ suṇāti tirokuṭṭā vā tiropākārā vā hasantiyā vā bhaṇantiyā vā gāyantiyā vā,
tika-s0401t:301_0: Kathinatikkhabhāvena siṅgasadisattā aḷasaṅkhātāni siṅgāni etassa atthīti siṅgī,
tika-s0401t:301_1: suvaṇṇavaṇṇatāya mahābalatāya ca sīhahatthiādimigasadisattā migo viyāti migo.
tika-s0401t:301_2: Tattha tattha kiccaṃ netubhāvena cakkhuyeva nettaṃ,
tika-s0401t:301_5: Tenābhibhūtoti tena migena abhibhūto ajjhotthaṭo niccalaggahito hutvā.
tika-s0401t:301_6: Karuṇaṃ rudāmīti kāruññapatto hutvā rodāmi viravāmi.
tika-s0401t:301_7: Paccatthikabhayato mutti nāma yathā tathā sahāyavato hoti,
tika-s0401t:301_10: Tattha mā heva manti maṃ evarūpaṃ byasanaṃ pattaṃ attano pāṇasamaṃ piyasāmikaṃ tvaṃ māheva jahi.
tika-s0401t:302_5: Saṭṭhihāyananti jātiyā saṭṭhivassakālasmiṃ kuñjarā thāmena parihāyanti,
tika-s0401t:302_7: Pathabyā cāturantāyāti catūsu disāsu samuddaṃ patvā ṭhitāya cāturantāya pathaviyā.
tika-s0401t:302_9: Tesaṃ tvaṃ vārijo seṭṭhoti ye samudde vā gaṅgāya vā yamunāya vā nammadānadiyā vā kuḷīrā,
tika-s0401t:302_10: tesaṃ sabbesaṃ vaṇṇasampattiyā mahantattena ca vārimhi jātattā vārijo tvameva seṭṭho pasatthataro.
tika-s0401t:302_11: Muñca rodantiyā patinti sabbesaṃ seṭṭhattā tameva yācāmi,
tika-s0401t:303_0: Pabbatagahanaṃ nissāyāti tisso pabbatarājiyo atikkamitvā catutthāya pabbatarājiyaṃ pabbatagahanaṃ upanissāya.
tika-s0401t:303_1: Evaṃ vadatīti “udetayaṃ cakkhumā”tiādinā imaṃ buddhamantaṃ mantento vadati.
tika-s0401t:304_1: Cakkhumāti sakalacakkavāḷavāsīnaṃ andhakāraṃ vidhamitvā cakkhuppaṭilābhakaraṇena yantena tesaṃ dinnaṃ cakkhu,
tika-s0401t:304_3: Ekarājāti sakalacakkavāḷe ālokakarānaṃ antare seṭṭhaṭṭhena rañjanaṭṭhena ca ekarājā.
tika-s0401t:304_7: Taṃ taṃ namassāmīti tasmā taṃ evarūpaṃ bhavantaṃ namassāmi vandāmi.
tika-s0401t:304_8: Tayājja guttā viharemha divasanti tayā ajja rakkhitā hutvā imaṃ divasaṃ catuiriyāpathavihārena sukhaṃ vihareyyāma.
tika-s0401t:305_0: Evaṃ bodhisatto imāya gāthāya sūriyaṃ namassitvā dutiyagāthāya atīte parinibbute buddhe ceva buddhaguṇe ca namassati “ye brāhmaṇā”tiādinā.
tika-s0401t:305_1: Tattha ye brāhmaṇāti ye bāhitapāpā parisuddhā brāhmaṇā.
tika-s0401t:305_4: Idha pana sabbe saṅkhatadhamme vidite pākaṭe katvā katāti vedagū.
tika-s0401t:305_7: Sabbe khandhāyatanadhātudhamme salakkhaṇasāmaññalakkhaṇavasena attano ñāṇassa vidite pākaṭe katvā tiṇṇaṃ
tika-s0401t:305_10: Te me namoti te mama imaṃ namakkāraṃ paṭicchantu.
tika-s0401t:305_11: Te ca maṃ pālayantūti evaṃ mayā namassitā ca te bhagavanto maṃ pālayantu rakkhantu.
tika-s0401t:305_13: vimuttiyāti ayaṃ mama namakkāro atītānaṃ parinibbutānaṃ buddhānaṃ atthu,
tika-s0401t:305_14: tesaṃyeva catūsu phalesu ñāṇasaṅkhātāya bodhiyā atthu,
tika-s0401t:305_17: tāya vimuttiyāpi ayaṃ mayhaṃ namakkāro atthūti attho.
tika-s0401t:305_19: moro carati esanāti idaṃ pana padadvayaṃ satthā abhisambuddho hutvā āha.
tika-s0401t:305_22: so moro imaṃ parittaṃ imaṃ rakkhaṃ katvā attano gocarabhūmiyaṃ pupphaphalādīnaṃ atthāya nānappakārāya esanāya caratīti.
tika-s0401t:306_0: Evaṃ divasaṃ caritvā sāyaṃ pabbatamatthake nisīditvā atthaṃ gacchantaṃ sūriyaṃ olokento buddhaguṇe āvajjetvā
tika-s0401t:306_5: Imaṃ so parittaṃ katvā moro vāsamakappayīti idampi abhisambuddho hutvā āha.
tika-s0401t:306_8: so moro imaṃ parittaṃ imaṃ rakkhaṃ katvā attano nivāsaṭṭhāne vāsaṃ saṃkappayitthāti.
tika-s0401t:307_1: Tatiye rūpāyatanassa viya gandhāyatanassapi samuṭṭhāpakapaccayavasena viseso natthīti āha –
tika-s0401t:307_3: Itthiyā sarīragandhassa kāyāruḷhaanulepanādigandhassa ca tappaṭibaddhabhāvato avisesena gahaṇappasaṅge
tika-s0401t:307_6: Duggandhoti pākatikāya itthiyā sarīragandhabhāvato duggandho hoti.
tika-s0401t:307_8: Kathaṃ pana itthiyā sarīragandhassa duggandhabhāvoti āha –
tika-s0401t:307_10: Tattha assassa viya gandho assā atthīti assagandhinī.
tika-s0401t:307_11: Meṇḍakassa viya gandho assā atthīti meṇḍakagandhinī.
tika-s0401t:307_12: Sedassa viya gandho assā atthīti sedagandhinī.
tika-s0401t:307_13: Soṇitassa viya gandho assā atthīti soṇitagandhinī.
tika-s0401t:307_14: Rajjatevāti anādimati saṃsāre avijjādikilesavāsanāya parikaḍḍhitahadayattā phoṭṭhabbassādagadhitacittatāya
tika-s0401t:307_15: ca andhabālo evarūpāyapi duggandhasarīrāya itthiyā rajjatiyeva.
tika-s0401t:307_16: Pākatikāya itthiyā sarīragandhassa duggandhabhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni visiṭṭhāya ekaccāya itthiyā tadabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ –
tika-s0401t:307_18: Yadi evaṃ īdisāya itthiyā sarīragandhopi idha kasmā nādhippetoti āha –
tika-s0401t:307_20: Tiracchānagatāya itthiyā ekaccāya ca manussitthiyā sarīragandhassa ativiya assādetabbabhāvadassanato
tika-s0401t:307_21: puna tampi avisesena anujānanto “itthikāye gandho vā hotū”tiādimāha.
tika-s0401t:308_1: Catutthādīsu kiṃ tenāti jivhāviññeyyarase idhādhippete kiṃ tena avayavarasādinā vuttena payojanaṃ.
tika-s0401t:309_2: Yadi panettha itthigatāni rūpārammaṇādīni avisesato purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhanti,
tika-s0401t:309_3: atha kasmā bhagavatā tāni visuṃ visuṃ gahetvā desitānīti āha –
tika-s0401t:309_10: na tathā rūpādīni ārammaṇānīti etena sattesu rūpādigarukatā asaṃkiṇṇā viya dassitā,
tika-s0401t:309_11: na kho panetaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ anekavidhattā sattānaṃ ajjhāsayassāti dassetuṃ –
tika-s0401t:309_14: Ekaccassa hi purisassa yathāvuttesu pañcasupi ārammaṇesu garukatā hoti,
tika-s0401t:309_17: te sabbepi pañcagarukātveva veditabbā yathā “sattisayo aṭṭhavimokkhā”ti.
tika-s0401t:309_19: Ekekārammaṇagarukānañhi pañcannaṃ puggalānaṃ tattha āgatattā taṃ jātakaṃ “pañcagarukajātaka”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:309_20: Yadi evaṃ tena idha payojanaṃ natthīti āha –
tika-s0401t:309_22: Āharitvā kathetabbanti rūpādigarukatāya ete anayabyasanaṃ pattāti dassetuṃ kathetabbaṃ.
tika-s0401t:310_2: Uppaṇḍetvā gaṇhituṃ na icchīti tassa thokaṃ virūpadhātukattā na icchi.
tika-s0401t:310_4: Dve hatthaṃ pattānīti dve uppalāni hatthaṃ gatāni.
tika-s0401t:310_5: Pahaṭṭhākāraṃ dassetvāti aparāhi itthīhi ekekaṃ laddhaṃ,
tika-s0401t:311_0: Sādhu sādhūti bhāsatoti dhammakathāya anumodanavasena “sādhu sādhū”ti bhāsato.
tika-s0401t:311_1: Uppalaṃva yathodaketi yathā uppalaṃ uppalagandho mukhato nibbattoti.
tika-s0401t:311_4: tathāpi yathārutamatthe avatvā vivaṭṭaṃ nīharitvā kathetabbaṃ vimuttirasattā bhagavato desanāya.
tika-s0401t:316_2: Ekadhammampīti ettha “ekasabhāvampī”ti iminā sabhāvatthoyaṃ dhammasaddo “kusalā dhammā”tiādīsu viyāti dassitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0401t:316_4: tadaggena nissattattho siddho evāti “nissattaṭṭhena dhammo veditabbo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:316_8: tenākārena pavattanakassa aññassa kāmacchandassa nimittattā “subhanimitta”nti ca vuccati.
tika-s0401t:316_10: Iṭṭhañhi iṭṭhākārena vā gayhamānaṃ rūpādiārammaṇaṃ “subhanimitta”nti vuccati.
tika-s0401t:316_24: Kāmanavasena rajjanavasena ca kāmo eva rāgo kāmarāgo.
