tika-s0401t:868_3: Tathā hi ukkaṃsagatasappurisūpanissayayonisomanasikāresu labbhamānesupi upanissayarahitassa visesādhigamo na sampajjatevāti.
tika-s0401t:870_0: Datvā attamano hoti, esā puññassa sampadā”ti. ;
tika-s0401t:871_0: Tava manaṃ sandhārehīti “ajja bhattaṃ cirāyita”nti kodhato tava cittaṃ sandhārehi,
tika-s0401t:871_3: samparikiṇṇaṃ viya ahosīti tena kasitaṭṭhānaṃ sabbaṃ suvaṇṇabhāvāpattiyā mahākosātakipupphehi sañchannaṃ viya ahosi.
tika-s0401t:871_11: Sayaṃ ariyasāvikābhāvato satthuvasena “sapitikā dhītā”ti vatvā satthu sammukhā dhammassavanena tassā
tika-s0401t:873_2: Āyuno ṭhitihetuṃ bhojanaṃ dentī āyuṃ deti nāma.
tika-s0401t:873_5: Kammasarikkhakañcetaṃ phalanti dassento “āyuṃ kho pana datvā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0401t:875_1: Sattame ūrumaṃsaṃ chinditvā dāsiyā adāsīti āgataphalā viññātasāsanā ariyasāvikā attano sarīradukkhaṃ
tika-s0401t:875_2: acintetvā tassa bhikkhuno rogavūpasamameva paccāsīsantī attano ūrumaṃsaṃ chinditvā dāsiyā adāsi.
tika-s0401t:875_3: Satthāpi tassā tathāpavattaṃ ajjhāsayasampattiṃ disvā “mama sammukhībhāvūpagamanenevassā vaṇo ruhitvā sañchavi jāyati,
tika-s0401t:875_4: phāsubhāvo hotī”ti ca disvā “pakkosatha na”nti āha.
tika-s0401t:875_5: Sā cintesīti “sabbalokassa hitānukampako satthā na maṃ dukkhāpetuṃ pakkosati,
tika-s0401t:875_7: Attanā katakāraṇaṃ sabbaṃ kathesīti buddhānubhāvavibhāvanatthaṃ kathesi,
tika-s0401t:875_9: Gilānupaṭṭhākīnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti agaṇitattadukkhā gilānānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ gelaññavūpasamane yuttappayuttāti gilānupaṭṭhākīnaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapesīti.
tika-s0401t:877_1: Aṭṭhame aveccappasannānanti ratanattayaguṇe yāthāvato ñatvā pasannānaṃ,
tika-s0401t:877_2: so panassa pasādo maggenāgatattā kenaci akampanīyo.
tika-s0401t:877_10: vacanatthato pana nāmakāyena desanāya sampaṭicchanavasena sakkhibhūtaṃ katvāti attho.
tika-s0401t:879_1: Navame vissāsakathaneneva nakulamātā nakulapitā ca satthuvissāsikā nāma jātāti vuttaṃ –
tika-s0401t:881_1: Dasame anussavenevāti paccakkhato rūpadassanena satthu sammukhā dhammassavanena ca vinā kevalaṃ anussavaneneva
tika-s0401t:889_4: Tadatthanigamanameva hi “netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī”ti vacananti. Tenāha –
tika-s0401t:889_13: Catubhūmakesūti idaṃ catutthabhūmakasaṅkhārānaṃ ariyasāvakassa visayabhāvūpagamanato vuttaṃ,
tika-s0401t:889_14: na pana te ārabbha niccato upagamanasabbhāvato.
tika-s0401t:889_17: lokuttarasaṅkhārānaṃ pana nivattane kāraṇaṃ sayameva vakkhati.
tika-s0401t:889_18: Etaṃ kāraṇaṃ natthīti tathā upagamane setughāto natthi.
tika-s0401t:889_20: Tathā hi te gambhīrabhāvena duddasā akusalānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ na hontīti.
tika-s0401t:889_22: Appahīnavipallāsānañhi santānesu kusaladhammānampi te ārammaṇaṃ na honti.
tika-s0401t:890_1: Asukhe sukhanti vipallāso ca idha sukhato upagamanassa ṭhānanti dassento “ekanta…pe…
tika-s0401t:890_4: diṭṭhiyā nibbānassa avisayabhāvo heṭṭhā vutto evāti kasiṇādipaṇṇattisaṅgahatthanti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:891_7: Yasmā yaṃ yaṃ saṅkhāraṃ puthujjano niccādivasena gaṇhāti,
tika-s0401t:891_8: taṃ taṃ ariyasāvako aniccādivasena gaṇhanto yāthāvato jānanto taṃ gāhaṃ taṃ diṭṭhiṃ vissajjeti,
tika-s0401t:891_10: tattha vissajjanāti catubhūmakasaṅkhārā idha saṅkhāraggahaṇena na gayhantīti attho.
tika-s0401t:892_1: Puttasambandhena mātupitusamaññā dattakittimādivasenapi puttavohāro loke dissati,
tika-s0401t:892_2: so ca kho pariyāyenāti nippariyāyena siddhaṃ taṃ dassetuṃ –
tika-s0401t:892_5: Tathā ānantariyakammassa adhippetattā “manussabhūtova khīṇāsavo arahāti adhippeto”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:892_6: “Aṭṭhānameta”ntiādinā “mātuādīnaṃyeva jīvitā voropane ariyasāvakassa abhabbabhāvadassanato tadaññaṃ ariyasāvako
tika-s0401t:892_7: jīvitā voropetīti idaṃ atthato āpannamevā”ti maññamāno vadati –
tika-s0401t:892_10: yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo sañcicca pāṇaṃ jīvitā voropeyya,
tika-s0401t:892_11: netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī”ti vacanato “etampi aṭṭhāna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:892_14: Evaṃ sante kasmā “mātara”ntiādinā visesetvā vuttanti āha –
tika-s0401t:892_17: Ariyamaggenāgatasaddhādhibalavasena hi ariyasāvako tādisaṃ sāvajjaṃ na karoti.
tika-s0401t:893_1: Pañcahi kāraṇehīti idamettha nipphādakāni tesaṃ pubbabhāgiyāni ca kāraṇāni kāraṇabhāvasāmaññena ekajjhaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ,
tika-s0401t:893_6: evaṃ bhinditabbānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ attano vacanassa sāvanena viññāpanena. Tenāha –
tika-s0401t:893_8: Kaṇṇamūle vacībhedaṃ katvāti etena pākaṭaṃ katvā bhedakaravatthudīpanaṃ vohāro,
tika-s0401t:893_9: tattha attano nicchitamatthaṃ rahassavasena viññāpanaṃ anussāvananti dasseti.
tika-s0401t:894_0: Kammameva uddeso vā pamāṇanti tehi saṅghabhedasiddhito vuttaṃ,
tika-s0401t:896_3: evaṃ manussabhāve ṭhitasseva edisānaṃ akusaladhammānampi tikkhavisadabhāvāpattīti āha –
tika-s0401t:896_5: Pākatikamanussānampi ca kusaladhammānaṃ visesappatti vimānavatthuaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbā.
tika-s0401t:896_6: Yathāvutto ca attho samānajātiyassa vikopane garutaro,
tika-s0401t:896_9: Liṅgaparivatte ca so eva ekakammanibbatto bhavaṅgappabandho jīvitindriyapabandho ca,
tika-s0401t:896_19: kammaṃ pana garutaraṃ ānantariyasadisaṃ bhāyitabbanti āha –
tika-s0401t:897_1: Ānantariyaṃ phusatīti maraṇādhippāyeneva ānantariyavatthuno vikopitattā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:897_2: Ānantariyaṃ na phusatīti ānantariyavatthuabhāvato ānantariyaṃ na hoti.
tika-s0401t:897_4: vadhakacittaṃ pana tadārammaṇaṃ jīvitindriyañca ānantariyabhāve pamāṇanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0401t:897_6: Yo hi parasenāya aññañca yodhaṃ pitarañca kammaṃ karonte disvā yodhassa usuṃ khipati “etaṃ vijjhitvā mama pitaraṃ vijjhissatī”ti,
tika-s0401t:897_12: Coracatukkaṃ pana yo “coraṃ māressāmī”ti coravesena gacchantaṃ pitaraṃ māreti,
tika-s0401t:897_17: yathā vadhakacetanā paccuppannārammaṇāpi pabandhavicchedanavasena jīvitindriyaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattati,
tika-s0401t:897_19: Sā hi cajitabbavatthuṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā cajanamattameva hoti,
tika-s0401t:898_0: Lohitaṃ samosaratīti abhighātena pakuppamānaṃ sañcitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0401t:899_1: Bhedo ca hotīti saṅghassa bhedo ca hoti.
tika-s0401t:899_2: Vaṭṭatīti saññāyāti “īdisaṃ karaṇaṃ saṅghabhedāya na hotī”ti saññāya.
tika-s0401t:899_3: Tathā navato ūnaparisāyāti navato ūnaparisāya karontassa tathāti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0401t:899_4: Tathāti ca iminā “na ānantariyakamma”nti imaṃ ākaḍḍhati,
tika-s0401t:900_4: “āpāyikoti idaṃ suttaṃ yaṃ so ekaṃ kappaṃ asītibhāge katvā tato ekabhāgamattaṃ kālaṃ tiṭṭheyya,
tika-s0401t:900_6: Kappavināseyevāti ca āyukappavināse evāti atthe sati natthi virodho.
tika-s0401t:900_7: Ettha ca saṇṭhahanteti idampi “sveva vinassissatī”ti viya abhūtaparikappavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:900_9: tato paraṃ kappābhāve āyukappassapi abhāvatoti avirodhato atthayojanā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0401t:901_1: evaṃ sati kathaṃ nesaṃ ānantariyatā cutianantaraṃ vipākadānābhāvato.
tika-s0401t:901_2: Atha sati phaladāne cutianantaro eva etesaṃ phalakālo,
tika-s0401t:901_5: Evampi niyataphalakālānaṃ aññesampi upapajjavedanīyānaṃ diṭṭhadhammavedanīyānañca niyatatā āpajjeyya,
tika-s0401t:901_6: tasmā vipākadhammadhammānaṃ paccayantaravikalatādīhi avipaccamānānampi attano sabhāvena vipākadhammatā
tika-s0401t:901_7: viya balavatā ānantariyena vipāke dinne avipaccamānānampi ānantariyānaṃ phaladāne niyatasabhāvā ānantariyasabhāvā
tika-s0401t:901_8: ca pavattīti attano sabhāvena phaladānaniyameneva niyatā ānantariyatā ca veditabbā.
tika-s0401t:901_9: Avassañca ānantariyasabhāvā tato eva niyatasabhāvā ca tesaṃ pavattīti sampaṭicchitabbametaṃ,
tika-s0401t:901_10: aññassa balavato ānantariyassa abhāve sati cutianantaraṃ ekantena phaladānato.
tika-s0401t:902_0: Nanu evaṃ aññesampi upapajjavedanīyānaṃ aññasmiṃ vipākadāyake asati cutianantarameva ekantena phaladānato
tika-s0401t:902_2: Nāpajjati asamānajātikena cetopaṇidhivasena upaghātakena ca nivattetabbavipākattā anantare ekantaphaladāyakattābhāvā,
tika-s0401t:902_3: na pana ānantariyānaṃ paṭhamajjhānādīnaṃ dutiyajjhānādīni viya asamānajātikaṃ phalanivattakaṃ atthi sabbānantariyānaṃ avīciphalattā,
tika-s0401t:902_4: na ca heṭṭhūpapattiṃ icchato sīlavato cetopaṇidhi viya uparūpapattijanakakammaphalaṃ ānantariyaphalaṃ
tika-s0401t:902_5: nivattetuṃ samattho cetopaṇidhi atthi anicchantasseva avīcipātanato,
tika-s0401t:902_6: na ca ānantariyopaghātakaṃ kiñci kammaṃ atthi,
tika-s0401t:902_8: Anekāni ca ānantariyāni katāni ekantena vipāke niyatasabhāvattā uparatāvipaccanasabhāvāsaṅkattā nicchitāni sabhāvato niyatāneva.
tika-s0401t:902_9: Tesu pana samānasabhāvesu ekena vipāke dinne itarāni attanā kattabbakiccassa teneva katattā na dutiyaṃ tatiyampi ca paṭisandhiṃ karonti,
tika-s0401t:902_11: garugarutarabhāvo pana tesaṃ labbhatevāti saṅghabhedassa siyā garutarabhāvoti “yena…pe…
tika-s0401t:902_13: Ekassa pana aññāni upatthambhakāni hontīti daṭṭhabbāni.
tika-s0401t:902_14: Paṭisandhivasena vipaccatīti vacanena itaresaṃ pavattivipākadāyitā anuññātā viya dissati.
tika-s0401t:902_15: No vā tathā sīlavatīti yathā pitā sīlavā,
tika-s0401t:902_16: tathā sīlavatī no vā hotīti yojanā.
tika-s0401t:903_0: Pakatattoti anukkhitto. Samānasaṃvāsakoti apārājiko. Samānasīmāyanti ekasīmāyaṃ.
tika-s0401t:904_1: Satthu kiccaṃ kātuṃ asamatthoti yaṃ satthārā kātabbakiccaṃ anusāsanādi,
tika-s0401t:905_5: Ettha hi satthā taranti uplavanti ummujjanimujjaṃ karonti,
tika-s0401t:905_7: Tādisānaṃ diṭṭhīnaṃ uppādetā titthakaro nāma pūraṇakassapādiko.
tika-s0401t:905_8: Tassa laddhiṃ gahetvā pabbajitā titthiyā nāma.
tika-s0401t:905_10: Yathāvuttaṃ vā diṭṭhigatasaṅkhātaṃ titthaṃ etesaṃ atthīti titthikā,
tika-s0401t:906_1: Abhijātiādīsu pakampanadevatūpasaṅkamanādinā jātacakkavāḷena samānayogakkhamaṃ dasasahassaparimāṇaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ jātikhettaṃ.
tika-s0401t:906_4: Dasasahassī lokadhātūti imāya lokadhātuyā saddhiṃ imaṃ lokadhātuṃ parivāretvā ṭhitā dasasahassī lokadhātu.
tika-s0401t:906_7: “sabbesaṃyeva buddhānaṃ tattakaṃyeva jātikhettaṃ tannivāsīnaṃyeva devatānaṃ dhammābhisamayo”ti ca vadanti.
tika-s0401t:906_8: Mātukucchi okkamanakālādīnaṃ channaṃ eva gahaṇaṃ nidassanamattaṃ mahābhinīhārādikālepi tassa pakampanassa labbhanato.
tika-s0401t:906_9: Āṇākhettaṃ nāma yaṃ ekajjhaṃ saṃvaṭṭati vivaṭṭati ca,
tika-s0401t:906_10: āṇā pavattati āṇāya tannivāsidevatānaṃ sirasā sampaṭicchanena,
tika-s0401t:906_13: Adhippāyavasena pana “yāvatā vā pana ākaṅkheyyā”ti vacanato tato parampi āṇā vatteyyeva.
tika-s0401t:907_0: Na uppajjantīti pana atthīti “na me ācariyo atthi,
tika-s0401t:907_1: sadiso me na vijjatī”tiādiṃ imissā lokadhātuyā ṭhatvā vadantena bhagavatā “kiṃ panāvuso,
tika-s0401t:907_3: atthetarahi aññe samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā bhagavatā samasamā sambodhiyanti,
tika-s0401t:907_7: yaṃ ekissā lokadhātuyā dve arahanto sammāsambuddhā apubbaṃ acarimaṃ uppajjeyyu”nti imaṃ suttaṃ āharantena
tika-s0401t:907_8: dhammasenāpatinā ca buddhakhettabhūtaṃ imaṃ lokadhātuṃ ṭhapetvā aññattha anuppatti vuttā hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0401t:908_2: so pana kālo kathaṃ paricchinnoti carimabhave paṭisandhiggahaṇato paṭṭhāya yāva dhātuparinibbānāti dassento,
tika-s0401t:908_8: Buddhā nāma majjhe bhinnasuvaṇṇaṃ viya ekasadisāti tesaṃ desanāpi ekarasā ekadhāti āha –
tika-s0401t:908_11: Vivādabhāvatoti etena vivādābhāvatthaṃ dve buddhā ekato na uppajjantīti dasseti.
tika-s0401t:909_2: yena dutiyabuddhaguṇe dhāretuṃ asamatthā ayaṃ lokadhātūti dasseti.
tika-s0401t:909_3: Paccayavisesanipphannānañhi guṇadhammānaṃ bhāriyo viseso mahāpathaviyāpi dussahoti sakkā viññātuṃ.
tika-s0401t:909_4: Tathā hi abhisambodhisamaye upagatassa lokanāthassa guṇabhāraṃ bodhirukkhassa tīsupi disāsu mahāpathavī sandhāretuṃ nāsakkhi.
tika-s0401t:909_5: Tasmā “na dhāreyyā”ti vatvā tameva adhāraṇaṃ pariyāyantarehi pakāsento “caleyyā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0401t:909_10: Vinameyyāti vividhaṃ ito cito ca nameyya.
tika-s0401t:909_14: Tathābhūtā ca na katthaci tiṭṭheyyāti āha –
tika-s0401t:910_3: Samupādikāti samaṃ uddhaṃ pajjati pavattatīti samupādikā,
tika-s0401t:911_2: Anonamitadaṇḍajātoti yāvadatthaṃ bhojanena onamituṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya anonamanadaṇḍo viya jāto.
tika-s0401t:911_3: Sakiṃ bhutto vameyyāti ekampi ālopaṃ ajjhoharitvā vameyyāti attho.
tika-s0401t:912_0: Atidhammabhārena pathavī calatīti dhammena nāma pathavī tiṭṭheyya.
tika-s0401t:912_1: Sā kiṃ teneva calati vinassatīti adhippāyena pucchati.
tika-s0401t:912_2: Puna thero “ratanaṃ nāma loke kuṭumbaṃ sandhārentaṃ abhimatañca lokena attano garusabhāvatāya sakaṭabhaṅgassa kāraṇaṃ atibhārabhūtaṃ diṭṭhaṃ.
tika-s0401t:912_3: Evaṃ dhammo ca hitasukhavisesehi taṃsamaṅgīnaṃ dhārento abhimato ca viññūnaṃ gambhīrappameyyabhāvena
tika-s0401t:912_4: garusabhāvattā atibhārabhūto pathavīcalanassa kāraṇaṃ hotī”ti dassento, “idha, mahārāja,
tika-s0401t:912_6: Eteneva tathāgatassa mātukucchiokkamanādikāle pathavīkampanakāraṇaṃ saṃvaṇṇitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0401t:914_2: mahantehi buddhakaradhammehi pāramisaṅkhātehi kāraṇehi buddhaguṇānaṃ nibbattitoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0401t:914_4: mahantā cakkavāḷādayo attano attano visaye ekekāva,
tika-s0401t:914_5: evaṃ sammāsambuddhopi mahanto attano visaye eko eva.
tika-s0401t:914_9: “Ākāso viya anantavisayo bhagavā eko eva hotī”ti vadanto paracakkavāḷesupi dutiyassa buddhassa abhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0401t:915_0: Imināva padenāti “ekissā lokadhātuyā”ti iminā eva padena.
tika-s0401t:915_4: Yathā “imasmiṃyeva cakkavāḷe uppajjantī”ti vutte imasmimpi cakkavāḷe jambudīpe eva,
tika-s0401t:915_6: evaṃ “ekissā lokadhātuyā”ti jātikhette adhippetepi imināva cakkavāḷena paricchindituṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-s0401t:919_4: Ekasmiṃ dīpetiādinā dīpantarepi ekajjhaṃ na uppajjati,
tika-s0401t:919_6: Sopi parihāyethāti cakkavāḷassa padese eva pavattitabbattā parihāyeyya.
tika-s0401t:920_9: savisesā upakārakiriyā adhiko sakkāroti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0401t:920_16: vitthāro pana paramatthadīpaniyā cariyāpiṭakavaṇṇanāya vuttanayena veditabbo.
tika-s0401t:920_19: Dutiyapakati ca nāma paṭhamapakatito nihīnā eva.
tika-s0401t:921_1: Idha purisassa tattha nibbattanatoti imasmiṃ manussaloke purisabhūtassa tattha brahmaloke brahmattabhāvena nibbattanato.
tika-s0401t:921_2: Tena asatipi purisaliṅge purisākārā brahmāno hontīti dasseti.
tika-s0401t:921_3: Taṃyeva ca purisākāraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ bhagavatā “yaṃ puriso brahmattaṃ kāreyyā”ti.
tika-s0401t:921_6: Yadi evaṃ itthiyo brahmaloke na uppajjeyyunti āha –
tika-s0401t:922_12: Kamme pana vipaccituṃ āraddhe vipākappavattivasena vipākasamaṅgitā.
tika-s0401t:922_20: Upapattiyā uppajjanassa nimittaṃ kāraṇanti upapattinimittaṃ, kammaṃ,
tika-s0401t:922_26: tānissa tasmiṃ samaye olambanti ajjholambanti abhilambanti”ti vacanato sāyanhe mahantānaṃ pabbatakūṭānaṃ
tika-s0401t:922_27: chāyā viya āsannamaraṇassa sattassa citte supine viya vipaccituṃ katokāsaṃ kammaṃ,
tika-s0401t:922_30: Ekena hi kammunā tajje nimitte upaṭṭhite paccayavisesavasena tato aññena kammunā tadaññassa nimittassa upaṭṭhānaṃ parivattanaṃ.
tika-s0401t:922_31: Sesā niccalā avasesā catubbidhāpi samaṅgitā niccalā aparivattanato.
tika-s0401t:923_3: Āyūhanacetanā kammasamaṅgitāvasenāti kāyaduccaritassa aparāparaṃ āyūhanena sanniṭṭhāpakacetanāya tasseva
tika-s0401t:923_4: pakappane kammakkhayakarañāṇena akhepitattā yathūpacitakammunā ca samaṅgibhāvassa vasena.
tika-s0401t:924_6: Apare pana purimehi vipākāvaraṇassa anuddhaṭattā “tasmiṃyeva khaṇe”ti ca avisesena vuttattā taṃ dosaṃ pariharituṃ “āyūhitakammaṃ nāmā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0401t:924_7: Yadā kammaṃ vipākavāraṃ labhatīti idaṃ katokāsassa appaṭibāhiyattā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:924_9: imasmiṃ sutte “kāyaduccaritasamaṅgī”ti āgatattā vipākūpaṭṭhānasamaṅgitā na labbhanti.
tika-s0401t:929_13: Maggañāṇena nirodhanaṃ nāma accantaṃ appavattikaraṇanti āha –
tika-s0401t:929_15: Yathā khādanīyassa mukhe katvā khādanaṃ nāma yāvadeva ajjhoharaṇatthaṃ,
tika-s0401t:929_18: Yasmā kilesesu khīṇesu itaraṃ vaṭṭadvayampi khīṇameva hoti,
tika-s0401t:929_20: Saṅkhatadhammānaṃ abhijānanaṃ nāma tattha lakkhaṇattayāropanamukhenevāti āha –
tika-s0401t:929_23: Sambujjhitabbāni nāma cattāri ariyasaccāni tabbinimuttassa ñeyyassa abhāvato.
tika-s0401t:929_24: “Catunnaṃ saccānaṃ bujjhanatthāyā”ti vatvā tayidaṃ bujjhanaṃ yassa ñāṇassa vasena ijjhati,
tika-s0401t:930_3: Ucchuraso samapākapakko cuṇṇādīhi missetvā piṇḍīkato guḷo,
tika-s0401t:931_6: Upacārasamādhinā hi citte samāhite vipassanāsukhena ijjhati.
tika-s0401t:932_1: anussarīti ko ayaṃ mama abbhantare ṭhatvā anussari.
tika-s0401t:932_2: Pariggaṇhantoti bāhirakaparikappitassa anussarakassa sabbaso abhāvadassanametaṃ. Tenāha –
tika-s0401t:932_4: Disvāti pariyesananayena vuttappakāraṃ cittameva anussarīti disvā sabbampetanti etaṃ hadayavatthuādippabhedaṃ sabbampi.
tika-s0401t:932_5: Idañca rūpaṃ purimañca arūpanti idaṃ ruppanasabhāvattā rūpaṃ,
tika-s0401t:932_6: purimaṃ ataṃsabhāvattā arūpanti saṅkhepato rūpārūpaṃ vavatthapetvā.
tika-s0401t:933_1: Eseva nayoti iminā yvāyaṃ “taṃ paneta”ntiādinā atthanayo buddhānussatiyaṃ vibhāvitoti atidisati,
tika-s0401t:933_2: svāyaṃ atideso payojanavasena navasupi anussatīsu sādhāraṇavasena vuttopi ānāpānassatiādīsu tīsu vipassanatthāneva
tika-s0401t:933_3: hontīti iminā apavādena nivattitoti tāsaṃ ekappayojanatāva daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0401t:933_4: Dhamme anussati dhammānussatīti samāsapadavibhāgadassanampi vacanatthadassanapakkhikamevāti āha –
tika-s0401t:933_6: Dhammaṃ ārabbhāti hi dhammassa anussatiyā visayabhāvadassanametaṃ.
tika-s0401t:933_10: Devatā ārabbhāti ettha devatāguṇasadisatāya attano saddhāsīlasutacāgapaññāsu devatāsamaññā.
tika-s0401t:933_11: Bhavati hi taṃsadisepi tabbohāro yathā “tāni osadhāni,
tika-s0401t:933_14: Tattha devatā sakkhiṭṭhāne ṭhapetvāti “yathārūpāya saddhāya samannāgatā tā devatā ito cutā tattha upapannā,
tika-s0401t:933_19: yathārūpāya paññāya samannāgatā tā devatā ito cutā tattha upapannā,
tika-s0401t:933_20: mayhampi tathārūpā paññā saṃvijjatī”ti evaṃ devatā sakkhiṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā.
tika-s0401t:934_7: Khayo ca so upasamo cāti khayūpasamo.
tika-s0401t:934_8: Tatracāyaṃ upasamo dhammo evāti dhammānussatiyā upasamānussati ekasaṅgahoti?
tika-s0401t:934_10: saṅkhatadhammato pana asaṅkhatadhammo sātisayo uḷāratamapaṇītatamabhāvatoti dīpetuṃ visuṃ nīharitvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:934_12: “dhammānussatī”ti vatvāpi upasamānussatiṃ avoca anussarantassa savisesaṃ santapaṇītabhāvena upaṭṭhānato.
tika-s0401t:934_13: Evañca katvā idha khayūpasamaggahaṇampi samatthitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0401t:934_17: virāgo tesaṃ aggamakkhāyatī”tiādivacanato maggaphaladhammehi nibbānadhammo sātisayo,
tika-s0401t:934_19: tasmā accantūpasamena saddhiṃ khayūpasamopi gahitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0401t:934_22: taṃ akāraṇaṃ buddhānussatiādīsupi tathā desanāya āgatattā.
tika-s0401t:934_23: Yathā pana buddhānussatiādīni kammaṭṭhānāni vipassanatthāni honti,
tika-s0401t:941_3: Micchattaniyāmokkamananayo pana sāmaññaphalasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ taṭṭīkāya ca vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
tika-s0401t:942_1: Ayaṃ tividhā saggāvaraṇā ceva hotīti kammapathappattiyā mahāsāvajjabhāvato vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:942_2: Saggāvaraṇāya hontiyā maggavibandhakabhāve vattabbameva natthīti vuttaṃ –
tika-s0401t:942_7: Idaṃ pana vidhānaṃ paṭikkhipitvāti viparītadassanañca na maggāvaraṇañcāti viruddhametaṃ uddhammabhāvato.
tika-s0401t:942_8: Tathā hi sati appahīnāya eva sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā maggādhigamena bhavitabbanti adhippāyena yathāvuttavidhānaṃ paṭikkhipitvā.
tika-s0401t:942_9: “Na saggāvaraṇā”ti saggūpapattiyā avibandhakattaṃ vadantehi diṭṭhiyā saggāvahatāpi nāma anuññātā hotīti
tika-s0401t:942_10: taṃ vādaṃ paṭikkhipantena “diṭṭhi nāma saggaṃ upanetuṃ samatthā nāma natthī”ti vuttaṃ. Kasmā?
tika-s0401t:943_1: Vaṭṭaṃ viddhaṃsetīti maggasammādiṭṭhi kilesavaṭṭaṃ kammavaṭṭañca viddhaṃseti.
tika-s0401t:943_3: Evaṃ pana attano kāraṇena viddhastabhavaṃ phalasammādiṭṭhi paṭibāhatīti vuttaṃ avasaradānato.
tika-s0401t:943_4: Iccetaṃ kusalanti arahattaṃ pāpetuṃ sace sakkoti,
tika-s0401t:943_6: Satta bhave detīti sotāpattimaggassa paccayabhūtā vipassanāsammādiṭṭhi tassa puggalassa satta bhave deti.
tika-s0401t:943_7: Evamayanti pañcavidhampi sammādiṭṭhiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tenāha –
tika-s0401t:943_11: aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmī”tiādinā vutte gatimaggasaṅkhāte atthe.
tika-s0401t:943_12: “Sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjantī”ti vuttattā “lokikā bhavanipphādikāva veditabbā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:944_7: Samādinnanti ādimajjhapariyosānesu samaṃ ekasadisaṃ katvā ādinnaṃ gahitaṃ anissaṭṭhaṃ.
tika-s0401t:944_10: Yathādiṭṭhiyaṃ ṭhitakāyakammanti yā pana diṭṭhi “natthi tatonidānaṃ pāpa”ntiādinā pavattā,
tika-s0401t:944_11: tassaṃ diṭṭhiyaṃ ṭhitakassa ṭhitamattassa anissaṭṭhassa taṃdiṭṭhikassa kāyakammaṃ.
tika-s0401t:944_12: Diṭṭhisahajātaṃ kāyakammanti tassa yathādiṭṭhikassa paresaṃ hatthamuddādinā viññāpanakāle tāya diṭṭhiyā sahajātaṃ kāyakammaṃ.
tika-s0401t:944_13: Na cettha vacīkammāsaṅkā uppādetabbā pāṇaghātādīnaṃyeva adhippetattā.
tika-s0401t:944_14: Diṭṭhānulomikaṃ kāyakammanti yathā paresaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti,
tika-s0401t:944_15: evaṃ diṭṭhiyā anulomikaṃ katvā pavattitaṃ kāyakammaṃ. Tenāha –
tika-s0401t:944_18: Eseva nayoti iminā yathāvuttāya diṭṭhiyā ṭhitavacīkammaṃ,
tika-s0401t:944_20: diṭṭhānulomikaṃ vacīkammanti tividhaṃ hotīti evamādi atidisati.
tika-s0401t:945_7: tasmā tassa puggalassa sabbe te dhammā aniṭṭhāya…pe…
tika-s0401t:945_10: Tittakaṃ kaṭukanti ca ubhayaṃ idha aniṭṭhapariyāyaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ “pacchā te kaṭukaṃ bhavissatī”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0401t:947_1: vuttanti sabbāpi micchādiṭṭhi ekantasāvajjattā aniṭṭhāya dukkhāya saṃvattatīti adhippāyena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:947_3: Yojetvā veditabbānīti navamasutte viya yojetvā veditabbāni.
tika-s0401t:947_4: Cittaṭṭhapanāva patthanāti ettha paṇidhi cāti vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0401t:951_1: Tatiyassa paṭhame ayāthāvadiṭṭhikoti aniccādibhāvesu dhammesu niccātiādinā uppannadiṭṭhiko. Tenāha –
tika-s0401t:951_2: “tāyeva micchādiṭṭhiyā viparītadassano”ti saddhammāti ettha santo pasattho sundaro dhammo,
tika-s0401t:952_2: saddena pūritapāramikā paccekabodhisattā ekaccasāvakabodhisattā ca saṅgayhanti.
tika-s0401t:953_6: tato taṃsamaṅgīpuggalo vaṭṭassa khāṇūti vuccati. Tenāha –
tika-s0401t:953_12: Yādise hi paccaye paṭicca ayaṃ taṃ dassanaṃ okkanto puna kadāci tappaṭipakkhe paccaye paṭicca tato sīsukkhipanamassa na hotīti na vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0401t:953_15: Aññathā sammattaniyāmo viya micchattaniyāmopi accantiko siyā,
tika-s0401t:954_3: āsevanavasena bhavantarepi taṃ diṭṭhiṃ roceti evā”ti –
tika-s0401t:956_0: “Ye vā pana tesaṃ laddhiṃ gahetvā rattiṭṭhāne divāṭṭhāne nisinnā sajjhāyanti vīmaṃsanti,
tika-s0401t:956_4: mato ucchijjatī’ti tasmiṃ ārammaṇe micchāsati santiṭṭhati,
tika-s0401t:956_10: tattha koci ekaṃ dassanaṃ okkamati, koci dve,
tika-s0401t:956_12: ekasmiṃ okkantepi dvīsu tīsu okkantesupi niyatamicchādiṭṭhikova hoti.
tika-s0401t:957_4: Paccatiyevāti cakkavāḷe jhāyamāne ajjhāyamānepi attano kammabalena paccatiyeva.
tika-s0401t:958_1: Catutthe “mā khalī”ti vacanaṃ upādāya evaṃladdhanāmoti taṃ kira sakaddamāya bhūmiyā telaghaṭaṃ gahetvā gacchantaṃ, “tāta,
tika-s0401t:958_3: So pamādena khalitvā patitvā sāmikassa bhayena palāyituṃ āraddho.
tika-s0401t:958_5: So sāṭakaṃ chaḍḍetvā acelako hutvā palāto paṇṇena vā tiṇena vā paṭicchādetumpi ajānanto jātarūpeneva ekaṃ gāmaṃ pāvisi.
tika-s0401t:958_6: Manussā taṃ disvā “ayaṃ samaṇo arahā appiccho,
tika-s0401t:958_7: natthi iminā sadiso”ti pūvabhattādīni gahetvā upasaṅkamitvā “mayhaṃ sāṭakaṃ anivatthabhāvena idaṃ uppanna”nti
tika-s0401t:958_8: tato paṭṭhāya sāṭakaṃ labhitvāpi na nivāsesi,
tika-s0401t:958_10: Tassa santike aññepi aññepīti pañcasatā manussā pabbajiṃsu.
tika-s0401t:959_9: Manussakhippaṃ maññeti manussā patitvā byasanappattiatthaṃ oṭṭitaṃ kuminaṃ viya. Tenāha –
tika-s0401t:960_2: tassa sabbassapi aniyyānikattā satthupaṭiññassapi asabbaññubhāvato. Tenāha –
tika-s0401t:960_7: Samakameva akusalaṃ pāpuṇātīti tesaṃ sabbesaṃ ekajjhaṃ samādapanepi tesaṃ akusalena samakameva akusalaṃ
tika-s0401t:960_8: pāpuṇāti ekajjhaṃ bahūnaṃ samādapanepi tathā ussahanassa balavabhāvato.
tika-s0401t:960_10: Yathā hi dhammacariyāyaṃ samakamevāti vattabbā kalyāṇamittatā,
tika-s0401t:961_2: Satthā ca sabbaññū hotīti asabbaññuno niyyānikabhāvena kathetuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā.
tika-s0401t:962_2: imassa ettakaṃ dātuṃ yutta”nti evaṃ pamāṇaṃ jānitabbaṃ.
tika-s0401t:962_6: Appicchapaṭipadā nāma natthi durakkhāte dhammavinayeti adhippāyo.
tika-s0401t:963_2: Deyyadhammassa pana thokabahutāva deyyadhammassa vaso nāma.
tika-s0401t:963_4: Yadi hītiādi “katha”ntiādinā saṅkhepato vuttassa atthassa vivaraṇaṃ.
tika-s0401t:963_6: Cakkhubhūto hotīti mahājanassa cakkhu viya hoti.
tika-s0401t:963_7: Sāsanaṃ ciraṭṭhititaṃ karotīti anuppannalābhuppādanena mahājanassa pasāduppādanena ca ciraṭṭhitikaṃ karoti.
tika-s0401t:964_2: Gahetvā gamanatthāyāti gehato bahi gahetvā gamanatthāya.
tika-s0401t:964_5: Vīmaṃsitvāti yathā uddissa kataṃ na hoti,
tika-s0401t:964_7: Mahājano appiccho bhavituṃ maññatīti mahājano sayaṃ appiccho bhavituṃ maññati diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjanena.
tika-s0401t:965_1: Pañcātapatappanaṃ catūsu passesu aggisantāpassa upari sūriyasantāpassa ca tappanaṃ,
tika-s0401t:969_1: Navakanipāteti imasmiṃyeva aṅguttaranikāye vakkhamānaṃ navakanipātaṃ sandhāyāha.
tika-s0401t:969_3: Sabbatthāti imasmiṃ sutte vuttāvasiṭṭhesu sabbesu suttesu.
tika-s0401t:973_4: saddena kadambarukkhādīnaṃ kappaṭṭhāyibhāvaṃ viya yojanasatubbedhādibhāvaṃ samuccinoti,
tika-s0401t:973_5: na pana jambuyā jambudīpassa viya tehi aparagoyānādīnaṃ saññāṇabhāvaṃ.
tika-s0401t:973_9: vigataṃ apagataṃ kūlaṃ etassāti vikūlanti āha –
tika-s0401t:974_1: Dutiyādīsu cattāro apāyā aññatra manussehīti adhippetā,
tika-s0401t:974_2: na devā aññatra manussehīti hīnāya jātiyā adhippetattā.
tika-s0401t:974_4: yattha gati bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ upāsakānaṃ upāsikānaṃ aññesampi kammavādikiriyavādiviññujātikānaṃ,
tika-s0401t:976_1: Tathāgatassa guṇe jānitvā cakkhunāpi dassanaṃ dassanameva,
tika-s0401t:976_2: ajānitvā pana dassanaṃ tiracchānagatānampi hotiyevāti āha –
tika-s0401t:978_0: 328. Sutānaṃ dhammānaṃ asammoso dhāraṇanti āha – “dhārentīti na pammussantī”ti.
tika-s0401t:979_3: Anatthaparihārena hi atthaggahaṇaṃ yathā adhammaparivajjanena dhammappaṭipatti.
tika-s0401t:982_3: Padhānavīriyaṃ karontīti sammappadhānasaṅkhātaṃ vīriyaṃ karonti uppādenti.
tika-s0401t:984_3: Uñchācārenāti uñchācariyāya kassaci apariggahabhūtassa kiñci ayācitvā gahaṇaṃ uñchācāro.
tika-s0401t:984_4: Ettha cātiādinā annādīnaṃ aggabhāvo nāma manāpaparamo icchitakkhaṇalābho,
tika-s0401t:984_8: Idaṃ kiṃ nāmāti “idaṃ annaggarasaggaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-s0401t:984_12: Upādāya aggarasaṃ nāmāti taṃ taṃ upādāyupādāya annaggarasaggaṃ daṭṭhabbanti dasseti.
tika-s0401t:984_13: Cakkavattiāhārato hi cātumahārājikānaṃ āhāro aggoti evaṃ yāva paranimmitavasavattidevā netabbaṃ.
tika-s0401t:985_1: Attharaso nāma cattāri sāmaññaphalāni “ariyamaggānaṃ phalabhūto raso”ti katvā.
tika-s0401t:985_2: Dhammaraso nāma cattāro maggā “sāmaññaphalassa hetubhūto raso”ti katvā vimuttiraso nāma amataṃ nibbānaṃ “sabbasaṅkhārasamatho”ti katvā.
tika-s0401t:989_1: Addhamidanti sandhivasena pāḷiyaṃ rassaṃ katvā vuttaṃ, ma-
tika-s0401t:989_4: Ekaṃso esāti ekaṃso hetu esa lābhānaṃ.
tika-s0401t:989_5: Pāpakaṃ nāmāti appakampi pāpaṃ nāma byattaṃ ekaṃsena na karoti.
tika-s0401t:989_8: tecīvarikattanti imesaṃ dhutadhammānaṃ gahaṇeneva itaresampi taṃsabhāgānaṃ gahitabhāvo daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0401t:989_10: Ākappassa sampattīti “añño me ākappo karaṇīyo”ti evaṃ vuttassa ākappassa sampatti.
tika-s0401t:989_15: Tenassa lābho uppajjatīti idaṃ na lābhuppādanūpāyadassanaparaṃ,
tika-s0401t:989_16: atha kho evaṃ sammāpaṭipajjamānassa anicchantasseva lābho uppajjatīti lābhassa abyabhicārahetudassanaparaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yathāha –
tika-s0401t:993_3: Cūḷaccharāsaṅghātasutte appanaṃ appattāya mettāya tāvamahanto vipāko dassito,
tika-s0401t:993_4: kimaṅgaṃ pana imissā appanāppattāya mettāyāti dassetuṃ –
tika-s0401t:993_10: paṭhamaṃ samāpajjatīti idaṃ pana na ekantalakkhaṇaṃ.
tika-s0401t:993_11: Ciṇṇavasībhāvo hi aṭṭhasamāpattilābhī ādito paṭṭhāya matthakaṃ pāpentopi samāpajjituṃ sakkoti,
tika-s0401t:993_16: Vipassanaṃ kayiramānaṃ lakkhaṇūpanijjhānakiccaṃ maggena sijjhati taggatasammohaviddhaṃsanato.
tika-s0401t:993_17: Apica vipassanāya lakkhaṇūpanijjhānaṃ maggena uppannena sijjhati itarathā parivattanato,
tika-s0401t:993_20: Yathā phalaṃ nibbānassa asaṅkhatalakkhaṇaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇavasena upanijjhāyati,
tika-s0401t:994_1: Hitapharaṇanti sattesu hitānurūpaṃ jhānassa pharitvā pavattanaṃ.
tika-s0401t:994_5: Eseva nayoti iminā karuṇādīnampi appanāppattataṃ atidisati.
tika-s0401t:995_4: Rūpakāyo hi idha aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ kesādīnañca dhammānaṃ samūhaṭṭhena hatthikāyarathakāyādayo viya kāyoti adhippeto.
tika-s0401t:995_5: Samūhavisayatāya cassa kāyasaddassa samudāyūpādanatāya ca asubhākārassa “kāye”ti ekavacanaṃ.
tika-s0401t:995_6: Tathā ārammaṇādivibhāgena anekabhedabhinnampi cittaṃ cittabhāvasāmaññena ekajjhaṃ gahetvā “citte”ti ekavacanaṃ kataṃ.
tika-s0401t:995_9: Tameva kāyanti ca avadhāraṇena vedanādianupassanaṃ nivatteti.
tika-s0401t:995_10: Tena ca puna kāyaggahaṇassa payojanaṃ sūcitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0401t:995_11: “Kāye”ti hi vatvāpi puna “kāyānupassī”ti dutiyaṃ kāyaggahaṇaṃ asammissato vavatthānaghanavinibbhogādidassanatthaṃ kataṃ.
tika-s0401t:995_13: ettha paṭibaddhāti kāyavedanādianupassanappasaṅgepi āpanne na kāye vedanānupassī cittānupassī dhammānupassī vā.
tika-s0401t:995_14: Atha kho kāyānupassīyevāti kāyasaṅkhātavatthusmiṃ kāyānupassanākārasseva dassanena asammissato vavatthānaṃ dassitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0401t:995_21: kadalikkhandhapattavaṭṭivinibbhujjako rittamuṭṭhiviniveṭhako viya ca bhūtupādāyasamūhānupassīyevāti nānappakārato
tika-s0401t:995_22: samūhavaseneva kāyasaṅkhātassa vatthuno dassanena ghanavinibbhogo dassito hoti.
tika-s0401t:995_23: Na hettha yathāvuttasamūhavinimutto kāyo vā itthī vā puriso vā añño vā koci dhammo dissati,
tika-s0401t:995_24: yathāvuttadhammasamūhamatteyeva pana tathā tathā sattā micchābhinivesaṃ karonti.
tika-s0401t:996_6: Ātapasaddo viya pana ātāpasaddopi vīriyeva niruḷho.
tika-s0401t:996_7: Atha vā paṭipakkhappahāne sampayuttadhammānaṃ abbhussahanavasena pavattamānassa vīriyassa sātisayaṃ tadātāpananti vīriyameva tathā vuccati,
tika-s0401t:996_11: Ayañca īkāro pasaṃsāya atisayassa vā dīpakoti ātāpiggahaṇena sammappadhānasamaṅgitaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0401t:996_20: asammissato vavatthāne aññadhammānupassitābhāvena sammā aviparītaṃ sabbākārappajānena samantato uparūparivisesāvahabhāvena
tika-s0401t:997_0: Kāyo ca idha lujjanappalujjanaṭṭhena lokoti adhippetoti āha –
tika-s0401t:997_2: Pañcakāmaguṇikataṇhanti rūpādīsu pañcasu kāmaguṇesu pavattamānaṃ taṇhaṃ.
tika-s0401t:997_11: domanassavinayena kāye bhūtānaṃ asubhāsukhabhāvādīnaṃ apanayanassa ca pahānaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:997_12: Tena yogāvacarassa yogānubhāvo yogasamatthatā ca dīpitā hoti.
tika-s0401t:997_14: yadidaṃ anurodhavirodhavippamutto aratiratisaho abhūtapakkhepabhūtāpanayanavirahito ca hoti.
tika-s0401t:997_15: Anurodhavirodhavippamutto cesa aratiratisaho abhūtaṃ apakkhipanto bhūtañca anapanento yogasamattho hotīti.
tika-s0401t:998_4: khanati vā kāyikaṃ cetasikañca ābādhanti sukhā,
tika-s0401t:998_9: khanati vā kāyikaṃ cetasikañca sātanti dukkhā,
tika-s0401t:998_14: Sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vediyāmīti pajānātīti kāyikaṃ vā cetasikaṃ vā sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vediyamāno “ahaṃ sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vediyāmī”ti pajānātīti attho.
tika-s0401t:998_15: Tattha kāmaṃ uttānaseyyakāpi dārakā thaññapivanādikāle sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vediyamānā “sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vediyāmā”ti pajānanti,
tika-s0401t:998_16: na panetaṃ evarūpaṃ pajānanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:998_19: kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā satipaṭṭhānabhāvanā vā na hoti.
tika-s0401t:998_20: Imassa pana bhikkhuno jānanaṃ sattupaladdhiṃ jahati,
tika-s0401t:998_25: kiṃ kāraṇā vedanā”ti evaṃ sampajānantassa vediyanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:999_1: Na koci satto vā puggalo vā vediyati.
tika-s0401t:999_3: Na kassaci sattassa vā puggalassa vā vedanā.
tika-s0401t:999_6: Tasmā esa evaṃ pajānāti “taṃ taṃ sukhādīnaṃ vatthubhūtaṃ rūpādiṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā vedanāva vediyati,
tika-s0401t:999_7: taṃ pana vedanāpavattiṃ upādāya ‘ahaṃ vediyāmī’ti vohāramattaṃ hotī”ti.
tika-s0401t:999_8: Evaṃ “sukhādīnaṃ vatthubhūtaṃ rūpādiṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā vedanāva vediyatī”ti sallakkhento esa “sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vediyāmī”ti pajānātīti veditabbo.
tika-s0401t:1000_0: Atha vā sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vediyāmīti pajānātīti sukhavedanākkhaṇe dukkhāya vedanāya abhāvato sukhaṃ vedanaṃ
tika-s0401t:1000_2: Tena yā pubbe bhūtapubbā dukkhā vedanā,
tika-s0401t:1000_3: tassā idāni abhāvato imissā ca sukhāya vedanāya ito paraṃ paṭhamaṃ abhāvato “vedanā nāma aniccā addhuvā
tika-s0401t:1000_5: Dukkhaṃ vedanaṃ vediyāmīti pajānātītiādīsupi eseva nayo.
tika-s0401t:1001_0: Sāmisaṃ vā sukhantiādīsu yasmā kilesehi āmasitabbato āmisā nāma pañca kāmaguṇā.
tika-s0401t:1001_2: tasmā sāmisā sukhā nāma pañcakāmaguṇāmisanissitā chasu dvāresu uppannā chagehassitā somanassavedanā.
tika-s0401t:1001_4: Sā ca chasu dvāresu “iṭṭhārammaṇaṃ nānubhavissāmi nānubhavāmī”ti vitakkayato uppannā kāmaguṇanissitā domanassavedanā veditabbā.
tika-s0401t:1001_6: Sā ca chasu dvāresu iṭṭhārammaṇe āpāthagate aniccādivasena vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā ussukkāpetuṃ sakkontassa
tika-s0401t:1001_7: “ussakkitā me vipassanā”ti somanassajātassa uppannā somanassavedanā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-s0401t:1002_1: Sā pana chasu dvāresu iṭṭhārammaṇe āpāthagate anuttaravimokkhasaṅkhātaariyaphaladhammesu pihaṃ paṭṭhapetvā
tika-s0401t:1002_2: tadadhigamāya aniccādivasena vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā ussukkāpetuṃ asakkontassa “imampi pakkhaṃ imampi
tika-s0401t:1002_3: māsaṃ imampi saṃvaccharaṃ vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā ariyabhūmiṃ pāpuṇituṃ nāsakkhi”nti anusocato uppannā
tika-s0401t:1003_1: Sā ca chasu dvāresu iṭṭhārammaṇe āpāthagate guḷapiṇḍake nilīnamakkhikā viya rūpādīni anuvattamānā tattheva
tika-s0401t:1003_2: laggā laggitā hutvā uppannā kāmaguṇanissitā upekkhāvedanā.
tika-s0401t:1003_4: Sā pana chasu dvāresu iṭṭhādiārammaṇe āpāthagate iṭṭhe arajjantassa,
tika-s0401t:1003_8: Sāva vedanā veditabbāti lujjanappalujjanaṭṭhena sā vedanā “loko”ti veditabbā.
tika-s0401t:1004_0: Evaṃ vitthāriteti “sarāgaṃ vā cittaṃ sarāgaṃ cittanti pajānāti,
tika-s0401t:1004_15: avimuttaṃ vā cittanti pajānātī”ti evaṃ satipaṭṭhānasutte vitthāretvā dassite soḷasavidhe citte.
tika-s0401t:1005_2: Idaṃ pana yasmā sammasanaṃ na dhammasamodhānaṃ,
tika-s0401t:1005_3: tasmā idha ekapadepi lokuttaraṃ na labbhati.
tika-s0401t:1006_1: Etañhi saṅkucitacittaṃ nāma ārammaṇe saṅkocavasena pavattanato.
tika-s0401t:1006_3: Etañhi pasaṭacittaṃ nāma ārammaṇe savisesaṃ vikkhepavasena visaṭabhāvena pavattanato.
tika-s0401t:1006_10: Samāhitanti yassa appanāsamādhi vā upacārasamādhi vā atthi.
tika-s0401t:1007_2: Upādānehi ārammaṇakaraṇādivasena upādātabbā vā khandhā upādānakkhandhā.
tika-s0401t:1007_3: Cha ajjhattikabāhirāyatanānīti cakkhu sotaṃ ghānaṃ jivhā kāyo manoti imāni cha ajjhattikāyatanāni ceva,
tika-s0401t:1007_4: rūpaṃ saddo gandho raso phoṭṭhabbo dhammāti imāni cha bāhirāyatanāni ca.
tika-s0401t:1007_5: Ettha pana lokuttaradhammā na gahetabbā sammasanacārassa adhippetattā.
tika-s0401t:1007_9: Tathā hi sambujjhati āraddhavipassakato paṭṭhāya yogāvacaroti sambodhi,
tika-s0401t:1007_10: yāya vā so satiādikāya sattadhammasāmaggiyā sambujjhati,
tika-s0401t:1008_0: Cattāri ariyasaccānīti “dukkhaṃ dukkhasamudayo dukkhanirodho dukkhanirodhagāminipaṭipadā”ti evaṃ vuttāni cattāri ariyasaccāni.
tika-s0401t:1008_1: Tattha purimāni dve saccāni vaṭṭaṃ pavattihetubhāvato.
tika-s0401t:1008_3: Tesu bhikkhuno vaṭṭe kammaṭṭhānābhiniveso hoti sarūpato pariggahasambhavato.
tika-s0401t:1008_4: Vivaṭṭe natthi abhiniveso avisayattā avisayatte ca payojanābhāvato.
tika-s0401t:1009_2: Payogaṃ parakkamanti ettha bhusaṃ yogo payogo,
tika-s0401t:1009_5: Cittaṃ ukkhipatīti kosajjapakkhe patituṃ apadānavasena ukkhipati.
tika-s0401t:1009_9: Kassapasaṃyuttapariyāyenāti kassapasaṃyutte āgatasuttena “uppannā me pāpakā akusalā dhammā appahīyamānā anatthāya saṃvatteyyu”nti āgatattā.
tika-s0401t:1010_0: Samathavipassanāvāti avadhāraṇena maggaṃ nivattetvā tassa nivattane kāraṇaṃ dassento,
tika-s0401t:1010_3: Niruddhassa puna anuppajjanato “na koci guṇo”ti āsaṅkeyyāti āha –
tika-s0401t:1010_7: Purimasmimpīti “anuppannā me kusalā dhammā uppajjamānā anatthāya saṃvatteyyu”nti etthapi.
tika-s0401t:1010_9: Taṃ pana tathāvuttavacanaṃ na yuttaṃ dutiyasmiṃ viya purimasmiṃ maggassa aggahaṇe kāraṇābhāvato.
tika-s0401t:1010_10: Purimasmiṃ aggahite magge anuppajjamāno maggo anatthāya saṃvatteyyāti āpajjeyya,
tika-s0401t:1010_11: na cetaṃ yuttaṃ āpajjamāne tasmiṃ padhānatthasambhavato.
tika-s0401t:1011_3: Tañhi uppādato paṭṭhāya yāva bhaṅgā uddhaṃ pannaṃ pattanti nippariyāyato “uppanna”nti vuccati.
tika-s0401t:1011_8: Idha vipākānubhavanavasena tadārammaṇaṃ avipakkavipākassa sabbathā avigatattā bhavitvāvigatamattavasena kammañca “bhutvāvigatuppanna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1011_9: Na aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ viya rajjanādivasena anubhūtāpagataṃ javanaṃ uppajjitvā niruddhatāvasena bhūtāpagatañca saṅkhataṃ bhūtāpagatuppannanti.
tika-s0401t:1012_1: upādādittayaṃ anuppatvā niruddhaṃ bhūtāpagatasaṅkhātaṃ sesasaṅkhatañca bhūtāpagatuppannaṃ nāma.
tika-s0401t:1012_2: ‘Yānissa tāni pubbe katāni kammānī’ti evamādinā nayena vuttaṃ kammaṃ atītampi samānaṃ aññaṃ vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā attano vipākassokāsaṃ katvā ṭhitattā,
tika-s0401t:1012_3: tathākatokāsañca vipākaṃ anuppannampi samānaṃ evaṃ kate okāse ekantena uppajjanato okāsakatuppannaṃ nāmā”ti.
tika-s0401t:1013_0: Idha pana sammohavinodaniyaṃ vuttanayeneva bhutvāvigatuppannaṃ okāsakatuppannañca dassitaṃ. Vuttañhi,
tika-s0401t:1014_0: “Kamme pana jahite ārammaṇarasaṃ anubhavitvā niruddho vipāko bhutvāvigataṃ nāma.
tika-s0401t:1014_3: Kusalākusalaṃ kammaṃ aññakammassa vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā attano vipākassa okāsaṃ karoti.
tika-s0401t:1014_4: Evaṃ kate okāse vipāko uppajjamāno okāsakaraṇato paṭṭhāya uppannoti vuccati.
tika-s0401t:1015_1: “satipi sabbesampi cittuppādānaṃ saṃvedayitasabhāvā ārammaṇānubhavane savipallāse pana santāne cittābhisaṅkhāravasena
tika-s0401t:1015_2: pavattito abyākatehi visiṭṭho kusalākusalānaṃ sātisayo visayānubhavanākāro.
tika-s0401t:1015_3: Yathā vikappaggāhavasena rāgādīhi tabbipakkhehi ca akusalaṃ kusalañca nippariyāyato ārammaṇarasaṃ anubhavati,
tika-s0401t:1015_7: tasmā rajjanādivasena ārammaṇarasānubhavanaṃ sātisayanti akusalaṃ kusalañca uppajjitvā niruddhatāsāmaññena sesasaṅkhatañca bhūtāpagata”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1015_8: Sammohavinodaniyā pana vipākānubhavanavasena tadārammaṇaṃ avipakkapākassa sabbathā avigatattā bhavitvāvigatamattavasena
tika-s0401t:1015_12: tasmā idhāpi sammohavinodaniyaṃ vuttanayeneva bhutvāpagatuppannaṃ okāsakatuppannañca vibhattanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1016_0: Pañcakkhandhā pana vipassanāya bhūmi nāmāti sammasanassa ṭhānabhāvato vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1016_2: Anusayitakilesāti appahīnā maggena pahātabbā adhippetā. Tenāha –
tika-s0401t:1016_5: Hontu tāva “atītā”ti vā “paccuppannā”ti vā na vattabbā,
tika-s0401t:1016_7: nanu kāraṇalābhe uppajjanārahā appahīnaṭṭhena thāmagatā kilesā anusayāti vuccantīti?
tika-s0401t:1016_9: anāgatabhāvopi nesaṃ na paricchinno itarānāgatakkhandhānaṃ viyāti “anāgatā vāti na vattabbā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1016_10: Yadi hi nesaṃ paricchinno anāgatabhāvo siyā,
tika-s0401t:1016_13: paccayasamavāye pana uppajjanārahataṃ upādāya anāgatavohāro tattha veditabbo.
tika-s0401t:1017_0: Idaṃ bhūmiladdhuppannaṃ nāmāti idaṃ yathāvuttaṃ kilesajātaṃ appahīnaṭṭhena bhūmiladdhuppannaṃ nāma kāraṇalābhe sati vijjamānakiccakaraṇato.
tika-s0401t:1017_2: Ārammaṇakaraṇavasena hi bhavanti ettha kilesāti bhūmiyo,
tika-s0401t:1017_4: Asamugghātagatāti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ santāne anuppattidhammataṃ anāpāditatāya samugghātaṃ samucchedaṃ na gatāti asamugghātagatā.
tika-s0401t:1017_5: Bhūmiladdhuppannaṃ nāmāti ettha laddhabhūmikaṃ bhūmiladdhanti vuttaṃ aggiāhito viya.
tika-s0401t:1017_6: Okāsakatuppannasaddepi ca aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ āgatanayena okāso kato etena kusalākusalakammena,
tika-s0401t:1017_7: okāso kato etassa vipākassāti ca duvidhatthepi evameva katasaddassa paranipāto veditabbo.
tika-s0401t:1017_8: Idha pana okāsakatuppannasaddena vipākasseva gahitattā “okāso kato etassa vipākassā”ti evaṃ viggaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0401t:1018_2: Ārammaṇaṃ adhiggayha daḷhaṃ gahetvā pavattaṃ ārammaṇādhiggahituppannaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1018_5: Nimittaggāhavasena ārammaṇassa adhiggahitattā taṃ ārammaṇaṃ anussaritānussaritakkhaṇe kilesuppattihetubhāvena
tika-s0401t:1018_8: Ettha ca āhaṭakhīrarukkho viya nimittaggāhavasena adhiggahitaṃ ārammaṇaṃ,
tika-s0401t:1018_10: Nimittaggāhikā avikkhambhitakilesā vā puggalā vā āhaṭānāhaṭakhīrarukkhasadisā.
tika-s0401t:1018_12: Vitthāretabbanti “imasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne nuppajjissantī”ti na vattabbā. Kasmā?
tika-s0401t:1018_16: imasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne khīraṃ na nikkhameyyāti na vattabbaṃ, evaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1018_17: Idaṃ asamugghātituppannaṃ nāmāti evaṃ yojetvā vitthāretabbaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1019_6: Parāmaṭṭhoti diṭṭhiparāmāsena dhammasabhāvaṃ atikkamma parato āmaṭṭho.
tika-s0401t:1019_10: Yuganaddhāti pahātabbappahāyakayuge naddhā viya vattanakā ekakālikattā.
tika-s0401t:1020_1: Tikālikesupi kilesesu vāyāmābhāvadassanatthaṃ ajātaphalataruṇarukkho pāḷiyaṃ nidassito,
tika-s0401t:1020_2: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana jāto satto asamudāhaṭakileso nāma natthīti “jātaphalarukkhena dīpetabba”nti vatvā tamatthaṃ vivarituṃ “yathā hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1020_3: Atha vā maggena pahīnakilesānameva atītādibhedena tidhā navattabbataṃ pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ ajātaphalarukkho upamāvasena pāḷiyaṃ ābhato,
tika-s0401t:1020_5: Tattha yathā acchinne rukkhe nibbattanārahāni phalāni chinne anuppajjamānāni kadāci sasabhāvāni ahesuṃ, honti,
tika-s0401t:1020_7: evaṃ maggena pahīnakilesā ca daṭṭhabbā magge anuppanne uppattirahānaṃ uppanne sabbena sabbaṃ abhāvato.
tika-s0401t:1020_8: Yathā ca chede asati phalāni uppajjissantīti chedanassa sātthakatā,
tika-s0401t:1020_10: Nāpi na pajahatīti uppajjanārahānaṃ pajahanato vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1020_12: Maggassa uppajjanakiriyāya hi samudayappahānanibbānasachikaraṇakiriyā viya khandhānaṃ parijānanakiriyā lakkhīyati.
tika-s0401t:1021_0: Tepi pajahatiyevāti ye tehi kilesehi janetabbā upādinnakkhandhā,
tika-s0401t:1021_1: tepi pajahatiyeva tannimittassa abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇassa nirodhanato. Tenāha –
tika-s0401t:1021_6: Sabbabhavehi vuṭṭhātiyevātipi vadantīti arahattamaggo sabbabhavehi vuṭṭhātiyevāti vadanti taduppattito uddhaṃ bhavūpapattiyā kilesassapi abhāvato.
tika-s0401t:1022_6: tasmā tassa bhāvanā anuppannānaṃ uppādāya bhāvanā vuttāti yojetabbā.
tika-s0401t:1022_7: Vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti yāvatā maggassa pavattiyeva ṭhiti,
tika-s0401t:1023_1: Kattukamyatāchandaṃ adhipatiṃ karitvā paṭiladdhasamādhi chandasamādhīti āha –
tika-s0401t:1023_2: “chandaṃ nissāya pavatto samādhi chandasamādhī”ti padhānasaṅkhārāti catukiccasādhakassa sammappadhānavīriyassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tenāha –
tika-s0401t:1023_6: Atha vā taṃ taṃ visesaṃ saṅkharotīti saṅkhāro,
tika-s0401t:1023_10: Catubbidhassa pana vīriyassa adhippetattā bahuvacananiddeso kato.
tika-s0401t:1023_14: Ijjhanti vā etāya sattā iddhā vuddhā ukkaṃsagatā hontītipi iddhi.
tika-s0401t:1023_20: Tena hi yasmā uparūparivisesasaṅkhātaṃ iddhiṃ pajjanti pāpuṇanti,
tika-s0401t:1024_1: ijjhanti etāya sattā iddhā vuddhā ukkaṃsagatā hontīti iminā vā pariyāyena iddhīti saṅkhaṃ gatānaṃ upacārajjhānādikusalacittasampayuttānaṃ
tika-s0401t:1024_5: Sā eva ca tathāvuttā iddhi yasmā heṭṭhimā heṭṭhimā uparimāya uparimāya tayo chandasamādhippadhānasaṅkhārā pādabhūtā adhiṭṭhānabhūtā,
tika-s0401t:1024_7: Tathā heṭṭhā dhammā iddhipi honti iddhipādāpi,
tika-s0401t:1024_8: sesā pana sampayuttakā cattāro khandhā iddhipādāyeva.
tika-s0401t:1024_9: Vīriyacittavīmaṃsāsamādhippadhānasaṅkhārasaṅkhātāpi tayo tayo dhammā iddhipi honti iddhipādāpi,
tika-s0401t:1024_10: sesā pana sampayuttakā cattāro khandhā iddhipādāyeva.
tika-s0401t:1025_2: Ayamattho upacārena vā vipassanāya vā dīpetabbo.
tika-s0401t:1026_5: Chandādīsu ekanti chandādīsu catūsu ādito vuttattā ādibhūtaṃ ekaṃ padhānaṃ chandanti adhippāyo.
tika-s0401t:1026_8: Evaṃ sesāpīti etena vīriyaṃ cittaṃ vīmaṃsaṃ nissāya vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇantānaṃ vasena dutiyavīriyiddhipādādayo yojetabbāti dasseti.
tika-s0401t:1026_9: Iminā hi suttantena catunnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ matthakappattaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ dassitaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1026_12: natthi mayhaṃ etassa nibbattane bhāro”ti chandaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ chandaṃ dhuraṃ chandaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā lokuttaradhammaṃ nibbatteti.
tika-s0401t:1026_17: natthi mayhaṃ etassa nibbattane bhāro”ti paññaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ paññaṃ dhuraṃ paññaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā lokuttaradhammaṃ nibbatteti.
tika-s0401t:1027_1: Yathā hi catūsu amaccaputtesu ṭhānantaraṃ patthetvā vicarantesu eko upaṭṭhānaṃ avassayati,
tika-s0401t:1027_5: Tesu hi paṭhamo upaṭṭhāne appamādakāritāya atthanipphattiyā sati labbhamānaṃ “lacchāmetaṃ ṭhānantara”nti upaṭṭhānaṃ avassayati.
tika-s0401t:1027_6: Dutiyo upaṭṭhāne appamattopi “ekacco saṅgāme paccupaṭṭhite saṇṭhātuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-s0401t:1027_8: tasmiṃ kuppite rathassa purato kammaṃ katvā rājānaṃ ārādhetvā āharāpessāmetaṃ ṭhānantara”nti sūrabhāvaṃ avassayati.
tika-s0401t:1027_10: jātiṃ sodhetvā ṭhānantaraṃ dento mayhaṃ dassatī”ti jātiṃ avassayati.
tika-s0401t:1027_12: mantena kattabbakicce uppanne āharāpessāmetaṃ ṭhānantara”nti mantaṃ avassayati.
tika-s0401t:1027_13: Te sabbepi attano attano avassayabalena ṭhānantarāni pāpuṇiṃsu.
tika-s0401t:1028_0: Tattha upaṭṭhāne appamatto hutvā ṭhānantaraṃ patto viya chandaṃ avassāya kattukamyatākusaladhammacchandena
tika-s0401t:1028_2: natthi mayhaṃ etassa nibbattane sāro”ti chandaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ chandaṃ dhuraṃ chandaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā lokuttaradhammanibbattako
tika-s0401t:1028_4: So hi āyasmā “chande sati kathaṃ nānujānissantī”ti sattāhampi bhattāni abhuñjitvā mātāpitaro anujānāpetvā
tika-s0401t:1028_6: Sūrabhāvena rājānaṃ ārādhetvā ṭhānantaraṃ patto viya vīriyaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ vīriyaṃ dhuraṃ vīriyaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ
tika-s0401t:1028_8: So hi āyasmā vīriyaṃ dhuraṃ katvā lokuttaradhammaṃ nibbattesi.
tika-s0401t:1029_0: Jātisampattiyā ṭhānantaraṃ pattoviya cittaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ cittaṃ dhuraṃ cittaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā lokuttaradhammanibbattako daṭṭhabbo sambhūtatthero viya.
tika-s0401t:1029_1: So hi āyasmā cittaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ cittaṃ dhuraṃ cittaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā lokuttaradhammaṃ nibbattesi.
tika-s0401t:1029_2: Mantaṃ avassāya ṭhānantaraṃ patto viya vīmaṃsaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ vīmaṃsaṃ dhuraṃ vīmaṃsaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā
tika-s0401t:1029_4: So hi āyasmā vīmaṃsaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ vīmaṃsaṃ dhuraṃ vīmaṃsaṃ pubbaṅgamaṃ katvā lokuttaradhammaṃ nibbattesi.
tika-s0401t:1029_5: Tassa hi bhagavā “suññato lokaṃ avekkhassū”ti suññatākathaṃ kathesi.
tika-s0401t:1029_6: Paññānissitamānaniggahatthañca dvikkhattuṃ pucchito pañhaṃ na kathesi.
tika-s0401t:1029_7: Ettha ca punappunaṃ chanduppādanaṃ tosanaṃ viya hotīti chandassa upaṭṭhānasadisatā vuttā,
tika-s0401t:1030_2: Indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti anuvattanavasena sampayuttadhammesu indaṭṭhaṃ kāreti,
tika-s0401t:1030_3: tasmā ādhipateyyaṭṭhena saddhā eva indriyanti saddhindriyaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1031_0: Assaddhe puggale parivajjayatoti buddhādīsu pasādasinehābhāvena saddhārahite lūkhapuggale sabbaso vajjayato.
tika-s0401t:1031_1: Saddhe puggale sevatoti buddhādīsu saddhādhimutte vakkalittherasadise sevato.
tika-s0401t:1031_3: Paccavekkhatoti pāḷito atthato ca pati pati avekkhantassa cintentassa.
tika-s0401t:1031_4: Visujjhatīti paṭipakkhamalavigamato paccayavasena sabhāvasaṃsuddhito visuddhaphalanibbattito ca saddhindriyaṃ visujjhati.
tika-s0401t:1032_7: Vivaṭṭetvāti saṅkhārārammaṇato vivaṭṭetvā nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā.
tika-s0401t:1032_11: Na hi sampayuttadhammesu thirabhāvena vinā paṭipakkhehi akampiyatā sambhavati.
tika-s0401t:1032_12: Sampayuttadhammesu thirabhāveneva hi akusalānaṃ abyākatānañca nesaṃ balavabhāvūpapatti.
tika-s0401t:1033_7: udake alābu viya ārammaṇe plavitvā gantuṃ appadānaṃ,
tika-s0401t:1033_8: pāsāṇassa viya niccalassa ārammaṇassa ṭhapanaṃ sāraṇaṃ asammuṭṭhakaraṇaṃ apilāpanaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1033_11: sāyaṃ pātañca rājānaṃ issariyasampattiṃ sallakkhāpeti sāretīti attho.
tika-s0401t:1033_29: So hi dhammānaṃ kiccaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ katvā asseti “apilāpanalakkhaṇā sati,
tika-s0401t:1033_35: Yassa dhammassa balena sampayuttadhammā ārammaṇābhimukhā bhavanti, sā sati.
tika-s0401t:1033_42: Yā hītiādinā tameva saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivarati.
tika-s0401t:1033_43: “Yā hi ayaṃ dhammasāmaggī”ti etassa “bodhīti vuccatī”ti iminā sambandho.
tika-s0401t:1033_59: sabbalokiyakusalābhisaṅkhāravasena āyūhanā”ti evaṃ vuttesu sattasu pakāresu idha avuttānaṃ vasena veditabbā.
tika-s0401t:1034_0: Kilesasantānaniddāya uṭṭhahatīti etena sikhāppattavipassanāya sahagatānampi satiādīnaṃ bojjhaṅgabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0401t:1034_1: Vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā hi kilese nirodhentī eva pavattatīti.
tika-s0401t:1034_2: Cattāri vātiādinā pana maggaphalasahagatānaṃ bojjhaṅgabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0401t:1034_3: Sattahi bojjhaṅgehi bhāvitehi saccappaṭivedho hotīti kathamidaṃ jānitabbanti codanaṃ sandhāyāha –
tika-s0401t:1034_5: Jhānaṅgamaggaṅgādayo viyāti etena bodhibojjhaṅgasaddānaṃ samudāyāvayavavisayataṃ dasseti.
tika-s0401t:1034_6: Senaṅgarathaṅgādayo viyāti etena puggalapaññattiyā avijjamānapaññattibhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-s0401t:1035_0: Bodhāya saṃvattantīti bojjhaṅgāti kāraṇattho aṅgasaddoti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1035_4: Vipassanādīnaṃ kāraṇādīnaṃ bujjhitabbānañca saccānaṃ anurūpaṃ paccakkhabhāvena paṭimukhaṃ aviparītatāya
tika-s0401t:1035_5: sammā ca bujjhantīti evaṃ atthavisesadīpakehi upasaggehi “anubujjhantī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1035_6: Bodhisaddo hi sabbavisesayuttabujjhanaṃ sāmaññena saṅgaṇhāti. Saṃ-
tika-s0401t:1035_7: saddo pasaṃsāyaṃ sundarabhāve ca dissatīti āha –
tika-s0401t:1036_1: Tattha dhammeti catusaccadhamme tabbinimuttassa sabhāvadhammassa abhāvato.
tika-s0401t:1037_3: Paggahalakkhaṇanti kosajjapakkhe patituṃ adatvā sampayuttadhammānaṃ paggahalakkhaṇaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1039_0: Kāyacittadarathappassambhanatoti kāyadarathassa cittadarathassa ca passambhanato vūpasamanato. Tenāha –
tika-s0401t:1040_6: Nhānīyacuṇṇassa udakaṃ viya sampayuttadhammānaṃ sampiṇḍanakiccatāya avisārabhāvena lakkhitabbo avisāralakkhaṇo.
tika-s0401t:1040_7: Nivāte dīpacciṭṭhiti viya cetaso ṭhitibhāvena paccupatiṭṭhatīti cittaṭṭhitipaccupaṭṭhāno.
tika-s0401t:1041_0: Ajjhupekkhanatoti samappavattesu assesu sārathi viya sampayuttadhammānaṃ ajjhupekkhanato.
tika-s0401t:1041_2: Samavāhitalakkhaṇāti samaṃ avisamaṃ yathāsakakiccesu sampayuttadhammānaṃ pavattanalakkhaṇā.
tika-s0401t:1041_4: yathā rājā tuṇhī nisinnopi atthakaraṇe dhammaṭṭhe yathāsakaṃ kiccesu appamatto pavatteti.
tika-s0401t:1041_7: idaṃ atirekatarakicca”nti evaṃ pakkhapātanavasena viya pavatti pakkhapāto,
tika-s0401t:1041_10: Bojjhaṅgānaṃ uparūpari uppādanameva brūhanaṃ vaḍḍhanañcāti āha –
tika-s0401t:1042_2: Taṃ sabbattha satokāribhāvāvahattā satisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya hoti.
tika-s0401t:1042_3: Yathā paccanīkadhammappahānaṃ anurūpadhammasevanā ca anuppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ uppādāya hoti,
tika-s0401t:1042_6: tattha ca yuttatā satisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya hotīti imamatthaṃ dasseti,
tika-s0401t:1042_12: asite pīte khāyite sāyite sampajānakārī hoti,
tika-s0401t:1042_14: gate ṭhite nisinne sutte jāgarite bhāsite tuṇhībhāve sampajānakārī hotī”ti evaṃ vuttesu abhikkantādīsu sattasu ṭhānesu.
tika-s0401t:1042_15: Tissadattatthero nāma yo bodhimaṇḍe suvaṇṇasalākaṃ gahetvā “aṭṭhārasasu bhāsāsu katarabhāsāya dhammaṃ kathemī”ti parisaṃ padhāresi.
tika-s0401t:1043_1: Ācariye payirupāsitvā pañcapi nikāye saha aṭṭhakathāya pariyogāhetvā yaṃ yaṃ tattha gaṇṭhiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ,
tika-s0401t:1043_3: imassa ko attho”ti khandhāyatanādiatthaṃ pucchantassa hi dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo uppajjati. Tenāha –
tika-s0401t:1044_0: Vatthuvisadakiriyāti ettha cittacetasikānaṃ pavattiṭṭhānabhāvato sarīraṃ tappaṭibaddhāni cīvarādīni ca vatthūnīti adhippetāni.
tika-s0401t:1044_5: Sedamalamakkhitanti sedena ceva jallikāsaṅkhātena sarīramalena ca makkhitaṃ. Ca-
tika-s0401t:1044_6: saddena aññampi sarīrassa pīḷāvahaṃ accāsanādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0401t:1044_15: Te hi cittuppādā cittekaggatāya aparisuddhabhāvāya saṃvattanti.
tika-s0401t:1044_20: atha kho tasmiṃ aparisuddhe ñāṇampi aparisuddhaṃ hotī”ti nissayāparisuddhiyā taṃnissitāparisuddhi viya
tika-s0401t:1045_2: saddheyyavatthusmiṃ paccayavasena adhimokkhakiccassa paṭutarabhāvena paññāya avisadatāya vīriyādīnañca sithilatādinā saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ hoti. Tenāha –
tika-s0401t:1045_6: Kosajjapakkhe patituṃ adatvā sampayuttadhammānaṃ paggaṇhanaṃ anubalappadānaṃ paggaho.
tika-s0401t:1045_14: Rūpagataṃ viya cakkhunā yena yāthāvato visayasabhāvaṃ passati,
tika-s0401t:1045_15: taṃ dassanakiccaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti balavatā saddhindriyena adhibhūtattā.
tika-s0401t:1045_16: Sahajātadhammesu hi indaṭṭhaṃ kārentānaṃ sahapavattamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ ekadesatāvaseneva atthasiddhi,
tika-s0401t:1045_20: Dhammasabhāvapaccavekkhaṇenāti yassa saddheyyassa vatthuno uḷāratādiguṇe adhimuccanassa sātisayappavattiyā saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ jātaṃ,
tika-s0401t:1045_22: Evañhi evaṃdhammatānayena yāthāvasarasato pariggayhamāne savipphāro adhimokkho na hoti “ayaṃ imesaṃ dhammānaṃ
tika-s0401t:1045_24: Dhuriyadhammesu hi yathā saddhāya balavabhāve paññāya mandabhāvo hoti,
tika-s0401t:1045_25: evaṃ paññāya balavabhāve saddhāya mandabhāvo hoti.
tika-s0401t:1046_0: Tathā amanasikārenāti yenākārena bhāvanamanuyuñjantassa saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ jātaṃ,
tika-s0401t:1046_2: Idha duvidhena saddhindriyassa balavabhāvo attano vā paccayavisesena kiccuttariyato vīriyādīnaṃ vā mandakiccatāya.
tika-s0401t:1046_4: dutiyavikappe pana yathā manasikaroto vīriyādīnaṃ mandakiccatāya saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ jātaṃ,
tika-s0401t:1046_5: tathā amanasikārena vīriyādīnaṃ paṭukiccabhāvāvahena manasikārena saddhindriyaṃ tehi samarasaṃ karontena hāpetabbaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1047_0: Vakkalittheravatthūti so hi āyasmā saddhādhimuttatāya katādhikāro satthu rūpadassanappasuto eva hutvā viharanto satthārā “kiṃ te, vakkali,
tika-s0401t:1047_1: iminā pūtikāyena diṭṭhena, yo kho, vakkali,
tika-s0401t:1047_3: so maṃ passatī”tiādinā nayena ovaditvā kammaṭṭhāne niyojitopi taṃ ananuyuñjanto paṇāmito attānaṃ vinipātetuṃ papātaṭṭhānaṃ abhiruhi.
tika-s0401t:1047_4: Atha naṃ satthā yathānisinnova obhāsavissajjanena attānaṃ dassetvā –
tika-s0401t:1050_2: So teneva amatena abhisitto haṭṭhatuṭṭho hutvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapesi,
tika-s0401t:1050_3: saddhāya pana balavabhāvena vipassanāvīthiṃ na otari.
tika-s0401t:1050_4: Taṃ ñatvā bhagavā tassa indriyasamattappaṭipādanāya kammaṭṭhānaṃ sodhetvā adāsi.
tika-s0401t:1050_5: So satthārā dinnanaye ṭhatvā vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā maggappaṭipāṭiyā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
tika-s0401t:1050_12: Hāpetabbanti yathā saddhindriyassa balavabhāvo dhammasabhāvapaccavekkhaṇena hāyati,
tika-s0401t:1050_13: evaṃ vīriyindriyassa adhimattatā passaddhiādibhāvanāya hāyati samādhipakkhiyattā tassā.
tika-s0401t:1050_14: Tathā hi samādhindriyassa adhimattataṃ kosajjapātato rakkhantī vīriyādibhāvanā viya vīriyindriyassa adhimattataṃ
tika-s0401t:1051_1: So hi āyasmā satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā sītavane viharanto “mama sarīraṃ sukhumālaṃ,
tika-s0401t:1051_2: na ca sakkā sukheneva sukhaṃ adhigantuṃ,
tika-s0401t:1051_3: kilametvāpi samaṇadhammo kātabbo”ti ṭhānacaṅkamameva adhiṭṭhāya padhānamanuyuñjanto pādatalesu phoṭesu
tika-s0401t:1051_4: uṭṭhitesupi vedanaṃ ajjhupekkhitvā daḷhavīriyaṃ karonto accāraddhavīriyatāya visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ nāsakkhi.
tika-s0401t:1051_5: Satthā tattha gantvā vīṇūpamovādena ovaditvā vīriyasamatāyojanavidhiṃ dassento kammaṭṭhānaṃ visodhetvā gijjhakūṭaṃ gato.
tika-s0401t:1051_6: Theropi satthārā dinnanayena vīriyasamataṃ yojetvā bhāvento vipassanampi ussukkāpetvā arahatte patiṭṭhāsi.
tika-s0401t:1052_2: Yathā hi saddhāpaññānaṃ visuṃ dhuriyadhammabhūtānaṃ kiccato aññamaññānativattanaṃ visesato icchitabbaṃ,
tika-s0401t:1052_4: evaṃ samādhivīriyānaṃ kosajjuddhaccapakkhikānaṃ samarasatāya sati aññamaññūpatthambhanato sampayuttadhammānaṃ
tika-s0401t:1052_11: Tathā hi avatthusmiṃ pasīdati seyyathāpi titthiyasāvakā.
tika-s0401t:1052_13: Saddhāhīnāya paññāya atidhāvanto “deyyavatthupariccāgena vinā cittuppādamattenapi dānamayaṃ puññaṃ hotī”tiādīni
tika-s0401t:1052_18: Yathā cettha saddhāpaññānaṃ aññamaññaṃ samabhāvo atthāvaho,
tika-s0401t:1053_3: Saddahantoti “pathavī pathavīti manasikaraṇamattena kathaṃ jhānuppattī”ti acintetvā “addhā sammāsambuddhena
tika-s0401t:1053_5: Okappentoti ārammaṇaṃ anuppavisitvā viya adhimuccanavasena avakappento pakkhandanto.
tika-s0401t:1053_8: Samādhikammikassa samādhino adhimattatā viya paññāya adhimattatāpi icchitabbāti āha –
tika-s0401t:1053_13: Lokuttarappanā pana tesaṃ samabhāveneva icchitā. Yathāha –
tika-s0401t:1054_0: Yadi visesato saddhāpaññānaṃ samādhivīriyānañca samatāva icchitā,
tika-s0401t:1054_6: Tathā hi kosajjapakkhikena ca samādhināicceva vuttaṃ,
tika-s0401t:1054_12: Sabbattha niyuttā sabbatthikā sabbattha līne uddhate ca citte icchitabbattā,
tika-s0401t:1054_13: sabbena vā līnuddhaccapakkhiyena bojjhaṅgagaṇena atthetabbāti sabbatthā,
tika-s0401t:1054_16: Tassa hi satipaṭisaraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya. Tenāha –
tika-s0401t:1055_2: Taruṇavipassanāsamaṅgīpi bhāvanāmayañāṇe ṭhitattā ekaṃsato paññavā eva nāma hotīti āha –
tika-s0401t:1055_7: Tañhi ñeyyaṃ tādisāya paññāya caritabbato gambhīrañāṇacariyaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1055_8: Tassā vā paññāya tattha pabhedato pavatti gambhīrañāṇacariyā,
tika-s0401t:1056_0: Pañcavidhabandhanakammakāraṇaṃ niraye nibbattasattassa yebhuyyena sabbapaṭhamaṃ karontīti devadūtasuttādīsu ādito vuttattā ca āha –
tika-s0401t:1056_3: saddena tadaññaṃ manussehi tiracchānehi ca vibādhitabbakālaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-s0401t:1056_4: Ekaṃ buddhantaranti idaṃ aparāparesu petesuyeva uppajjanakasattavasena vuttaṃ,
tika-s0401t:1056_5: ekaccānaṃ vā petānaṃ ekaccatiracchānānaṃ viya dīghāyukatā siyāti tathā vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1056_6: Tathā hi kāḷo nāgarājā catunnaṃ buddhānaṃ sammukhībhāvaṃ labhitvā ṭhitopi metteyyassapi bhagavato sammukhībhāvaṃ labhissatīti vadanti,
tika-s0401t:1057_0: Evaṃ ānisaṃsadassāvinoti vīriyāyatto eva sabbo lokiyo lokuttaro ca visesādhigamoti evaṃ vīriye ānisaṃsadassanasīlassa.
tika-s0401t:1057_4: Sā hi “bhikkhuno vaṭṭaniyyānāya gantabbā paṭipajjitabbā paṭipadā”ti katvā gamanavīthi nāma.
tika-s0401t:1058_2: Paccayadāyakānaṃ attani kārassa attano sammāpaṭipattiyā mahapphalabhāvassa karaṇena piṇḍassa bhikkhāya paṭipūjanā piṇḍapātāpacāyanaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1059_1: Taṃ saddaṃ sutvāti taṃ upāsikāya vacanaṃ paṇṇasālādvāre ṭhitova pañcābhiññatāya dibbasotena sutvā.
tika-s0401t:1059_5: Dātuṃ sakkhissasīti tayi katena dānamayena veyyāvaccamayena ca puññakammena khettavisesabhāvūpagamanena
tika-s0401t:1059_6: aparāparaṃ devamanussānaṃ sampattiyo ante nibbānasampattiñca dātuṃ sakkhissasīti thero attānaṃ pucchati.
tika-s0401t:1059_7: Sitaṃ karontoti “akiccheneva mayā vaṭṭadukkhaṃ samatikkanta”nti paccavekkhaṇāvasāne sañjātapāmojjavasena sitaṃ karonto.
tika-s0401t:1060_1: tadā bhikkhusaṅghassa sulabhā paccayā hontīti paccayahetukā cittapīḷā natthīti adhippāyo.
tika-s0401t:1060_9: Evanti yathā asammāpaṭipanno putto tāya eva asammāpaṭipattiyā kulasantānato bāhiro hutvā pitu santikā dāyajjassa na bhāgī,
tika-s0401t:1060_10: evaṃ kusītopi teneva kusītabhāvena na sammāpaṭipanno satthu santikā laddhabbaariyadhanadāyajjassa na bhāgī.
tika-s0401t:1061_1: Taṃ panassa guṇamahattaṃ dasasahassilokadhātukampanena loke pākaṭanti dassento “satthuno hī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0401t:1062_0: Yasmā satthusāsane pabbajitassa pabbajjūpagamanena sakyaputtiyabhāvo sañjāyati,
tika-s0401t:1063_0: Alasānaṃ bhāvanāya nāmamattampi ajānantānaṃ kāyadaḷhībahulānaṃ yāvadatthaṃ bhuñjitvā seyyasukhādianuyuñjanakānaṃ
tika-s0401t:1063_1: tiracchānagatikānaṃ puggalānaṃ dūrato vajjanā kusītapuggalaparivajjanāti āha –
tika-s0401t:1063_3: “Divasaṃ caṅkamena nisajjāya āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi cittaṃ parisodhessāmā”tiādinā bhāvanārambhavasena āraddhavīriyānaṃ
tika-s0401t:1063_4: daḷhaparakkamānaṃ kālena kālaṃ upasaṅkamanā āraddhavīriyapuggalasevanāti āha –
tika-s0401t:1063_6: Visuddhimagge pana jātimahattapaccavekkhaṇā sabrahmacārimahattapaccavekkhaṇāti idaṃ dvayaṃ na gahitaṃ,
tika-s0401t:1063_8: Tattha ānisaṃsadassāvitāya eva sammappadhānapaccavekkhaṇā gahitā hoti lokiyalokuttaravisesādhigamassa vīriyāyattatādassanabhāvato,
tika-s0401t:1063_9: thinamiddhavinodanaṃ pana tadadhimuttatāya eva gahitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0401t:1064_2: Sakalasarīraṃ pharamānoti pītisamuṭṭhānehi paṇītarūpehi sakalasarīraṃ pharamāno,
tika-s0401t:1064_3: dhammasaṅghaguṇe anussarantassapi yāva upacārā sakalasarīraṃ pharamāno pītisambojjhaṅgo uppajjatīti evaṃ sesaanussatīsu,
tika-s0401t:1064_4: pasādanīyasuttantapaccavekkhaṇāya ca yojetabbaṃ tassāpi vimuttāyatanabhāvena taggatikattā.
tika-s0401t:1064_7: na samudācarantīti idaṃ upasamānussatiyā vasena vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1064_8: Saṅkhārānañhi vasena sappadesavūpasamepi nippadesavūpasame viya tathā saññāya pavattito bhāvanāmanasikāro
tika-s0401t:1064_9: kilesavikkhambhanasamattho hutvā upacārasamādhiṃ āvahanto tathārūpapītisomanassasamannāgato pītisambojjhaṅgassa
tika-s0401t:1064_15: tasmā taṃ nesaṃ asamudācāraṃ paccavekkhantassāti yojanā.
tika-s0401t:1064_16: Na hi kilese paccavekkhantassa bojjhaṅguppatti yuttā,
tika-s0401t:1065_2: Tañhi tividhampi sappāyaṃ seviyamānaṃ kāyassa kalyatāpādanavasena cittassa kalyataṃ āvahantaṃ duvidhāyapi passaddhiyā kāraṇaṃ hoti.
tika-s0401t:1065_5: Ete ubho ante anupagamma yathāsakaṃ kammunā hotīti ayaṃ majjhimā paṭipatti.
tika-s0401t:1067_3: Asubhanimittādikassapi hi yassa kassaci jhānuppattinimittassa uggahakosallaṃ nimittakusalatā evāti.
tika-s0401t:1067_6: Tassa paggaṇhananti tassa līnassa cittassa dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādisamuṭṭhāpanena layāpattito samuddharaṇaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1068_12: So tattha sukkhāni ceva tiṇāni pakkhipeyya,
tika-s0401t:1068_17: bhabbo nu kho so puriso parittaṃ aggiṃ ujjāletunti? Evaṃ,
tika-s0401t:1069_0: Ettha ca yathāsakaṃ āhāravasena dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādīnaṃ bhāvanā samuṭṭhāpanāti veditabbā,
tika-s0401t:1070_2: Tassa niggaṇhananti tassa uddhatassa cittassa samādhisambojjhaṅgādisamuṭṭhāpanena uddhatāpattito nisedhanaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1071_12: so tattha allāni ceva tiṇāni pakkhipeyya,
tika-s0401t:1071_17: bhabbo nu kho so puriso mahantaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ nibbāpetunti? Evaṃ,
tika-s0401t:1072_0: Etthāpi yathāsakaṃ āhāravasena passaddhisambojjhaṅgādīnaṃ bhāvanā samuṭṭhāpanāti veditabbā.
tika-s0401t:1073_4: Tattha yadā paññā na balavatī hoti,
tika-s0401t:1073_5: tadā bhāvanā pubbenāparaṃ visesāvahā na hoti.
tika-s0401t:1073_9: Tathā bhāvanāya sammadeva avīthipaṭipattiyā upasamasukhaṃ na vindati,
tika-s0401t:1073_14: Tassa saṃveguppādanaṃ pasāduppādanañca tikicchananti taṃ dassento,
tika-s0401t:1073_16: Tattha jātijarābyādhimaraṇāni yathārahaṃ sugatiyaṃ duggatiyañca hontīti tadaññameva pañcavidhabandhanādikhuppipāsādiaññamaññaviheṭhanādihetukaṃ
tika-s0401t:1073_18: Tayidaṃ sabbaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ paccuppannabhavanissitaṃ gahitanti atīte anāgate ca kāle vaṭṭamūlakadukkhāni visuṃ gahitāni.
tika-s0401t:1073_21: tesaṃ aññehi asādhāraṇajīvitadukkhaṃ aṭṭhamaṃ saṃvegavatthu gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1073_22: Ayaṃ vuccati samaye sampahaṃsanatāti ayaṃ bhāvanācittassa sampahaṃsitabbasamaye vuttanayeneva saṃvegajananavasena
tika-s0401t:1074_0: Sammāpaṭipattiṃ āgammāti līnuddhaccavirahena samathavīthipaṭipattiyā ca sammā avisamaṃ sammadeva bhāvanāpaṭipattiṃ āgamma.
tika-s0401t:1074_12: Ayaṃ vuccati samaye ajjhupekkhanatāti ayaṃ ajjhupekkhitabbasamaye bhāvanācittassa paggahaniggahasampahaṃsanesu
tika-s0401t:1074_14: Paṭipakkhavikkhambhanato vipassanāya adhiṭṭhānabhāvūpagamanato ca upacārajjhānampi samādhānakiccanipphattiyā
tika-s0401t:1074_17: Esa uppajjatīti esa samādhisambojjhaṅgo anuppanno uppajjati.
tika-s0401t:1075_0: Anurodhavirodhappahānavasena majjhattabhāvo upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa kāraṇaṃ tasmiṃ sati sijjhanato,
tika-s0401t:1075_2: so ca majjhattabhāvo visayavasena duvidhoti āha –
tika-s0401t:1075_4: Tadubhayena ca virujjhanaṃ passaddhisambojjhaṅgabhāvanāya eva dūrīkatanti anurujjhanasseva pahānavidhiṃ dassetuṃ –
tika-s0401t:1075_17: Sati hi attani tassa kiñcanabhāvena cīvaraṃ aññaṃ vā kiñci attaniyaṃ nāma siyā,
tika-s0401t:1076_0: Mamāyatīti mamattaṃ karoti, mamāti taṇhāya pariggayha tiṭṭhati. Dhanāyantāti dhanaṃ dabbaṃ karontā.
tika-s0401t:1077_3: Caturaṅgasamannāgatā vācā janaṃ saṅgaṇhātīti tabbipakkhaviratisabhāvā sammāvācā bhedakaramicchāvācāpahānena
tika-s0401t:1077_4: jane sampayutte ca pariggaṇhanakiccavatī hotīti “pariggahalakkhaṇā”ti vuttā.
tika-s0401t:1077_5: Visaṃvādanādikiccatāya hi lūkhānaṃ apariggāhakānaṃ musāvādādīnaṃ paṭipakkhabhūtā siniddhabhāvena pariggahaṇasabhāvā
tika-s0401t:1077_6: sammājappanakiccā sammāvācā tappaccayasubhāsitasampaṭiggāhake jane sampayuttadhamme ca pariggaṇhantī
tika-s0401t:1077_8: Yathā cīvarakammādippayogasaṅkhāto kammanto kātabbaṃ cīvararajanādikaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti nipphādeti,
tika-s0401t:1077_9: taṃtaṃkiriyānipphādako vā cetanāsaṅkhāto kammanto hatthacalanādikaṃ kiriyaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti,
tika-s0401t:1077_10: evaṃ sāvajjakattabbakiriyāsamuṭṭhāpakamicchākammantappahānena sammākammanto niravajjassa kattabbassa niravajjākārena samuṭṭhāpanakiccavā hotīti āha –
tika-s0401t:1077_12: Sampayuttadhammānaṃ vā ukkhipanaṃ samuṭṭhāpanaṃ kāyikakiriyāya bhārukkhipanaṃ viya.
tika-s0401t:1077_15: ājīvasseva vā sammadeva sodhanaṃ vodāpanaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti sammāvodāpanalakkhaṇo.
tika-s0401t:1077_16: Atha vā kāyavācānaṃ khandhasantānassa ca saṃkilesabhūtamicchāājīvappahānena sammāājīvo “vodāpanalakkhaṇo”ti vutto.
tika-s0401t:1078_0: Paññāya kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pubbaṅgamabhāvato sabbepi akusalā dhammā tassā paṭipakkhāvāti vuttaṃ –
tika-s0401t:1078_2: Atha vā attano paccanīkakilesā diṭṭhekaṭṭhā avijjādayo paññāya ujupaccanīkabhāvato.
tika-s0401t:1078_3: Passatīti passantī viya hoti vibandhābhāvato. Tenāha –
tika-s0401t:1078_9: Tathevāti iminā attano paccanīkakilesehi saddhinti imamatthaṃ anukaḍḍhati.
tika-s0401t:1079_0: Esā sammādiṭṭhi nāmāti lokiyaṃ lokuttarañca ekajjhaṃ katvā vadati missakatābhāvato. Tenāha –
tika-s0401t:1079_3: Kiccatoti pubbabhāge dukkhādīhi ñāṇehi kātabbakiccassa idha nipphattito,
tika-s0401t:1079_7: Sikkhāpadavibhaṅge “viraticetanā taṃsampayuttā ca dhammā sikkhāpadānī”ti vuttāni,
tika-s0401t:1079_8: tattha padhānānaṃ viraticetanānaṃ vasena “viratiyopi honti cetanādayopī”ti āha.
tika-s0401t:1079_9: “Sammā vadati etāyā”tiādinā atthasambhavato sammāvācādayo tayo viratiyopi honti cetanādayopi.
tika-s0401t:1079_14: Atha vā ekassa ñāṇassa dukkhādiñāṇatā viya ekāya viratiyā musāvādādiviratibhāvo viya ca ekāya cetanāya
tika-s0401t:1080_2: Pubbabhāgepi maggakkhaṇepi sammāsamādhi evāti yadipi samādhiupakārakānaṃ abhiniropanānumajjanasampiyāyanabrūhanasantasukhānaṃ
tika-s0401t:1080_3: vitakkādīnaṃ vasena catūhi jhānehi sammāsamādhi vibhatto,
tika-s0401t:1080_5: sati viya ca asubhāsukhāniccānattesu kāyādīsu subhādisaññāpahānalakkhaṇaṃ catusatikiccaṃ,
tika-s0401t:1080_6: eko samādhi catujjhānasamādhikiccaṃ na sādhetīti pubbabhāgepi paṭhamajjhānasamādhi,
tika-s0401t:1081_2: udāhu kañci visesaṃ upādāyā”ti vicāraṇāyaṃ kañci visesaṃ upādāyāti dassento āha –
tika-s0401t:1081_4: Tattha bhāvanānubhāvā hitaphalāya sātisayaṃ tikkhavisadabhāvappattiyā acchariyabbhutasamatthatāyogena
tika-s0401t:1081_5: sabbaso paṭipakkhavidhamanena yāthāvato dhammasabhāvabodhanena ca sammādiṭṭhiyā bahukāratā veditabbā.  Tenāha –
tika-s0401t:1083_0: Vacībhedassa kārako vitakko sāvajjānavajjavacībhedanivattanappavattanākārāya sammāvācāyapi upakārako evāti āha –
tika-s0401t:1083_3: Sammāsaṅkappo hi saccavācāya virativācāyapi visesapaccayo micchāsaṅkappatadekaṭṭhakilesappahānato.
tika-s0401t:1084_0: Saṃvidahitvātiādīsu sammā vidahanaṃ kammantappayojanañca ekantānavajjavacīkāyakammavasena icchitabbanti
tika-s0401t:1084_1: virativācāvasena saṃvidahanaṃ viratikammantasseva payojanañca nidassitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1084_2: Evaṃ hissa sammāvācāya sammākammantassāpi bahukāratā jotitā siyā.
tika-s0401t:1084_3: Vacībhedaniyāmikā hi vacīduccaritavirati kāyikakiriyaniyāmikāya kāyaduccaritaviratiyā upakārikā.
tika-s0401t:1084_4: Tathā hi visaṃvādanādimicchāvācato avirato micchākammantatopi na viramateva. Yathāha –
tika-s0401t:1084_7: Tasmā avisaṃvādanādisammāvācāya ṭhito sammākammantampi pūretiyevāti vacīduccaritavirati kāyaduccaritaviratiyā upakārikā.
tika-s0401t:1086_3: Sūpaṭṭhitāti bahiddhāvikkhepaṃ pahāya suṭṭhu upaṭṭhitā kātabbā.
tika-s0401t:1087_1: Yathā itthīsu kathā pavattā adhitthīti vuccati,
tika-s0401t:1087_3: “Evaṃ pavattamānā mayaṃ ‘attā’ti gahaṇaṃ gamissāmā”ti iminā viya adhippāyena attānaṃ adhikicca uddissa pavattā sattasantatipariyāpannā ajjhattaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1087_6: Parikammavasena ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññīti parikammakaraṇavasena ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī,
tika-s0401t:1087_8: Na hi paṭibhāganimittārammaṇā appanā ajjhattavisayā sambhavati.
tika-s0401t:1087_9: Taṃ pana ajjhattaṃ parikammavasena laddhaṃ kasiṇanimittaṃ avisuddhameva hoti,
tika-s0401t:1087_10: na bahiddhā parikammavasena laddhaṃ viya visuddhaṃ. Tenāha –
tika-s0401t:1088_0: Yassevaṃ parikammaṃ ajjhattaṃ uppannanti yassa puggalassa evaṃ vuttappakārena ajjhattaṃ parikammaṃ jātaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1088_1: Nimittaṃ pana bahiddhāti paṭibhāganimittaṃ sasantatipariyāpannaṃ na hotīti bahiddhā.
tika-s0401t:1088_4: Parittavasenevāti vaṇṇavasena ābhoge vijjamānepi parittavaseneva idaṃ abhibhāyatanaṃ vuttaṃ parittatā hettha abhibhavanassa kāraṇaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1088_8: Abhibhavitabbaṃ vā ārammaṇasaṅkhātaṃ āyatanaṃ etassāti abhibhāyatanaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1088_9: Atha vā ārammaṇābhibhavanato abhibhu ca taṃ āyatanañca yogino sukhavisesānaṃ adhiṭṭhānabhāvato manāyatanadhammāyatanabhāvato
tika-s0401t:1088_14: Abhibhavitvā samāpajjatīti ettha abhibhavanaṃ samāpajjanañca upacārajjhānādhigamanasamanantarameva appanājhānuppādananti āha –
tika-s0401t:1089_0: Ettha ca keci “uppanne upacārajjhāne taṃ ārabbha ye heṭṭhimantena dve tayo javanavārā pavattanti,
tika-s0401t:1089_2: tadanantaraṃ bhavaṅgaparivāsena upacārasevanāya ca vinā appanā hoti,
tika-s0401t:1089_6: nāpi mahaggatappamāṇajjhānesu viya upacārajjhāne ekantato paccavekkhaṇā icchitabbā.
tika-s0401t:1089_7: Tasmā upacārajjhānādhigamato paraṃ katipayabhavaṅgacittāvasāne appanaṃ pāpuṇanto “saha nimittuppādenevettha appanaṃ pāpetī”ti vutto.
tika-s0401t:1089_11: Na antosamāpattiyaṃ tadā tathārūpassa ābhogassa asambhavato.
tika-s0401t:1089_12: Samāpattito vuṭṭhitassa ābhogo pubbabhāgabhāvanāvasena jhānakkhaṇe pavattaṃ abhibhavanākāraṃ gahetvā pavattoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1089_14: Antosamāpattiyaṃ tadā tathā ābhogābhāve kasmā jhānasaññāyapīti vuttanti āha –
tika-s0401t:1090_1: na ekaṅguladvaṅgulādivaḍḍhiṃ pāpitāni tathā vaḍḍhanassevettha asambhavato. Tenāha –
tika-s0401t:1092_0: “Ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati parittāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni.
tika-s0401t:1092_1: Ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati appamāṇāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni.
tika-s0401t:1092_2: Ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati parittāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni.
tika-s0401t:1092_3: Ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati appamāṇāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇānī”ti –
tika-s0401t:1093_1: Abhidhamme pana “ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati parittāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni,
tika-s0401t:1094_0: “Kasmā pana yathā suttante ‘ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati parittānī’tiādi vuttaṃ,
tika-s0401t:1094_1: evaṃ avatvā idha catūsupi abhibhāyatanesu ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññitāva vuttāti.
tika-s0401t:1094_3: Tattha vā hi idha vā bahiddhā rūpāneva abhibhavitabbāni,
tika-s0401t:1095_0: Tatrāpi idhapi vuttāni “ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññīti idaṃ pana satthu desanāvilāsamattamevā”ti.
tika-s0401t:1095_2: idha vaṇṇābhogarahitāni sahitāni ca sabbāni parittāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni abhibhuyyāti.
tika-s0401t:1095_4: Abhidhamme pana nippariyāyadesanattā vaṇṇābhogarahitāni visuṃ vuttāni,
tika-s0401t:1095_7: Tathā idha pariyāyadesanattā vimokkhānampi abhibhavanapariyāyo atthīti “ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī”tiādinā paṭhamadutiyaabhibhāyatanesu paṭhamavimokkho,
tika-s0401t:1095_10: Abhidhamme pana nippariyāyadesanattā vimokkhābhibhāyatanāni asaṅkarato desetuṃ vimokkhe vajjetvā abhibhāyatanāni kathitāni.
tika-s0401t:1095_11: Sabbāni ca vimokkhakiccāni jhānāni vimokkhadesanāyaṃ vuttāni.
tika-s0401t:1095_12: Tadetaṃ “ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī”ti āgatassa abhibhāyatanadvayassa abhidhamme abhibhāyatanesu avacanato “rūpī
tika-s0401t:1095_13: rūpāni passatī”tiādīnañca sabbavimokkhakiccasādhāraṇavacanabhāvato vavatthānaṃ katanti viññāyati.
tika-s0401t:1096_0: Ajjhattarūpānaṃ anabhibhavanīyatoti idaṃ abhidhamme katthacipi “ajjhattarūpāni passatī”ti avatvā sabbattha yaṃ vuttaṃ –
tika-s0401t:1096_3: Tena yaṃ aññahetukaṃ suttante “bahiddhā rūpāni passatī”ti vacanaṃ,
tika-s0401t:1096_5: Yaṃ pana desanāvilāsahetukaṃ ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññitāya eva abhidhamme vacanaṃ,
tika-s0401t:1096_6: na tassa aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ maggitabbanti dasseti.
tika-s0401t:1096_7: Ajjhattarūpānaṃ anabhibhavanīyatā ca tesaṃ bahiddhārūpānaṃ viya avibhūtattā.
tika-s0401t:1096_8: Desanāvilāso ca yathāvuttavavatthānavasena veditabbo veneyyajjhāsayavasena vijjamānapariyāyakathanabhāvato.
tika-s0401t:1096_9: Desanāvilāso hi nāma veneyyajjhāsayānurūpaṃ vijjamānassa ca pariyāyassa vibhāvanaṃ,
tika-s0401t:1096_11: tasmā “idha pariyāyadesanattā”tiādinā vuttappakāraṃ vavatthānaṃ desanāvilāsanibandhananti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1097_0: Suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇānīti eteneva siddhattā na nīlādiabhibhāyatanāni vattabbānīti ce?
tika-s0401t:1097_2: Na hi tesaṃ parisuddhāparisuddhavaṇṇānaṃ parittatā appamāṇatā vā abhibhavanakāraṇaṃ,
tika-s0401t:1097_4: Etesu ca parittādikasiṇarūpesu yaṃyaṃcaritassa imāni abhibhāyatanāni ijjhanti,
tika-s0401t:1099_1: Rūpīti ettha yenāyaṃ sasantatipariyāpannena rūpena samannāgato,
tika-s0401t:1099_2: taṃ yassa jhānassa hetubhāvena visiṭṭharūpaṃ hoti.
tika-s0401t:1100_1: Idha suparisuddhanīlādivaṇṇakasiṇajjhānavasena vuttoti dassetvā idāni paṭisambhidāpāḷiyaṃ tassa brahmavihārajjhānavasena āgatabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ –
tika-s0401t:1100_3: Idha pana uparipāḷiyaṃyeva brahmavihārānaṃ āgatattā taṃ nayaṃ paṭikkhipitvā parisuddhanīlādivaṇṇakasiṇavaseneva subhavimokkho anuññāto.
tika-s0401t:1101_2: Uggahanimittādīnaṃ pathavīkasiṇanti nāmaṃ nissite nissayavohāravasena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-s0401t:1102_1: Sodhetvāti anāpajjanena āpannavuṭṭhāpanena kilesehi appaṭipīḷanena ca visodhetvā.
tika-s0401t:1102_4: Kammaṭṭhānabhāvanaṃ paribundheti uparodheti pavattituṃ na detīti palibodho rakārassa lakāraṃ katvā,
tika-s0401t:1104_0: Gambhīrañca kathaṃ kattā, no caṭṭhāne niyojako”ti. –
tika-s0401t:1105_0: Evamādiguṇasamannāgataṃ ekantahitesiṃ vuddhipakkhe ṭhitaṃ kalyāṇamittaṃ upasaṅkamitvā.
tika-s0401t:1106_0: Ananurūpaṃ vihāranti aṭṭhārasannaṃ dosānaṃ aññatarena samannāgataṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu –
tika-s0401t:1108_0: Soṇḍiṃ paṇṇañca pupphañca, phalaṃ patthitameva ca.
tika-s0401t:1110_0: Paccantasīmā sappāyaṃ, yattha mitto na labbhati.
tika-s0401t:1113_0: Anurūpeti gocaragāmato nātidūranaccāsannatādīhi pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgate. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā –
tika-s0401t:1114_4: senāsanaṃ nātidūraṃ hoti naccāsannaṃ gamanāgamanasampannaṃ divā appākiṇṇaṃ rattiṃ appasaddaṃ appanigghosaṃ appaḍaṃsamakasavātātapasarīsapasamphassaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1114_5: Tasmiṃ kho pana senāsane viharantassa appakasirena uppajjanti cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārā.
tika-s0401t:1114_6: Tasmiṃ kho pana senāsane therā bhikkhū viharanti bahussutā āgatāgamā dhammadharā vinayadharā mātikādharā.
tika-s0401t:1114_7: Te kālena kālaṃ upasaṅkamitvā paripucchati paripañhati ‘idaṃ, bhante,
tika-s0401t:1114_11: anekavihitesu ca kaṅkhāṭhāniyesu dhammesu kaṅkhaṃ paṭivinodenti. Evaṃ kho,
tika-s0401t:1115_0: Ettha ca nātidūraṃ naccāsannaṃ gamanāgamanasampannanti ekaṃ aṅgaṃ,
tika-s0401t:1115_1: divā appākiṇṇaṃ rattiṃ appasaddaṃ appanigghosanti ekaṃ,
tika-s0401t:1115_6: kaṅkhaṃ paṭivinodentīti ekanti evaṃ pañcaṅgāni veditabbāni.
tika-s0401t:1117_3: Tattha bhastā viya vāyunā uddhaṃ jīvitapariyādānā yathānukkamaṃ samuggatena sūnabhāvena dhumātattā uddhumātaṃ,
tika-s0401t:1117_12: yebhuyyena ca nīlavaṇṇassa nilaṭṭhāne nīlasāṭakapārutasseva chavasarīrassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1117_21: Ito ca etto ca vividhākārena soṇasiṅgālādīhi khāyitaṃ vikkhāyitaṃ,
tika-s0401t:1118_5: aññena sīsanti evaṃ tato tato vikkhittassa chavasarīrassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1118_7: kākapadākārena aṅgapaccaṅgesu satthena hanitvā vuttanayeneva vikkhittassa chavasarīrassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1118_8: Lohitaṃ kirati vikkhipati ito cito ca paggharatīti lohitakaṃ,
tika-s0401t:1118_19: Tathā hi aparisaṇṭhitajalāya sīghasotāya nadiyā arittabaleneva nāvā tiṭṭhati,
tika-s0401t:1118_21: Evamevaṃ dubbalattā ārammaṇassa vitakkabaleneva cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhati,
tika-s0401t:1118_25: Ārammaṇassa dubbalatā cettha paṭikūlabhāvena cittaṃ ṭhapetuṃ asamatthatā.
tika-s0401t:1119_1: lohaṃ mata”ntiādīsu yaṃ khandhappabandhaṃ upādāya rukkhādisamaññā,
tika-s0401t:1119_2: tasmiṃ anupacchinnepi allatādivigamanaṃ nissāya matavohāro sammutimaraṇaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1119_4: Samucchedamaraṇanti arahato santānassa sabbaso ucchedabhūtaṃ maraṇaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1119_6: Maraṇānussatibhāvanāyaṃ pana tividhampetaṃ nādhippetaṃ asaṃvegavatthuto anupaṭṭhahanato abāhullato ca.
tika-s0401t:1119_7: Maraṇānussatiyañhi ekena bhavena paricchinnassa jīvitindriyappabandhassa vicchedo maraṇanti adhippeto saṃvegavatthuto upaṭṭhahanato bāhullato ca.
tika-s0401t:1119_8: Idāni imameva maraṇaṃ sandhāya vikappantaraṃ dassento,
tika-s0401t:1120_4: kabaḷīkāro ca so āhāro cāti kabaḷīkārāhāro.
tika-s0401t:1120_6: Savatthuko eva hi āhāro idha kammaṭṭhānabhāvena adhippeto.
tika-s0401t:1120_7: Ojālakkhaṇo pana āhāro ojaṭṭhamakaṃ rūpaṃ āharatīti āhāroti vuccati.
tika-s0401t:1120_10: Samakkhanappaṭikūlaṃ pana paribhogādīsu labbhamānattā idha visuṃ na gahitaṃ,
tika-s0401t:1120_12: Visuddhimagge pana samakkhanaṃ paribhogādīsu labbhamānampi nissandavasena visesato paṭikūlanti visuṃ gahetvā dasahākārehi paṭikūlatā vuttā.
tika-s0401t:1121_1: Saññāsaddo cāyaṃ “rūpasaññā saddasaññā”tiādīsu sañjānanalakkhaṇe dhamme āgato,
tika-s0401t:1121_3: “uddhumātakasaññāti vā sopākarūpasaññāti vā ime dhammā ekaṭṭhā,
tika-s0401t:1121_7: tappabhāvitaṃ vā upacārajjhānaṃ idha “āhāre paṭikūlasaññā”ti adhippetaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1122_3: tasmiṃ anicce khandhapañcake aniccanti uppajjamānā aniccalakkhaṇapariggāhikā saññā aniccasaññā. Tenāha –
tika-s0401t:1122_10: Yassa ca sabhāvena khandhapañcakaṃ aniccanti vuccati,
tika-s0401t:1122_13: aniccalakkhaṇañca udayabbayānaṃ amanasikārā santatiyā paṭicchannattā na upaṭṭhāti,
tika-s0401t:1122_14: udayabbayaṃ pana pariggahetvā santatiyā vikopitāya aniccalakkhaṇaṃ yāthāvasarasato upaṭṭhāti.
tika-s0401t:1122_15: Na hi sammadeva udayabbayaṃ sallakkhentassa pubbāpariyena pavattamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ aññoññabhāvaṃ sallakkhaṇena
tika-s0401t:1122_17: atha kho ayosalākā viya asambandhabhāvenāti suṭṭhutaraṃ aniccalakkhaṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti.
tika-s0401t:1123_1: taṃ dukkha”nti vacanato tadeva khandhapañcakaṃ abhiṇhappaṭipīḷanato dukkhaṃ,
tika-s0401t:1123_6: Tattha paṭipīḷanaṃ nāma yathāpariggahitaṃ udayavayavasena saṅkhārānaṃ nirantaraṃ paṭipīḷiyamānatā vibādhiyamānatā.
tika-s0401t:1123_7: Dukkhalakkhaṇañca abhiṇhasampaṭipīḷanassa amanasikārā iriyāpathehi paṭicchannattā na upaṭṭhāti,
tika-s0401t:1123_8: abhiṇhasampaṭipīḷanaṃ pana manasi karitvā iriyāpathe labbhamānadukkhappaṭicchādakabhāve ugghāṭite dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ yāthāvasarasato upaṭṭhāti.
tika-s0401t:1123_9: Tathā hi iriyāpathehi paṭicchannattā dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ na upaṭṭhāti,
tika-s0401t:1123_10: te ca iriyāpathā abhiṇhasampaṭipīḷanāmanasikārena paṭicchādakā jātā.
tika-s0401t:1123_11: Ekasmiñhi iriyāpathe uppannassa dukkhassa vinodakaṃ iriyāpathantaraṃ tassa paṭicchādakaṃ viya hoti,
tika-s0401t:1123_13: Iriyāpathānaṃ pana taṃtaṃdukkhapatitākārabhāve yāthāvato ñāte tesaṃ dukkhappaṭicchādakabhāvo ugghāṭito
tika-s0401t:1123_14: nāma hoti saṅkhārānaṃ nirantaraṃ dukkhābhitunnatāya pākaṭabhāvato.
tika-s0401t:1123_15: Tasmā abhiṇhasampaṭipīḷanaṃ manasi karitvā iriyāpathe labbhamānadukkhappaṭicchādakabhāve ugghāṭite dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ yāthāvasarasato upaṭṭhāti.
tika-s0401t:1124_1: tadanattā”ti vacanato tadeva khandhapañcakaṃ avasavattanato anattā,
tika-s0401t:1124_4: Anattalakkhaṇañca nānādhātuvinibbhogassa amanasikārā ghanena paṭicchannattā na upaṭṭhāti,
tika-s0401t:1124_8: aññā vedanā”tiādinā ca visuṃ visuṃ katvā ghanavinibbhoge kate samūhaghane kiccārammaṇaghane ca bhedite anattalakkhaṇaṃ yāthāvasarasato upaṭṭhāti.
tika-s0401t:1124_9: Yā hesā aññamaññūpatthambhesu samuditesu rūpārūpadhammesu ekattābhinivesavasena aparimadditasaṅkhārehi mamāyamānā samūhaghanatā,
tika-s0401t:1124_10: tathā tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ kiccabhedassa satipi paṭiniyatabhāve ekato gayhamānā kiccaghanatā,
tika-s0401t:1124_11: tathā sārammaṇadhammānaṃ satipi ārammaṇakaraṇabhede ekato gayhamānā ārammaṇaghanatā.
tika-s0401t:1124_12: Sā catūsu dhātūsu ñāṇena vinibbhujitvā dissamānāsu hatthena parimaddiyamāno pheṇapiṇḍo viya vilīnaṃ āgacchati,
tika-s0401t:1124_13: yathāpaccayaṃ pavattamānā suññā ete dhammamattāti avasavattanākārasaṅkhātaṃ anattalakkhaṇaṃ pākaṭataraṃ hoti.
tika-s0401t:1127_2: Cittena pharaṇañca samuddassa dvidhā sambhavatīti āha –
