tika-s0401t:1127_4: Purimena atthenāti “sampayogavasena vijjaṃ bhajantī”ti vuttena atthena.
tika-s0401t:1128_1: Mahato saṃvegāya saṃvattatītiādīsu ayaṃ pana aparo nayo.
tika-s0401t:1128_7: Vijjāvimuttiphalasacchikiriyāyāti tisso vijjā cittassa adhimutti nibbānaṃ cattāri sāmaññaphalānīti etesaṃ paccakkhakaraṇāya.
tika-s0401t:1129_1: Paññāpaṭilābhāyātiādīsu soḷasasu padesu paññāpaṭilābhāya paññāvuddhiyā paññāvepullāya paññābāhullāyāti imāni cattāri paññāvasena bhāvavacanāni,
tika-s0401t:1129_4: Saddhammassavananti tesaṃ sappurisānaṃ santike sīlādippaṭipattidīpakassa saddhammavacanassa savanaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1129_5: Yoniso manasikāroti sutānaṃ dhammānaṃ atthūpaparikkhāvasena upāyena manasikāro.
tika-s0401t:1130_1: Tesattatīnaṃ ñāṇānanti paṭisambhidāpāḷiyaṃ “sotāvadhāne paññā sutamaye ñāṇaṃ,
tika-s0401t:1130_2: sutvāna saṃvare paññā sīlamaye ñāṇa”ntiādinā ñāṇakathāya niddiṭṭhānaṃ sāvakasādhāraṇāsādhāraṇānaṃ ñāṇānaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1130_3: Imesañhi tesattatiñāṇānaṃ sutamayañāṇādīni sattasaṭṭhiñāṇāni sāvakassa sādhāraṇāni,
tika-s0401t:1132_7: tampi khayadhammaṃ vayadhammaṃ virāgadhammaṃ nirodhadhammanti ñāṇaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1132_24: tampi khayadhamaṃ vayadhammaṃ virāgadhammaṃ nirodhadhammanti ñāṇa”nti –
tika-s0401t:1133_0: Bhagavatā nidānavagge jarāmaraṇādīsu ekādasasu paṭiccasamuppādaṅgesu paccekaṃ satta satta katvā vuttāni sattasattatiñāṇāni.
tika-s0401t:1134_1: Paccayākāro hi dhammānaṃ pavattisaṅkhātāya ṭhitiyā kāraṇattā “dhammaṭṭhitī”ti vuccati,
tika-s0401t:1136_0: Sattannañca sekkhānanti tisso sikkhā sikkhantīti sekkhasaññitānaṃ sotāpattimaggaṭṭhādīnaṃ sattannaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1136_1: Puthujjanakalyāṇakassa cāti nibbānagāminiyā paṭipadāya yuttattā sundaraṭṭhena kalyāṇasaññitassa puthujjanassa.
tika-s0401t:1136_3: Yathāvuttānaṃ aṭṭhannampi paññānaṃ vasena visesatova arahato paññāvasena paññāvuddhiyā.
tika-s0401t:1137_0: Yassa kassacipi visesato anurūpadhammassa mahantaṃ nāma kiccasiddhiyā veditabbanti tadassa kiccasiddhiyā
tika-s0401t:1137_3: mahāvisayatā ca tesaṃ paṭisambhidāmagge āgatanayena veditabbā.
tika-s0401t:1137_19: vitthāro pana visuddhimagge ākaṅkheyyasuttādīsu ca āgatanayena veditabbo.
tika-s0401t:1137_20: Iminā nayena samādhikkhandhādīnampi mahantatā yathārahaṃ niddhāretvā vattabbā.
tika-s0401t:1137_22: Tattha ṭhānāṭṭhānānaṃ mahāvisayatā bahudhātukasuttādīsu āgatanayena veditabbā.
tika-s0401t:1138_1: ariyasaccānaṃ sakalayānasaṅgāhakato saccavibhaṅge taṃsaṃvaṇṇanāsu ca āgatanayena,
tika-s0401t:1138_3: sāmaññaphalānaṃ mahato hitassa mahato sukhassa mahato atthassa mahato yogakkhemassa nipphattibhāvato santapaṇītaatakkāvacarapaṇḍitavedanīyabhāvato,
tika-s0401t:1138_4: abhiññānaṃ mahāsambhārato mahāvisayato mahākiccato mahānubhāvato mahānipphattito,
tika-s0401t:1139_2: puthu nānākkhandhesu ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti “ayaṃ rūpakkhandho nāma…pe…
tika-s0401t:1139_3: ayaṃ viññāṇakkhandho nāmā”ti evaṃ pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ paṭicca ñāṇaṃ pavattati.
tika-s0401t:1139_13: bahuvidhena viññāṇakkhandhoti evaṃ ekekassa khandhassa ekavidhādivasena atītādivasenapi nānākaraṇaṃ paṭicca ñāṇaṃ pavattati.
tika-s0401t:1140_3: dve cātubhūmikā”ti evaṃ dhātūsu nānākaraṇaṃ paṭicca ñāṇaṃ pavattati.
tika-s0401t:1140_5: Paccekabuddhānañhi dvinnañca aggasāvakānaṃ upādinnadhātūsu eva nānākaraṇaṃ paṭicca ñāṇaṃ pavattati,
tika-s0401t:1140_9: sabbaññubuddhānaṃyeva pana “imāya dhātuyā ussannattā imassa rukkhassa khandho seto hoti,
tika-s0401t:1140_16: Imassa pupphaṃ nīlaṃ, pītaṃ, lohitaṃ, odātaṃ,
tika-s0401t:1140_20: Phalaṃ khuddakaṃ, mahantaṃ, dīghaṃ, vaṭṭaṃ, suvaṇṇaṃ,
tika-s0401t:1140_23: duggandhaṃ, madhuraṃ, tittakaṃ, ambilaṃ, kaṭukaṃ, kasāvaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1140_24: Kaṇṭako tikhiṇo, atikhiṇo, ujuko, kuṭilo, tambo, nīlo, lohito,
tika-s0401t:1141_3: dve cātubhūmakā”ti evaṃ āyatananānattaṃ paṭicca ñāṇaṃ pavattati.
tika-s0401t:1142_0: Puthu nānāpaṭiccasamuppādesūti ajjhattabahiddhābhedato santānabhedato ca nānappabhedesu paṭiccasamuppādaṅgesu.
tika-s0401t:1144_3: Puthu nānāpaṭibhānesūti atthapaṭisambhidādivisayesu imāni ñāṇāni idamatthajotakānīti tathā tathā paṭibhānato
tika-s0401t:1145_0: Puthu nānāsīlakkhandhesūtiādīsu sīlassa puthuttaṃ nānattañca vuttameva,
tika-s0401t:1146_2: Gambhīresūti sasādīhi viya mahāsamuddo anupacitañāṇasambhārehi alabbhaneyyappatiṭṭhesu khandhesu ñāṇaṃ
tika-s0401t:1146_3: pavattatīti visayassa gambhīratāya ñāṇassa gambhīratā vibhāvitā.
tika-s0401t:1147_0: Tikkhavisadabhāvādiguṇehi asādhāraṇattā paresaṃ paññāya na sāmantā,
tika-s0401t:1147_1: atha kho suvidūravidūreti asamantapaññā ākārassa rassattaṃ katvā.
tika-s0401t:1147_3: tesaṃ yathāvuttaguṇehi aññehi asādhāraṇattā natthi etissā kāyaci samatthanti asamatthā paññāti yojanā.
tika-s0401t:1147_5: Na añño koci sakkoti abhisambhavitunti ñāṇagatiyā sampāpuṇituṃ na añño kocipi sakkoti,
tika-s0401t:1148_0: “Paññāpabhedakusalo abhinnañāṇo adhigatappaṭisambhido catuvesārajjappatto dasabaladhārī purisāsabho purisasīho
tika-s0401t:1148_1: purisanāgo purisājañño purisadhorayho anantañāṇo anantatejo anantayaso aḍḍho mahaddhano balavā netā vinetā
tika-s0401t:1148_3: So hi bhagavā anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā,
tika-s0401t:1148_7: Maggānugāmī ca pana etarahi sāvakā viharanti pacchā samannāgatā.
tika-s0401t:1149_2: cakkhubhūto ñāṇabhūto dhammabhūto brahmabhūto vattā pavattā atthassa ninnetā amatassa dātā dhammassāmī tathāgato,
tika-s0401t:1149_3: natthi tassa bhagavato aññātaṃ adiṭṭhaṃ aviditaṃ asacchikataṃ aphassitaṃ paññāya.
tika-s0401t:1149_4: Atītaṃ anāgataṃ paccuppannaṃ upādāya sabbe dhammā sabbākārena buddhassa bhagavato ñāṇamukhe āpāthaṃ āgacchanti,
tika-s0401t:1149_5: yaṃ kiñci neyyaṃ nāma atthi taṃ sabbaṃ jānitabbaṃ,
tika-s0401t:1149_6: attattho vā parattho vā ubhayattho vā diṭṭhadhammiko vā attho samparāyiko vā attho uttāno vā attho gambhīro
tika-s0401t:1149_7: vā attho gūḷho vā attho paṭicchanno vā attho neyyo vā attho nīto vā attho anavajjo vā attho nikkileso
tika-s0401t:1149_8: vā attho vodāno vā attho paramattho vā attho,
tika-s0401t:1150_15: yathā dvinnaṃ samuggapaṭalānaṃ sammā phusitānaṃ heṭṭhimaṃ samuggapaṭalaṃ uparimaṃ nātivattati,
tika-s0401t:1150_18: evamevaṃ buddhassa bhagavato neyyañca ñāṇañca aññamaññapariyantaṭṭhāyino.
tika-s0401t:1151_0: “Sabbe dhammā buddhassa bhagavato āvajjanappaṭibaddhā ākaṅkhappaṭibaddhā manasikārappaṭibaddhā cittuppādappaṭibaddhā,
tika-s0401t:1151_6: apparajakkhe mahārajakkhe tikkhindriye mudindriye svākāre dvākāre suviññāpaye duviññāpaye bhabbā sabbe satte pajānāti,
tika-s0401t:1151_7: sadevako loko samārako sabrahmako sassamaṇabrāhmaṇī pajā sadevamanussā antobuddhañāṇe parivattati.
tika-s0401t:1152_0: “Yathā ye keci macchakacchapā antamaso timitimiṅgalaṃ upādāya antomahāsamudde parivattanti,
tika-s0401t:1152_1: evameva sadevako loko samārako sabrahmako sassamaṇabrāhmaṇī pajā sadevamanussā antobuddhañāṇe parivattati.
tika-s0401t:1152_2: Yathā ye keci pakkhino antamaso garuḷaṃ venateyyaṃ upādāya ākāsassa padese parivattanti,
tika-s0401t:1152_5: buddhañāṇaṃ devamanussānaṃ paññaṃ pharitvā atighaṃsitvā tiṭṭhati.
tika-s0401t:1152_6: Yepi te khattiyapaṇḍitā brāhmaṇapaṇḍitā gahapatipaṇḍitā samaṇapaṇḍitā nipuṇā kataparappavādā vālavedhirūpā,
tika-s0401t:1153_0: Ādinā niddiṭṭhapāḷiṃ peyyālamukhena saṃkhipitvā dassento “paññāpabhedakusalo pabhinnañāṇo…pe…
tika-s0401t:1154_3: Te pañhanti te te attanā adhippetaṃ pañhaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1154_5: Upakkhittakāti bhagavato paññāveyyattiyena samīpe khittakā antevāsikā sampajjanti.
tika-s0401t:1155_1: Upasagge satipi tadeva padaṃ tamatthaṃ vadatīti upasaggena vināpi so attho viññeyyo anekatthattā dhātūnanti vuttaṃ –
tika-s0401t:1155_4: tasmā rāgaṃ abhibhuyyatīti sā sā maggapaññā attanā attanā vajjhaṃ rāgaṃ abhibhuyyati abhibhavati,
tika-s0401t:1155_6: Abhibhavatīti sā sā phalapaññā taṃ taṃ rāgaṃ bhavi abhibhavi maddīti bhūripaññā.
tika-s0401t:1156_19: Bhavati abhibhavati arinti bhūri asarūpato parassa akārassa lopaṃ katvā. Tenāha –
tika-s0401t:1156_21: Bhavati ettha thāvarajaṅgamanti bhūri vuccati pathavī yathā “bhūmī”ti bhūri viyāti bhūripaññā vitthatavipulaṭṭhena sabbaṃ sahatāya ca. Tenāha –
tika-s0401t:1156_29: iminā kāraṇena puggalassa bhūripaññāya samannāgatattā tassa paññā bhūripaññā nāmāti attho.
tika-s0401t:1156_30: “Bhūripaññassa paññā bhūripaññapaññā”ti vattabbe ekassa paññāsaddassa lopaṃ katvā “bhūripaññā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1157_3: Bhūrīti bhūte atthe khandhādike ramati saccasabhāvena,
tika-s0401t:1157_5: Medhāti asani viya siluccaye kilese medhati hiṃsatīti medhā,
tika-s0401t:1157_8: taṃ sattaṃ attahitappaṭipattiyaṃ sampayuttadhamme ca yāthāvalakkhaṇappaṭivedhe pariṇetīti pariṇāyikā.
tika-s0401t:1158_2: Tañca paññāya bāhullaṃ pavatti evāti tamatthaṃ paññāgarukassa puggalassa vasena dassento,
tika-s0401t:1158_7: paññāya caritaṃ pavattaṃ assāti vā paññācarito.
tika-s0401t:1158_16: Okkhāyanaṃ yāthāvato dhammānaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ bahulaṃ etassāti okkhāyanabahulo.
tika-s0401t:1158_17: Paññāya tassa tassa dhammassa sammāpekkhanā sampekkhā,
tika-s0401t:1158_20: Sampekkhāyanaṃ vā yāthāvato dassanadhammo sabhāvo etassāti sampekkhāyanadhammo.
tika-s0401t:1158_21: Sabbaṃ dhammajātaṃ vibhūtaṃ vibhāvitaṃ katvā viharaṇasīloti vibhūtavihārī.
tika-s0401t:1159_3: Sā paññā caritā garukā bahulā assāti taccarito taggaruko tabbahulo.
tika-s0401t:1159_4: Tassaṃ paññāyaṃ ninno poṇo pabbhāro adhimuttoti tanninno tappoṇo tappabbhāro tadadhimutto.
tika-s0401t:1159_8: ayaṃ puggalo nekkhammagaruko”tiādīsu viya purimajātito pabhuti vuttāni.
tika-s0401t:1160_1: yā samāraddhā attano paññākiccaṃ adandhāyantī avitthāyantī khippameva sampāpeti. Tenāha –
tika-s0401t:1160_3: Tattha sīghaṃ sīghanti bahūnaṃ sīlādīnaṃ saṅgahatthaṃ dvikkhattuṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1160_5: ṭhapetvā vā indriyasaṃvaraṃ tassa visuṃ gahitattā itarāni tividhasīlāni.
tika-s0401t:1160_6: Indriyasaṃvaranti cakkhādīnaṃ channaṃ indriyānaṃ rāgappaṭighappavesaṃ akatvā satikavāṭena nivāraṇaṃ thakanaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1160_8: Jāgariyānuyoganti divasassa tīsu koṭṭhāsesu rattiyā paṭhamamajjhimakoṭṭhāsesu ca jāgarati na niddāyati,
tika-s0401t:1160_14: Sīlakkhandhanti sekkhaṃ vā asekkhaṃ vā sīlakkhandhaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1160_16: Paññākkhandhanti maggapaññā ca sekkhāsekkhānaṃ lokiyapaññā ca.
tika-s0401t:1161_3: Vedabahuloti tassā eva pītiyā sampayuttasomanassavedanāvasena niddesapadaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1161_6: Sīlāni paripūretīti haṭṭhappahaṭṭho udaggūdaggo sampiyāyamāno sīlāni sampādeti.
tika-s0401t:1161_7: Pītisomanassasahagatā hi paññā abhirativasena ārammaṇe phullitā vikasitā viya pavattati,
tika-s0401t:1162_0: Aniccato khippaṃ javatīti “khandhapañcakaṃ anicca”nti vegāyitena pavattati,
tika-s0401t:1162_1: paṭipakkhadūrībhāvena pubbābhisaṅkhārassa sātisayattā indena vissaṭṭhavajiraṃ viya lakkhaṇaṃ avirajjhantī
tika-s0401t:1162_5: Evaṃ lakkhaṇārammaṇikavipassanāvasena javanapaññaṃ dassetvā balavavipassanāvasena dassetuṃ –
tika-s0401t:1163_0: Ñāṇassa tikkhabhāvo nāma savisesaṃ paṭipakkhasamucchindanena veditabboti “khippaṃ kilese chindatīti tikkhapaññā”ti
tika-s0401t:1163_1: vatvā te pana kilese vibhāgena dassento,
tika-s0401t:1163_3: Samathavipassanāhi vikkhambhanatadaṅgavasena pahīnampi ariyamaggena asamūhatattā uppattidhammataṃ anatītatāya asamūhatuppannanti vuccati,
tika-s0401t:1163_10: vipassanākkamena ariyamaggaṃ patvā samucchedavaseneva abhāvaṃ gamayatīti attho.
tika-s0401t:1163_12: “Ime sattā marantū”ti paresaṃ maraṇappaṭisaṃyutto vitakko byāpādavitakko.
tika-s0401t:1163_13: “Ime sattā vihiṃsiyantū”ti paresaṃ vihiṃsāpaṭisaṃyutto vitakko vihiṃsāvitakko.
tika-s0401t:1164_0: “Sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā saṅkhatā paṭiccasamuppannā khayadhammā vayadhammā virāgadhammā
tika-s0401t:1164_4: Tattha ubbegabahuloti “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”tiādinā nayena sabbasaṅkhāresu abhiṇhappavattasaṃvego.
tika-s0401t:1164_10: Bahimukhoti sabbasaṅkhārato bahibhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ uddissa pavattañāṇamukho.
tika-s0401t:1164_16: Anibbiddhapubbanti anamatagge saṃsāre antaṃ pāpetvā anividdhapubbaṃ.
tika-s0401t:1167_1: Natthi ettha mataṃ maraṇaṃ vināsoti amataṃ,
tika-s0401t:1167_4: Amatassa vā nibbānassa adhigamahetutāya amatasadisaatappakasukhapatitatāya ca kāyagatāsati “amata”nti vuttā.
